1.content:
It is a seemingly normal night, and several people are carrying bags into a house.

"Thanks again for letting us stay here while our parents are out of town, Mrs. Williams." Karen said.

"It's no problem at all, Karen. I've known you and your siblings for so long it's almost as if you were my own children." Alex's mother, Elizabeth, said.

"Where should we put everything, mom?" Alex asked.

"Karen and Stephanie can take the guest room upstairs. Ashley can share Kate's room, and Matt can stay in the downstairs guest room," she explained to everyone.

"Alright," Karen said as she and Alex walked upstairs to the guest room, followed shortly thereafter by Stephanie, as her and her other siblings deposited their stuff in the specified rooms.

Not long after that, Alex and Karen decided to go sit outside. The two sat on the back porch and just talked for a while. Then, something caught Karen's attention. She pointed up to the sky at a light that seems to be getting bigger. As they stared at it, they realize that it's getting bigger because its getting closer. As it's about to crash, the two get up to find cover, but it proves unnecessary as when it comes to the ground, rather than crashing, it just stops on the ground without impact.

"What is that?" Alex asked as the two stared at what looked like a large glowing sphere bigger than either of them.

"I don't know..." Karen said as she got up and walked towards it, and Alex followed. When she got near, there was a brief flash, and there was a small metallic ball on the ground.

Cautiously, Alex bent down to touch it. After nothing happens, the two decided to bring the thing inside and examine it. Alex picked it up and brought it into the living room, and set it on the coffee table.

"What do you think it is? Some weird alien device?" Alex asked.

"I don't know. Maybe?" Karen said. She then reached over and touched it. Suddenly, the ball glows a bit, and a light shines out of it and went over Alex and Karen.

-SCANNING SUBJECTS-

"What?" Alex said as they heard a mechanical voice say that.

-SCANNING COMPLETE-
-SUBJECTS REGISTERED-

"What?" Karen said this time, and then there was a flash of light before they blacked out.

Who are you?
1.title: The Beginning

choices: Test it out on your mom
Test it out on your brother Zack
Test it out on your sister Kate
Test it out on one of Karen's siblings
Talk to Karen about last night
11.content:
You eventually come to, not knowing what happened. You then notice that several things are different. The first is that you are no longer in the living room with Karen, and are now in your room in your bed. The second thing you notice is that it is no longer night, and is now morning. The next thing you realize is that while you had been fully clothed before blacking out, you are now dressed as you normally would be when going to bed wearing a white t-shirt and your boxers.

You then notice a metal ring around your wrist. Its mostly plain, and has a single button on it. "What is this thing?" you ask out loud. As you look at it, you wonder how it could have gotten on you. It seemed to fit tightly around wrist, and when you tried to take it off, it wouldn't budge. Not making any progress with removing it, you decide the only thing to do is press the button. As soon as you do this, a holographic image appears in front of you. Its sudden appearance cause you to jump back in surprise.

-GREETINGS REGISTERED USER ALEX WILLIAMS. YOU ARE NOW IN POSSESSION OF A PERSONAL ASPECT INTERCHANGING DEVICE, OR PAID FOR SHORT. THE PAID IS A TOOL THAT ALLOWS YOU TO EXCHANGE ASPECTS ABOUT YOURSELF WITH ANOTHER. USING THE PAID. TO USE THE PAID, SIMPLY AIM THE DEVICE AT ANOTHER PERSON AND PRESS THE BUTTON. ONCE PRESSED, TIME WILL STOP FOR ALL BUT YOU AND OTHERS NEARBY WHO ARE IN POSSESSION OF A PAID AS WELL, AND A HOLOGRAPHIC DISPLAY WILL BE BROUGHT UP FOR YOUR USE. USING THE HOLOGRAPHIC DISPLAY, SELECT FROM THE MENU OF "LIFE", "CLOTHING", "PERSONALITY', AND/OR CHOICES UNDER "PERSONAL INFO" THEN SELECT "APPLY CHANGES". TIME WILL RESUME, AND THE CHANGES YOU HAVE SELECTED WILL IMMEDIATELY TAKE EFFECT.

-FOR DETAILS ON EACH OPTION, CONSULT THE "USER INSTRUCTIONS(the description of the story of this story)" IN THE MENU SCREEN AT ANY TIME.-

At first, you think that it sounds ridiculous. But then again, maybe you should at least try it out on someone. You then remember that Karen had been with you before you blacked out last night. You wonder whether you should test it out or go talk with Karen about what happened.
11.title: Alex

111.content:
You decide that your mother is going to be your first test subject. As you walk out of your room, you see that your mom is coincidentally coming out of her own room down the hall. You then press the button on the device as instructed, then point over at you mother. As soon as you do, you see that she freezes in place, and not just her, but everything else like the clock has as well.

Then, in front of you, a holographic display pops up. There's an image of you, and an image of your mother, and next to the images in information about both of you. In the center, you saw five options.

Body
Life
Clothing
Personality
Apply Changes

You look over your options, and think about what you will do.
111.title: Test it out on your mom

choices: Switch clothes back with you mother and go to school
Keep your mothers clothes for now and go to school
Switch with your mother so that she goes to school instead of you
1111.content:
Making your decision, you touch the option "Clothing," then touch "Apply Changes." Time seems to start up again. You look over to your mother and see she is now wearing the same clothes you had just been wearing a moment ago. She was now dressed in the white t-shirt and boxers that you had worn to bed last night. And when you look down, you see that you now wore her pajamas.

You look over to your mom again, who doesn't seem to notice anyhing is different.

"Good morning mom." you greeted her.

"Morning Alex." she replies.

"Anything seem strange this morning?" you ask her.

"Not that I can tell. What do you mean?"

"Nevermind, its nothing." you say and she walks into the bathroom.

You head over to the guest room Karen is staying in. As you walk down the hall, you notice all the pictures on the wall have changed. In them all, you and your mom have switched clothes. All the pictures of you now have you wearing women's clothes, and the reverse is true for your mother.

When you reach the guest room, you knock on the door, and Karen answers. When she sees what you are wearing, she gives you a strange look, then notices the PAID on your arm. "You got one too?" she asks as she holds up her arm and shows her's.

"Yeah." you say as you nod and hold yours up.

"And based on what you're wearing, I take it you tried it out already? It really works?"

"Yep. My mother didn't even realize we switched clothes, and in all the pictures, we've also switched clothes." you explain to her.

"So this thing really works..." Karen muses. "So what will we do now?"

Before you two can decide, your mother walks by and says. "You two should be getting ready for school instead of standing around in your pajamas talking."
1111.title: Switch clothes with your mother

choices: Wait until you get to school
11111.content:
After hearing you mother, you decide to switch clothing back with her and use the PAID to do that. With your own clothes returned to you, you get dressed and then head out to wait for your bus with Karen. "So, what are we going to do with these?" you say as you hold up your arm.

"I don't know. We could have some fun with them around school." Karen says.

You two don't wait long, as the bus pulls up shorly after. You get on and Karen follows, and the two of you take your seats. You look around, and think that there are plenty of targets on this bus to switch with. Or you could wait until school.

You look around, and then decide on two people for you two to switch with. You then point out your chosen targets to Karen.

Curiosity got the better of you and you deiced to swap personalities with Alison. “Wow, Alex, did you just do what I think you did?” asked Karen, surprised by your choice. “Yeah, and I don’t know why, but I feel totes happy right now. Hey, do you have gum?” you replied. Karen giggled a bit and pulled out a piece of gum from her purse. You weren’t really aware of it, but your posture had become undeniably feminine and although Karen would be the only one to really notice the changes, there was a bit of vocal fry when you spoke. “Hey, can I borrow your compact?” you asked Karen. She looked at you funny, but you were completely oblivious and just held your hand out. She put her compact mirror on your hand and you checked how you looked, “Gawd, I look awful! Why didn’t you tell me I had such bad eye-bags, babes?”

Karen was unsure whether to say something just roll with your new, bimbo personality. Weirdly, there was a part of Karen that wanted to see where your new personality would take thing. “I’m sorry Alex, maybe the PAID can help you with that,” she suggested.

“Hmm, you know, that’s a great idea, babes!” You exclaimed giddily.

You decide to …

1111111122122.content:
Eyeing everyone on the bus, you started to consider your options on who to swap with. The first person that came to mind was Alison (now with your personality), she was uncomfortably fidgeting with her clothes on her seat, and constantly moving her hair out of the way. You now thought that Alison looked beautiful, and that she had a great sense of style. Swapping with her again could be a good option, you thought.

Next up was Rebecca White, next to Alison, she was also one of the prettiest girls in school, and since Alison used to be friends with Rebecca, you didn't hate her anymore. And with your new mentality, you thought that she definitely had some great qualities worth swapping.

Another option was your own girlfriend, Karen. Of course you still loved her and thought she was beautiful, but now that you had more feminine personality, you thought that maybe you could "borrow" some of her traits.

Then again, there were more people on the bus...

choices: You get a text message during class.
111111211.content:
"Lets switch lives with them." you suggest, and Karen nods in agreement. You aim your PAID at John and are about to press the button when Karen stops you.

"Wait, lets make this a bit more interesting. How about I switch with John and you switch with Rebecca?" she asks.

You think it over a bit before agreeing. "Alright, fine." you say before shifting your aim just a bit so that it was now aimed at Rebecca, while Karen aims for John. You both press your PAID's button, and time stops and both of your holographic displays come up. You both select "Life" on the display and then hitting "Apply Changes."

Time resumes, and you both find yourself in a new seat. You look down at yourself, seeing that you now wore Rebecca's cheerleading uniform, which was now resized to fit you, and that your nails were painted red. You then saw her purse next to you, and looking through it, you found an ID card that said "Alex White" with a picture of you on it, listing you as female. You also saw various make-up supplies, and a compact mirror. You took the mirror out and opened it, seeing your face with make up on it.

You then turned to see Karen, now wearing John's jeans and sports jacket. Her face also lacked the make-up she had previously had on, and her hair now hung down, no longer in a ponytail. She had also finished inspecting her

You both then looked over at where you had previously been, seeing John and Rebecca. Rebecca now wore your jeans and t-shirt, and you saw her breasts hanging unsupported, which drew you to check yourself, finding that you now wore a bra that seemed to be made for your breastless chest. You also saw that her face lacked the make-up that had been there previously.

You then look at John, who now wore Karen's blouse and skirt, and his face now now had the make-up that had been on Karen just moments ago. His hair was shorter than Karen's, but it was still pulled into a ponytail like she had before.

Neither them, nor anyone else on the bus noticed anything different. "This is kinda wierd." Karen commented.

"Yeah." you said, watching as the two of them acted like they were the two of you. As you waited for the bus to arrive at school, you took out the compact again, and a tube of lip gloss and absentmindedly aplied it to your lips. Once the bus arrived, you and Karen got off and went to your first class. As you did this, neither of you noticed that you now walked with a more feminine gait.

"Hey, lets stay like this for today at least." Karen suggests.

"Alright." you agree. "I guess it could be a bit interesting living as agirl for the day." You then both arrived at an english class, not realizing that this normally wasn't your first class.
111111211.title: Lives

1111112111.content:
Class goes by uneventfully, and you and Karen leave when the bell rings. You then tell her that you have to use the bathroom and without even thinking about in, walk into the girl's bathroom. Inside, you sit down in a stall, and sit down. Once done, you then flush and instinctively check your make up in the mirror. As you examine your reflection, someone else enter's the bathroom.

"Oh, hey Alex." she says, and you turn to see one of your friends, Alison, enter.

"Hey Alison." you respond, not realizing that Alison is really one of Rebecca's friends. "How was your date last night?"

"Great! He took me to this really great place to eat, and afterwards we went to a movie." she tells you.

"Really? Sounds like a good night."

"Yeah. Anyway, see later at the game tonight."

"Of course. What kind of cheerleader would I be if I wasn't there?" you say. The two of you exit the bathroom, and you see Karen nearby talking to some of Pete's friends. You walk up to her, and the two of you head to your next class.
1111112111.title: Class goes by normally.

11111121111.content:
You and Karen walk into your next class. As you sit in your(Rebecca's) usual seat, you see Rebecca and John walk in, still in your old lives.

As they pass by you and Karen, something strange happens. Time stops, both yours and Karen's holographic displays come on, yours with Rebecca, and Karen's with John, and "Personality" is selected for both of you, and then "Apply Changes", and time resumes. This all happens in the span of an instant, and you don't see much other than your holo display come up and disappear.

"Hm? Like, what was that?" you ask Karen. You aren't really sure what just happened. You don't really notice anything different.

"Uh, I don't know." Karen replies. She looks down at her PAID and sees a light that says "Rebooting." You check yours and see the same thing. "I wonder why it says this."

"Who knows." you reply. "Nothings different for me. What about you?"

"Nope, nothing different." Karen responds.

You then look over to Rebecca. As you do, you think about your old life. As you do, you can't help but think your current one is much better. Before, you were just some stupid loser, but now you were a popular cheerleader. Why would you ever want that life?

"Hey Karen." you say to her, getting her attention. "I've decided. I'm sooo keeping Rebecca life."

"Alright. Actually, I was just thinking about keeping John's life." she replies.

"Sounds good." you say, then reaching into your purse without looking, pull out you phone and start texting Allison. You spend most of the class this way until the bell rings.
11111121111.title: During class

choices: Skip to the end of school
111111211112.content:
Later in the day during lunch, you sat with Alison and some other girls gossiping about various different things. You had the life of a popular and attractive teenage girl, and have thus far, you have been enjoying yourself.

"Hey Alex, I need to use the restroom." Alison says as she stands up.

"Alright. I'll come with you, too." you say as you get up and walk with her. As you walk with her, you notice a couple of guys by the water fountain starring at you. Smirking to yourself, as you and Alison walk by them, you brush your hair to the side with your hand, and take a sip from the fountain. As you walk away, you hear them talk about how hot you are.

"You're such a show off." Alison says with a roll of her eyes.

"Hey, when you look as good as I do, you deserve to be." you say. "I'm completely faithful to Karen, and I'm no slut, but that doesn't mean I can't let people notice how beautiful I am."

After you two finish in the bathroom, you check your make up in the mirror, and the two of you exit. As you walk out, you see Karen and some other guys walking by, so you walk over to her and wrap your arms around her neck and give her a kiss. "Hey, handsome. How is everything going with you today?" you say seductively.

"Great with me. How about you, babe?" she asks.

"Same."

As you walk away, you hear the guys tell Karen about how hot you are, and how lucky she is to have a girlfriend like you. Yes, you sure were enjoying yourself.
111111211112.title: Skip to lunch

1111112111122.content:
With Rebecca's life and personality you have become in effect Rebecca. There is one difference you are Rebecca with the power of the PAID. Rebecca is a revengeful person and now that you have the power you have all of Rebecca's revenge in you.

You remember Rebecca's ex-boyfriend, Carl. They broke up because Rebecca thought he was a momma's boy. He wasn't. It was just that his mom was a single mother and he wanted to help her out. But that isn't how Rebecca saw it. Now you want revenge on that momma's boy. You think that if he wants to be a momma's boy so much you can help him out. So you go to his house after school.

You arrive at Carl's house and knock on the door. His mom, Katherine answers.

"Hello is Carl here?" you inquire.

"Yes he is." Then Katherine calls upstairs. "Carl come down, Alex is here to see you."

Carl comes down, he is about to say "What do you want?" when you zap him with the PAID. While time is stopped you zap Katherine too. You now have both people on your holographic screen.

You look through your options. The first thing you select is Katherine's "Domestic Responsibilities." You know what this means, its all the things that Katherine does to make a home for herself and Carl. It includes, not just the cooking and cleaning, but also the grocery shopping and overseeing the home maintenance and lots of other little chores.

The next thing you select is "Social Life." This doesn't just include who they are dating, but it also includes who their friends and acquaintances are and all social engagements that each one has.

The final thing you do is more of an afterthought. You don't think you should make Katherine's boyfriend gay, so you select "Genitals." This way, Carl will be a woman where it counts although he doesn't have his mom's body.

You select "Apply Changes" and time restarts. "What do you want," Carl says.

"Nothing, you reply and you turn around an leave the house. Carl and Katherine look at each other with a what happened look on their face. Carl returns to the kitchen to see to dinner and then goes back upstairs to play with his XBox while it is cooking. Katherine goes back to watching her soaps. Each oblivious of how their lives have truly changed.
1111112111122.title: Skip to the end of school

11111121111221.title: Follow Carl or Katherine

choices: Carl goes on a date with Roger
More girl chat at the card game.
111111211112211.content:
It's Friday night and the girls are coming over for Carl's usual bridge night. Katherine has gone out on a date with her teenaged girlfriend. Carl had been cleaning the house since he got home from school and set out snacks including a fruit tray and a layer cake. He also made coffee for the girls. All of Carl's friends were women in their forties or late thirties. Most were married.

Even though they were playing bridge the true purpose of the night was to talk.

Jane, a married woman of forty two said to Carl, "When will Roger ask you to marry him."

Carl replies, "I don't want to rush him."

Anne one of your divorced friends who claims to be only thirty-nine jumps in but everyone was thinking the same thing, "You have been dating Roger for over a year and a half what are you waiting for, you aren't getting any younger."

"Roger is a really nice guy, I enjoy our time together."

"That was find when we were young, but its different now," Jane retorted.

"I know this man, Phillip, I think he would be perfect for you," Cassie who is the eldest of the quartet and Carl's best friend said. "If Roger won't marry you, then you should look for someone else."

Carl said, "But Roger is really sweet."

Cassie levels with Carl, "Look Carl if he hasn't proposed yet then he probably never will and you should find someone else."

Anne and Jane voiced their agreement.

Carl felt a bit trapped by his friends. He knew they meant well. But he loved Roger, he was sure that if he gave Roger some more time that Roger would pop the question. But maybe his friends were right. He was at the stage of his life where there was no reason to wait so long for him to be married. It had been a year, maybe they are right. "OK," he finally said somewhat exasperated. "If Roger doesn't propose by New Years which is only three months away, then I'll start seeing other people."

"That is all we are saying, you don't have to dump Roger, just start seeing other people and see how you feel then," Anne said speaking for all the girls.

What's next?
111111211112211.title: Follow Carl

choices: Katherine gets Askley alone in a romantic spot
111111211112212.content:
It's Friday night and Katherine has a date with his girlfriend of three months. She is younger than Rebecca, she'll be sixteen in two months. Carl has his weekend bridge game with the girls so he is quite happy when Katherine goes out for the evening. Katherine takes her car and picks up Ashley at her house.

Katherine is invited into Ashley's home by her parents and is told that Ashley is just finishing up and will be out in a few minutes. Katherine is very respectful to Ashley's parents. They engage in some small talk while Ashley gets ready. When Ashley comes down she is dressed in a very pretty red and black tunic with a matching belt and some black leggings. Her face is prettily made up and she is wearing shoes with a two and a half inch heel. Katherine thought she looked great.

Katherine is dressed in a pretty cowl neck dress that goes down to her ankles. She wore more makeup than Ashley and it was applied more expertly with the years of practice. Katherine wore shoes with a short heel finding comfort more important than style as she got older.

As they left, Ashley's father reminded the pair that they had to get Ashley home before 11:00. Katherine hadn't had sex with Ashley yet, but she was hopeful that this would be the night. She hoped that Ashley would finally put out, but if she didn't Katherine thought it might be time to find a new girlfriend. This didn't mean that Katherine would break up with Ashley, but a woman has needs and she couldn't wait forever.

What next?
111111211112212.title: Follow Katherine

11111121111222.content:
After leaving Carl's house you head over to Mike Wilson's house. You (Rebecca) had been dating him for a short time. You don't know why you had even started dating him, he was so much of a baby. Maybe if it was more obvious then you would save other girls from getting involved with him. So you went to Mrs. Jenkins house, she has a two year old that you have been babysitting. You thought it would be easier to babysit if he grew out of a few things, like diaper changes. Petey was only two years old and potty training wasn't going to be for well over a year.

You used your PAID on Mrs. Jenkins and made Petey your son so you could take him where you want without a problem. Then you brought him over to Mike's house. Mike answered the door and then you zapped him with your PAID. You next zapped little Petey and you could see both individual's stats on the holographic screen. You wanted to swap some of their skills but you didn't want anything that would make Petey grow up too fast. You loved Petey, he was a sweetie and you didn't want to hurt him at all.

The easiest thing you selected was potty training. This was a no brainer. It wouldn't hurt Petey to be out of diapers so early and this was perfect for Mike. The next thing you selected was bottle feeding. Petey needed a bottle at least twice a day, it'd be best if he ate more solid foods, plus it'd be hilarious if Mike had to have a bottle. Mike would probably have to make his own bottle too. (as well as change his diapers.) Next, you give Mike Petey's thumb sucking habit and a lack of shame at doing it. You laugh to yourself at the thought of Mike sucking his thumb in class as if it's perfectly ordinary. You didn't want to give Mike Petey's need for a pacifier. You liked being able to give Petey is paci to quiet him down.

Hmmm, is there anything else you can swap between Petey and Mike? No this is enough. You select Apply Changes and time resumes. Mike immediately puts his thumb in his mouth. Then he takes it out again to ask, "What do you want?" Nothing you said as you turn to leave. Still holding Petey, you can tell he isn't wearing a diaper anymore. You return Petey to his mother and change their relationship back too.

What do you do next?
11111121111222.title: Alex plots more revenge (Acting like a baby)

Making your choice, you and Karen do the neccessary actions with the PAIDs on your wrists. When time resumes, you both find yourselves in their clothes. You now wore Rebecca's cheerleading uniform. You also see that you now had her purse as well, and looking inside, you find makeup and a wallet with your old ID in it, though in the picture you now had a pink tank top and makeup on your face. You then taste something on your lips and pull a compact out of "your" purse and see the lip gloss and other makeup on your face.

You then look over to Karen, who now wore John's jeans and sports jacket. Her face also lacked the make-up she had previously had on, and her hair now hung down, no longer in a ponytail. She had also finished inspecting herself, and giggled a bit when she looked at you.

Looking over to John and Rebecca, you see them both wearing your previous clothes, and you chuckle a bit at what John looks like in Karen's clothes. Shortly after, the bus arrives at school and you two get off of the bus. As you walk towards the building, Stephanie jogs up to you two. "Ready for tonight?" she asks.

"Sure. Can't wait to get out there and cheer for Karen and the rest of the team at tonight's game." you say.

"Great. See you two later." she says as she heads back over to her boyfriend.

"Looking forward to the football game tonight as well?" you ask Karen.

"Sure. As long as I've got you out there cheering us on, I think we'll do just fine." she says

It never occurs to you and Karen that you and Karen that you hadn't been a cheerleader before switching clothes with Rebecca and that she hadn't been on the football team before she switched clothes with John.

School went by uneventfully, and now it was time to get ready for the big game tonight. Folowing the other cheerleader's, you head into the girl's locker room. Despite being a boy, none of them find it strange that you were in there. It didn't even occur to you, either.

Most were already wearing their uniforms like yourself, but a few others still had to change. Still being male, your eyes did wander a bit, and they did notice, but none seemed to care.

After a while...

Making your decision, you touch the option "Lives," then touch "Apply Changes." Time seems to start up again. You quickly notice that you are now standing in front of your parents' room, just where your mother had been. You look over to your room, and you see your mother standing there, exactly where you had been. She was now dressed in the white t-shirt and boxers that you had worn to bed last night. And when you look down, you see that you now wore her pajamas.

"Morning, Liz", you greet her.

"Morning, mom", she replies.

She then walked into the bathroom. As the door closes, you hear something behind you.

"I take it you've got one too?" you hear Karen say. You turn around to see her hold up her arm to reveal she has a PAID of her own.

"Yeah. My mom now thinks she's me. I guess that means I'm in charge."

You knock on the bathroom door. "Hey Liz, maybe you should be getting ready for school!"

"Okay!" you hear your mom say.

"What about me? Do I have to hang out with your mom all day?" asked Karen.

"Technically, she's still got my personality. Anything you can discuss with me, you can discuss with her. Well, except the device on your wrist."

"Are there any alternatives?" she asks.

"Well, you could fake being sick. Then you could wait for Linda to come over and then swap with her. Or, I could swap jobs with her so she goes to work and I go to school. I'll leave the decision up to you."

Karen thinks for a minute, then decides.

"Well," you say, looking around the office. "It's gotta be some one who does something more interesting than these reports. If I wanted to do reports all day, I could have gone to school!"

"Yeah, but I still don't think I want to do any more of them than I have to."

"Well, who would you swap with then? I mean, if you want something interesting, I guess there's Janice over at the front desk," Karen says gesturing to the bubble gum chewing receptionist.

For a moment, you consider the diminutive young brunette behind the front counter. Certainly her day looked varied, alternating between the phones and the slow but steady stream of visitors entering the office. Still, even Janice seemed bored with her lot, frequently propping her high healed shoes on the desk to lean back and file her long nails.

Then, your eyes track to the opposite end of the small office, catching sight of Claire Winton as she enters her corner office. The sign on the door said 'Claire Winton, Executive Vice President -- Marketing.' She even had a separate secretary of her own, sitting near by and efficiently arranging her day. Through the window to the office, you could see Claire walking back and forth, talking on her expensive cell phone and taking an occasional moment to pause at her laptop and refer to whatever important information she needed. The designer skirt suit she wore hugged her youthful curves while maintaining an image that was professional and composed, complementing the long blond hair she kept tied into a neat bun.

“I feel like the fun of having the PAID is experiencing the unknown, not playing it safe. I’m going to swap
Lives with her and see what happens,” you told Karen, targeting Claire and activating the PAID. The whole office froze, and Karen and you were the only ones not turned to statues. “Are you sure about this? This will take you even further from your normal self,” your girlfriend cautioned. “Where’s your sense of adventure, Karen?” You selected the tab marked “Life” on the PAID’s menu and confirmed the change.

In the blink of an eye you were no longer standing next to Karen, instead you were in Claire’s – now your – office. You found yourself on the phone with someone, “… and don’t forget to bring … appropriate attire for our getaway, I mean, business trip, Ms. Winton,” the man on the phone said. It took your mind a moment to catch up to your surroundings, but you recognized the voice somehow. “Of course, Mr. Whitmore,” you purred, or at least tried to purr with your male voice still. The call ended and you took a moment to take stock of what was going on.

‘Well, that’s certainly a surprise,’ you muse, clicking over to your new desk in your stylish, high-heels. Looking at the laptop on your desk you pulled up the details of the trip the original Claire had just been organizing a trip with the owner of the company, Nathaniel E. Whitmore III, with whom she was apparently having an affair. It was a very odd sensation, but although you could remember who you were originally, you could also remember this new life as Claire. When you’d traded lives with your mom the sensation hadn’t been as strong since you already knew a lot about her, but this was all new.

Claire had always been drawn to powerful men and it didn’t get much more powerful than a multi-billionaire like Whitmore. She already had him wrapped around her finger, just a bit more time and she would be the next Mrs. Whitmore. The current Mrs. Whitmore was a complication, but Claire wasn’t too worried about it. She had planted the idea of the trip so well that Whitmore thought he had come up with the whole thing all on his own, that was how perfectly devious Claire was.

You absentmindedly ran a perfectly manicured finger over your lip as you tried to make sense of these new memories. Looking down you reveled in the expensive outfit you were wearing; your heels alone were $2,500; they had been a gift from Whitmore. What wasn’t as impressive was you body. You still very much looked like your original self and that wasn’t going to get you very far. It was then that you …

You unconsciously readjusted your outfit, smoothing out your office skirt and made sure you looked presentable like your mother did every day before walking into the office. She was a receptionist at a renowned plastic surgery clinic in the city. You were the first in the office, so you went about turning on everything and getting the office ready for the day. After everything was arranged you sat at your desk near the entrance and looked through the day’s appointments. It all came to you as though you’d done it a thousand time before. You knew the passwords for your computer and where to access patient files, it was surreal.

A short while later the owner and chief surgeon of the clinic came in. “Good morning, Doctor Henson!” you greeted him in a cheerful tone. “Good morning to you too, Mrs. Williams,” he replied. You had to admit Dr. Henson was quite handsome. He could have easily been on one of the soap operas your mother loved to watch. The thought of finding another man attractive stuck you as odd, but you didn’t give it much attention.

“You know, Mrs. Williams, you should really let me do some work on you. Having a display of my talents greet our patients when they walk in would do wonders for the business.”

You blushed at that, unsure of what to respond. Dr. Henson went to his office and patients and personnel came in soon after him. The comment echoed in your mind as you saw different patients walk in. They were all at different stages, some were looking for a simple consult on things they wanted to change, others had already gone through surgery and were just coming in for follow-up visits. A few were repeat patients who’d gone under the knife many times before.

It was close to noon and you decided to …

Ava Lynn was in her early 20s and though she was one of the doctor’s most recent clients, she was one of his most prodigious transformations. Her dream was to be a reality TV star and had spent a good portion of her daddy’s fortune to transform her body. She had huge breasts, with that bolted on look that made men go wild. 1131212.content:
During recess, your teacher Ms. Johanssen asked you to come with her. She escorted you to the guidance counselor's office, Mr, Catello.

"We have some great news for you," Mr. Catello told you. "Since you are doing so well we have decided to promote you to the fifth grade. If you do well there, then you can go onto middle school. Ms. Johanssen was smiling at you.

You didn't want to be promoted. That would defeat the point of this whole thing. You were happy with Kate's life and wanted to keep it. Besides what would Kate do when you swapped back. She wouldn't be able to handle the promotion. You had to stop this.

You used the PAID to swapped the bodies of Ms. Johanssen and Mr. Catello. You used the option that allowed the swapped people to be aware of the change. Mr. Catello even though he was still wearing his business suit and jacket, now had the petite five foot two inch body of your 24 year old teacher. The first indication that something was wrong was when Mr. Catello saw his own body sitting next to him wearing Ms. Johanssen's blouse and skirt. Ms. Johanssen looked pretty silly with Mr. Catello's body in her apparel and makeup. She was now five foot eleven and 220 pounds. Their clothes had resized themselves to fit their new bodies.

"Oh my god, what happened?"

"I swapped your bodies," Alex told them. "If you want to return to your former bodies, I suggest you return me back to my former class. Because until I'm back in the second grade, with all my friends, you will stay in each other's bodies.

She slowly removed the pieces of clothing on her body, looked down at her half-naked body and her face began to heat up. She wasn’t the only one looking at it, however as several other girls looked over with looks of envy, one even stared longer than most and felt her own face heat up.

Christine began dressing herself, putting on some cute shorts, and a matching top not noticing the gaze stealthily sneaking peeks every now and then.

She quickly departed for her class and could barely contain her laughter when she saw some muscular men wearing incredibly feminine clothing and walking around in a feminine manner. So good, ehehe.

The teacher arrived shortly after, panting and blushing. Looks like he, uh she had fun, ehehe. To the class, however they didn’t notice anything unusual about him, other than being a little exhausted from running.
11321111221211.title: Pure fun in the next class.

113211112212111.content:
“We’ll start off with some vaulting,” he said as he setup a table for them to vault over, grinning at what was to come.

Vaulting. I don’t have much stamina, but this shouldn’t be too hard. Several people ran along displaying their skill, while some failed spectacularly. This was followed by a 16-year-old student with thick muscles wearing an extremely feminine outfit, and prancing along towards the vaulting table.

Christine had to momentarily stop time, as she collapsed on the floor laughing, and ended up swapping a couple people’s clothing to exit the time stop.

An attempt by another student ended miserably with him tripping and smacking his face on the table thanks to Christine swapping his clumsiness with someone else’s. He broke down into tears and hung his head down in shame.

A couple of girls shot forward like professional male athletes, running in the same manner as the transformed men had previously done, and flawlessly cleared the obstacle. A massive transformation, as these two had never cleared the obstacle before in their lives.

Christine finally stepped up to the course, and pranced along the track towards the vaulting table. She confidently pushed her arms out, barely managed to hop over the vaulting and panted from exhaustion on the other side. I should give myself more stamina. Nah, that would make things too easy, ehehe.

She sat down as several other people shot through the course, although there weren’t any funny characters among them to amuse her. Her exhaustion eventually fading away as the class moved onto its next phase. This will be fun.
113211112212111.title: Vaulting

choices: To the lunch break (something unexpected happens)
1132111122121111.content:
Christine waited expectantly, as the teacher set up some raised bars and safety mats for the next activity. Some of the people who failed spectacularly in the previous activity had a chill run down their backs.

“For this activity, you are to swing from bar to bar,” the teacher announced. He, or should I say she gave a demonstration as she swung from one bar to the other effortlessly. Whose talent did you steal for that, ehehe?

One of the cross-dressing men gracefully ran onto the course, jumped and grabbed a bar, swung back and forth to build up momentum and launched his face right into the other bar. The teacher laughed and Christine couldn’t help giggling at the bulging muscles under the feminine outfit as he swung on the bar.

His pride crushed, he retreated back into the side-lines, although if it wasn’t for the device’s reality bending effects, then his pride would have been crushed into a million pieces a long time after seeing what uniforms he’s been wearing for the past few hours, while one or two of them would actually enjoy it.

“I can’t do this, it’s too difficult,” one of the personality swapped boys said as he cowered in the corner, and the teacher gave up on dragging him out. They still got a spectacle out of the cowering scene, so they were very satisfied.

“Christine Taylor,” the teacher said. My turn.

She gracefully jumped onto the bar, and started swing back and forth to build up momentum. Surprisingly hard. She launched herself at an angle at the higher bar, but she narrowly missed it and landed in the soft embrace of the safety mat.

She got up and awaited the next event, hoping that it would be as amusing as this one.

“Three laps around the field,” the teacher announced. Oh no, nonononono.

She involuntarily stepped back and sighed as she came to terms with the upcoming event which would put a huge drain on her dreadfully low stamina. And so, she along with the rest of the group walked out to a large field with some trees dotting the landscape here and there.

The group moved to the starting position, before shooting off along with the teacher to complete the laps around the field, which wasn’t helped by the cold winds blasting at their faces. Fortunately for Christine, the winds were blocked by the people in-front as she was fairly slow compared to many of the others.

She hadn’t even completed the first lap, and she was already tiring out with her heart frantically pushing her body to its limits. In her moment of darkness, someone stumbled and tripped onto the ground. That’s when she remembered that there were people even worse than her thanks to the swaps and that no one would blame her too much for having little stamina as she was a girl.

Several boys who tripped started crying and throwing tantrums before running away never to be seen again until the next class. Christine passed the first lap, although it costed her stamina dearly, and she could already feel her legs getting close to giving out.

A couple of girls bowed out of the run, and several more feminised boys made a disappearance when Christine’s legs finally gave out, and she panted from sheer exhaustion. She went over to join the rest of the crowd as the main group continued to run their laps. She was extremely satisfied by it all, however as she got to see the reactions of the swapped people during the event.

She giggled as more cross-dressers bowed out and started bawling uncontrollably. Before long, the only one who was still running laps was the teacher, although the sheer exhaustion could be seen on her face as she completed the third lap. She was a little confused as to why Christine didn’t use the device to augment her stamina, but she didn’t think too hard on it and concluded the class.

Christine followed the rest of the girls to the girls’ shower room to get themselves cleaned up after sweating profusely for the last hour. The mysterious gaze among the girls continued to sneak peeks at her without her noticing it.

She slowly removed her clothes starting with her top and shorts before moving onto her undergarments. She looked down at herself and saw an absolutely splendid naked body. Before completely losing herself to her own charms, she stepped into the shower and started cleaning herself while appreciating her new body.

Sorry Christine, this body’s too good. Oops, I’m Christine, ehehe.

As she shampooed her hair and cleansed her body, the girl from before started sneakily taking peeks at her in the shower, blushing profusely and her heart rate sped up dramatically. No one noticed it, however as they were either too envious of Christine’s good looks to care or were too busy cleaning themselves.

Resisting the urge to make poses in-front of the mirror and saving it from when she goes home, Christine dries herself off and dresses herself in her uniform again. Putting the undergarments back on, and then her top, skirt, shoes and leggings which nearly reach her knees. I’ll have to try some other clothes later, ehehe.
1132111122121111.title: Fitness Madness

11321111221211111.content:
Christine went with her best friend Maria who was, surprisingly enough not been distorted by a device user’s antics to buy some food. She noticed that they jacked the price up by 50%, and begrudgingly paid for it despite it being the most expensive food in the area.

She wasn’t going to let them off so easily, however as she swapped the middle-aged cashier with a pair of shifty eyes with a random teenage girl. Her clothes materialising on him and vice versa, completely unaware that he was wearing a skirt and blouse, or if he did he didn’t care in the slightest.

The two sat down and excitedly chatting about the latest gossip, clothes, and various aspects of their life. Not a single word was said about the device, however as it was better left a secret. Christine glanced at a familiar face in the distance for an instant before returning to her conversation.

The one over there was naturally Karen who happened to be talking about her, “Where on earth did he vanish to?”

“Don’t know, probably swapped with someone for fun, he’ll be back sooner or later when he gets bored,” another replied.

“Ugh, that guy,” Karen responded. Christine couldn’t help giggling when she overheard that part, although Maria just assumed that she was laughing at one of her jokes. Sorry, I’d like to stay as this forever, and the devices lower the chances of that. Who knows how many secrets they hold.

She put a portion of the sandwich in her mouth, and enjoyed the delicious sensation of the tomato sauce and other bits spreading through her mouth. Christi- I like this stuff, ehehe.

A fight erupted on another table between two cross-dressers. Tables and chairs were violently thrown around, and people gathered to watch the fight. Unlike most of the spectators, the device users were barely able to contain their laughter at the absurdity of it all. It ended up with one guy getting knocked out and security guards charging in to break up the fight.
11321111221211111.title: To the lunch break (pure fun)

113211112212111111.content:
The troublemakers were hauled away in handcuffs and peace finally returned to the students eating their daily lunch. The two friends were excited about their trip to the mall later today. It’s going to be soooo much fun, ehehe.

Christine moved onto her soup, slowly lifting the liquid up to her mouth, and flinching at the uncomfortably high temperature. Ow. After that, she used all methods to cool it further, although she didn’t want to draw too much attention to the fact that it’s hot and that she’s being too desperate or anything.

She tried eating it again. The tasty substance filled her mouth, and she savoured the taste before swallowing it. A cheerful grin rose to her face, which helped to lighten the atmosphere, even her friend wasn’t completely immune to it, although she was mostly used to her antics.

She glanced over to the side and grimaced in disgust as a familiar figure walked to a nearby table and started blatantly staring at her. Just had to have him spoiling my day. Mark Tullington. Chris- My most annoying stalker. I’ve even heard rumours he has some sort of shrine in his room. Disgusting. Creep.

He noticed her glancing at him and gave her a smile. To the people around the room who didn’t know about his true face, he seemed like a charming gentlemen, but she knew better and saw the disgusting intent below.

I’ll have to deal with him somehow. Swapping him with the people here is too good for him. What to do… Ah, knowing him, he’ll follow me when I go to the mall. Let’s see him try to stalk me after I swap his body with a toddler’s, ehehe.

Christine continued eating, but her mood was much sourer than before, and Maria noticed. She already knew about the situation going on between the two, but there was little that she could do without evidence.

Not to mention, the guy was a lunatic, he might go after her, if she got in the way. While many don’t know his true nature, she heard the stories of how he had been arrested after sending his old girlfriend to hospital after she voiced the desire to break up with him.

He eventually left the room, but gave Christine a wink and blew a kiss before leaving sending a shiver down her spine and the strong feeling of disgust resurfaced.
113211112212111111.title: Continue

1132111122121111111.content:
Christine finally managed to suppress her rampaging emotions. Mostly disgust and anger. The usual mischievous smile rose to her face as she thought about the next class. Ehehehehehehehe. Maria was confused about why she was so excited, but shrugged it off.

She departed for the next class, arriving at a large pool and headed into the adjacent changing rooms. She started removing her clothes, when she as if something was watching her, but dismissed it as her feeling insecure from the previous incident.

Off came the skirt, blouse, lacy undergarments and other miscellaneous items. And on went the top and bottom half of her black bikini. She took a look at herself in the mirror and felt slightly embarrassed about exposing herself in-front of her classmates, but sacrifices must be made and she departed for her class.

A surge of embarrassment went through her as countless people started looking at her in the outfit, and she promptly jumped into the water to hide her embarrassment. Please stop staring so much.

Her face turned red from the embarrassment and watched as the best part was about to begin. Several men wearing bikinis and one piece swimsuits casually walked out of the changing rooms as if it was perfectly normal. Bulges visible in the bottom part of their swimsuits.

Her embarrassment subsided as she nearly swallowed the water from giggling. So good.

She gracefully swam through the water, but like before, her stamina gave out before she had gone too far and she went up to rest. She watched as the boys swam wearing female swimsuits and enjoyed every moment of it.

The water dripped from her body, and she kind of liked the sensation. Of course, the people who liked it the most were the ones who were sneaking glances at her. She was painfully aware of it all, but barely managed to ignore it in favour of watching the silly antics of the swimmers.

A couple of girls wearing no tops and male bottoms walked out of the changing rooms, although no one gave them a second glance strangely enough, and continued to look at Christine. Oh, come on. You’re still staring at me? Sometimes I wish there was an option to make people notice the changes.

She opened up the device menu and pondered some things. Ah! Of course. I’ve been using clothing swap, but what I should swap is their dress sense, so that they go out and buy opposite gender clothing of their own accord, and it’ll look unusual to other people. That might be a little too cruel, I might have to save it for that guy.

She finally looked over at the teacher who was sitting upon her lifeguard tower, who was shockingly enough the same teacher as in the previous classes. Is she the only teacher in this school? She’s appearing all the time! Ah wait, she probably swapped the schedules to watch the boys here.

The teacher was wearing a red bikini and like before had the form of a teenage girl. She even decided to swap names with that girl and now has everyone call her Sara, as she felt weird having people refer to her by a male name after a couple of classes. The class still thought the teacher was male.

The class eventually came to a close, so Christine walked back to the changing room, droplets of water dripping from her and her bikini. Ah, what a fun day. I’m looking forward to the mall, ehehe.
1132111122121111111.title: More classes

11321111221211111111.content:
Christine walked out of the school with her best friend, Maria.

“I can’t wait. This’ll be so muuuuch fuun,” she said.

“Yeah…!” her friend said.

Little did she know, that hiding in one of the nearby bushes was the infamous guy who she was planning to deal with there, if he showed up. He listened to their every word and decided to ‘accidentally’ run into them at the mall.

The two excitedly chatted, until they separated as Christine first planned to go home to change her clothes, as she didn’t want to go there in a school uniform. She wanted to try wearing something else instead.

She gracefully walked back to her home, even when no one was watching, the habit of doing so thoroughly ingrained into her body and mind. She peeked around to see if the infamous guy was following, but he was nowhere in sight and had already departed for the mall after hearing their prior conversation.

Phew, maybe he isn’t following me today. She happily headed towards her home, walking past various people, some of whom were teenagers who took glances of her. As she walked, the wind threatened to expose her lower body, but she managed to promptly push her skirt back down. Windy days are so annoying.

She looked at her well maintained garden with various exotic flowers and smiled happily at it. Several of the neighbourhood cats ran past, as she walked up to the door and inserted her key. So cute. I should buy one, ehehe.

Christine entered the house, although her new parents hadn’t arrived yet, and neither had her new sister. She excitedly ran up the stairs to her room and closed the door. She ‘played’ with herself for a few minutes, enjoying the sensations of her body, and stripped off to change into a new outfit.

She found an elegant black dress which she always wanted to wear, and some black flat shoes to go with it. She grinned as she looked at it in the mirror. I look amazing, ehehe. I love this dress.
11321111221211111111.title: Continue with Christine

choices: Follow Mark as he starts to stalk boys
113211112212111111111.content:
Arriving at the mall with her friend, Christine bumped into Mark (her stalker) seemingly by accident. Mark made small talk and invited himself to come with Christine. Christine didn't mind. She actually encouraged Mark tagging along as she wanted to make changes to him and it would be much easier if she knew where he was at all times.

Christine's first instinct was to swap Mark's body with a toddler. But she had to find a suitable toddler to swap with. She maneuvered their trek through the mall to places where should could find since a 'person." But when she found an adorable toddler, Christine decided not to swap them. She didn't want the toddler to become an adult physically. It didn't seem fair to the toddler. But that didn't mean that the two year old would have to suffer being in diapers and needing to go through potty training in about a year when he became three. Soon the toddler was in male briefs and underneath Mark's pants he was wearing a baby's diaper. He knew as much about potty training as a two year old and was just as concerned about it. Over Mark's shoulder, the diaper bag that had once belonged to the mother of the toddler appeared. It was full of all the changing supplies that Mark needed when he needed to change himself. Although the style of the diapers where still babyish the size were big enough to fit Mark comfortably.

Christine was happy with the changes she made in Mark, but this didn't deflect from his still annoying behavior. Christine allowed Mark to continue to tag along until a new plan hit her. After a while, an opportunity presented itself. Christine spotted a young woman who was dating a very burly man. He was strong, very muscular and quite handsome. It seemed that this woman had a thing for buff strong men. This was perfect. Christine swapped the preferences of the woman with Mark.

Suddenly Mark didn't know why he was tagging along with Christine nor her friend in the first place. The woman on the other hand, didn't like men of any type. She was strictly for the girls now. The woman would break up with her boyfriend before the end of the day.

"Excuse me," Mark said. "I think I made a stinky and I need to change myself." Mark was using an excuse to separate himself from the girls. Christine noticed that Mark now talked about his 'biological' needs like a toddler would. She didn't consider this, but it made her smile.

"Oh, OK. Should we wait for you?"

"No, you go along, I'm sure I'll see you at school."

"Fine, see you next time."

Mark left the girls and walked off presumably towards the restroom to change.

What happens next?
113211112212111111111.title: To the mall!

choices: Mark decided to shop for shoes
Mark decided he did need to be changed
1132111122121111111111.content:
As Mark starts to walk away, Christine notices a woman in high heeled shoes. This was a bit unusual for a mall in which people do a lot of walking. This woman had a love hate relationship with shoes, she loved them. She truly loved them, she loved how they looked. She loved how they made her feet look. She loved how they made her look taller than she really was. But she hated the pain she had to endure. It seemed that the better the shoe looked, the more painful it was for her to wear. But she couldn't resist them. She had scores of pairs at home. She constantly looked in shoe stores for the next pair she wanted. She didn't even have to buy shoes, it was just great fun to look.

Christine decided to transfer not only the woman's love for shoes to Mark, but also anything that had to do with the woman's feet. Not only was Mark now wearing the shoes that this woman had formerly worn, but also his room was filled with scores of women's shoes in his size. His sock drawer was now filled with women's socks, along with stockings and pantyhose although he preferred to not wear any of those. His feet had also been pedicured.

Christine watched Mark recede into the distance wearing his new shoes, oblivious of any changes. But despite wearing women heeled pumps, Mark's gait hadn't changed. He still walked like a man. Christine chuckled at the way Mark walked with his new shoes.
1132111122121111111111.title: Follow Mark

1132111122121111111112.content:
Chrstine hopped excitedly as she thought about which shop to go into first when she caught sight of Kate and Amanda shopping. Kate was extremely tomboyish beyond belief. Not only did Christine owe her a favour, but she felt sorry for someone who’s trapped in the same position she was. I owe you for giving me this new life, so I’ll help you, ehehe.

Kate snapped out of her confusion and wondered why she was thinking of herself as a boy for the past day or two. This search feature is great. It scanned the mall for someone with a mismatching gender identity. I’m sorry I couldn’t get you a new body, those guys would just swap it back, if only I could make it permanent for you. More importantly, let’s buy some clothes, ehehe.

Christine dove into a clothes store and stared intently at the pretty dresses. Thanks for the money, Mark, ehehe. She looked at the money which she managed to swap away from Mark, most of which was in a piece of plastic with her name on it. Unlike Christine who was practically broke from shopping all the time, Mark had many thousands of dollars which he got from his rich parents.

She looked at a pink frilly dress. Haven’t tried one of these, I’ll buy it. And that blue one. And that green one. That black dress is kinda cute. Ooh, there’s a nice checkered skirt. That tie might look nice with my school uniform. Oooh, look at those shoes, how cute, ehehe.

The two chatted away as they browsed through various items, bought some and after an hour of excitement walked out of that store. Of course, that wasn’t going to be the only one they went to, especially with the generous ‘donation’ Mark made to her.

She caught sight of Mark once again, still wearing his diaper and not so stealthily tailing a muscular man. She took a look at the device and giggled when she saw what it said. That guy’s straight, ehehe. This should be fun. Mark’s personality kicked in and he started inappropriately touching the man landing him a punch in the face. Blood dripped down his face as Christine gleefully watched.

She pondered for a moment and loaded up the device once again. She found a woman in the second week of her pregnancy with the search system. What happens, if I give it to Mark, does he become a pregnant man? Ehehe.

The swap you selected is physically impossible without killing the subject, thus the swap was modified to include the female internal organs necessary (a womb) in exchange for one of the subject’s testicles. As an additional note, without a vagina, the child would have to be surgically removed upon childbirth. We’re sorry for the inconvenience, Miss Christine.

It did a partial body swap? Is that even possible? Probably missed it, ehehe. This is even better. And it gives me many ideas for the days to come, ehehe.
1132111122121111111112.title: More fun at the mall

choices: A great disturbance in the force
11321111221211111111121.content:
Christine gave Mark a few more presents which would come into play tomorrow before flying into another clothes shop, accompanied by her friend, Maria. That pink bikini looks nice. And that black one. That lacy one looks cute. Nice sunglasses. I’ll also buy that black hat. That black ribbon looks nice.

Christine tried on a black bikini and admired her reflection. I look so nice in this, I’ll buy it. I can’t wait until we go to the beach, ehehe.

Christine bought so much that she wiped out most of her funds (many many thousands of dollars) and had to have her parents drive in to help her take it all back home. They were used to it all and didn’t mind in the slightest. Thanks Mark, ehehe.

She bought some vanilla ice cream and savoured the flavour. She eventually departed the mall, not seeing Mark or his antics again since that previous time and arrived home. I’ll have to go to the pet store sometime, maybe Mark will give me another ‘donation’, ehehe.

She caught sight of her 12-year-old little sister who had red hair and also looked fairly beautiful for her age, although Christine obviously didn’t have a strong attraction to her own sister.

“We went to the mall today, so I got you some gifts, ehehe,” Christine said.

“Really?!” her sister replied.

“Yeah,” Christine said before showing her various dresses, skirts, etc. in her sister’s size.

“You’re awesome,” her sister replied before hugging Christine. Her sister tried some of the clothes on, “How do I look?”

“Great,” Christine replied. They had lots of fun for a couple of hours before Christine headed up to her room to get some rest for the next day. She studied the device a little before stripping out of her dress and putting on something more comfortable to sleep in. She fell asleep and had many sweet dreams.
11321111221211111111121.title: Christine's Little Sister

113211112212111111111211.content:
The light from the Sun fell onto Christine’s face as she slept and enjoyed many happy dreams. She slowly woke up and cutely yawned. Another day of school. She got dressed for school, trying on one of the cute black ribbons and ties she bought the previous day, ate some breakfast with her family including her little sister and departed for school.

The summer sun beat down on her, luckily she was wearing a skirt and fairly thin clothing, unlike the boys who sweating profusely as they went on their own journey to the school.

Christine arrived at school when she caught sight of Mark being intimate with his new boyfriend and wearing a pink frilly dress, his bulging muscles visible. Unlike most of the transformations, Christine made sure it wouldn’t be seen as ‘normal’ by taking advantage of some of the loopholes in the device.

No one dared to anger Mark after he smacked down one poor fool who mocked him. He was still talking like a toddler and wearing his diapers underneath his dress. He didn’t have the slightest shred of shame as he saw his actions and attire as perfectly reasonable. The others disagreed.

The teachers considered forcing him to wear the standard school uniform, but they didn’t want to anger his father who had connections to people on the school board and just left it like that. Mark’s become the village idiot, ehehe. New options opened up. Is it because I use the device a lot? I’ll have to ask Sara.

Christine entered the building when she caught sight of Sara, the transformed teacher who also had her own device. “I assume that thing with Mark was your doing,” she said with a wry smile.
“He deserved it,” Christine responded.

“True, he never would have been accepted into this school, if it wasn’t for his parents,” Sara replied.

“Sara, do you have options for swapping body parts on your device?” Christine asked.

“No, am I supposed to?” Sara asked.

“I don’t know, but it appeared on mine after swapping a woman’s pregnancy with Mark and it automatically gave him her womb,” she replied.

“You did what? Hahahaha. Mark’s a pregnant man. How ironic, after impregnating many women, he became pregnant himself. Thanks for the tip, I’ll try it out,” Sara replied.
113211112212111111111211.title: Christine waking up

1132111122121111111112111.content:
Christine was heading to music class when she heard the headmaster’s voice on the PA system, “Attention everyone, we have recently realised how archaic and discriminative our dress code has been over the years and have decided to abolish it. You can now where whatever you want within reason. Casual. Formal. You can even cross-dress, if you wish.
Over the years, Euphoria High has been a strong supporter of gender equality, so it’s only natural for us to make this decision. Thank you for listening.”

Hahaha, they changed the dress code just for him? And to think that the headmaster was such a hard-line traditionalist before, ehehe. Christine giggled at the announcement and the teacher gave out a chuckle.

A short distance behind them and also heading to the same class was David. He was a weak and effeminate boy who loved cross-dressing, as such he was stifled by the archaic dress code for years, and was ecstatic at the new rules.

He slipped away from the class before it started to change into something more comfortable. Little did he know that he was going to receive a device in there which would let him go further. Much further.

Christine arrived at the music class with the usual people showing up, the cross-dressers, the personality shifted ones, the teacher Sara, etc. She even overheard them talking about Mark behind his back, as if his attire was shocking. What made it more ironic is that they completely overlooked their own attire.

This place is slowly turning into ‘Cross-dress Academy’, ehehe. She sat down with her friend and giggled as she looked around at the usual people. First up will be singing, let’s swap some of their voices around, ehehe. Got to love the body part swaps, I just have to select the vocal cords.

She turned around to notice David coming in wearing a blouse and a skirt. He was extremely effeminate for a boy and it was hard to distinguish him from a real one, asides from some hard to disguise aspects like the muscle tones, Adam’s Apple, etc.

Most importantly, she noticed that he was a PAID user. He didn’t have one yesterday, it must have arrived today, ehehe. A new swap buddy. It says he’s still male. Hm. Could he have received it a moment ago and didn’t have the chance to swap yet?

As soon as she thought that, she noticed time stop for a few seconds, taking the time to speak to them, “I take it that you’re PAID users too?”

“Yeah, good to have a new friend in the club, ehehe,” Christine replied.

“I’m shocked that there are so many cross-dressers, I’m guessing you swapped them? Strangely enough, I just accepted it as perfectly normal yesterday, this device is incredible,” he said.

“Yeah, it’s amazing, ehehe, what should I call you, ‘David’?” she asked.

“Let me think. There are some nice options here. How about… Anna?” he said as he initiated the swap turning himself into a cute red haired girl. Have fun, ehehe. Anna excitedly sat down and looked down at her new body. Luckily, she was at the back of the room, so she was able to mostly hide what she was doing to her body.
1132111122121111111112111.title: Onto the music class

11321111221211111111121111.content:
The singing part of the music class began with the students demonstrating their talents one by one in-front of the entire class.

Christine laughed as she heard deep voices echoing out from the girls, some of the transformed students screeching like strangled cats and high pitched feminine voices coming out of some of the boys. It took me a while to find those screech like voices, there aren’t too many people in this city who sound that bad, ehehe.

Her voice was naturally fairly melodious and enchanting. Everyone in the class had happy smiles as they were soothed by her beautiful voice. Anna’s voice wasn’t too bad, although it wasn’t as amazing. It’s really easy for her to fix that problem with the device. It’s time for the best part.

Several of the students started oinking like pigs, some started barking like dogs, and some started meowing like cats. Turns out I can swap humans with animals, including their languages. For whatever reason, everyone just seems to think of it as a normal foreign language, probably the device doing its thing.

One of the students started licking himself like an animal and the other device holders were unable to contain their laughter. The class looked at them weirdly and they just brushed it off as remembering a joke they told each other earlier. They too started to come up with new creative ways of using the devices.

Christine fiddled with the device and remotely selected Mark who she saved on her list. Ehehehehe.

Meanwhile, in another class, Mark sat in his frilly dress when he pushed the chair aside and sat down on all fours. He felt all his knowledge of the Spanish language slip away and be replaced with the dog language turning him into the one true dog whisperer.

The teacher was shocked by him sitting on the floor, shrugged and just accepted it as part of Mark’s insanity. He continued his lecture on quantum mechanics, when one of the device users in the room had enough and replaced all of his knowledge on quantum mechanics with fashion.

He gleefully started teaching them about all of the latest fashion trends, while Christine was looking forward to seeing Mark at lunch for the first time in her life.
11321111221211111111121111.title: Start the class

choices: Meanwhile, on a distant planet, the creators of PAID appeared
113211112212111111111211111.content:
The music lesson continued, although a number of students were finding it difficult to follow the instructions of the teacher, as their ability to speak English had been replaced with a number of nonsensical languages. I won’t be too mean, I’ll fix you guys, ehehe. I’ll leave Mark like that forever though.

A flash occurred and they were suddenly able to speak English once again, albeit with the vocal cords of various animals.

Christine tapped into her musical knowledge to play a beautiful lullaby on her harp, while some of the male students cut their fingers on the strings and started breaking down into tears.

The music lesson came to an end and they departed to their next language. Spanish.

Christine took the opportunity to ask her classmates a couple of questions, “How long has Mark been like… That?”

“He’s been cross-dressing for a long time, but he’s never had the balls to do something like that. Hah, balls. It’s ironic saying that,” a student replied. Ah, I see. That’s how their memories were altered, ehehe.

They arrived at the Spanish class where Sara was once again teaching it, it turns out that she liked being with her test subjects, I mean, ‘favourite students’. Switching jobs where ever necessary. Unfortunately, or fortunately, she was going to be teaching a different set of students for the next one.

Ehehe, I wonder how Mark’s doing. He used to be one of the top Spanish students and now he can’t remember a thing, ehehe. Christine managed to speak Spanish on some level, although you could barely call her ‘fluent’.

Anna and the teacher were surprisingly fluent, although they probably stole that talent from someone else. Something which Christine was thinking of doing.

While that was going on, Mark was still barking in the other class and had to start relearning Spanish from scratch. The teacher wasn’t amused by his lack of knowledge after studying at the school for several years, but he didn’t dare bring it up, otherwise he might be fired.

His life was about to change when a glowing sphere suddenly phased through the ceiling as if it didn’t exist and appeared before him. A metallic band appearing on his arm and him learning of the school’s true reality, ‘Hahaha, I understand now. That was a brilliant move, Mark’s been a horrible person for ages, he got what he deserved.’

The classes eventually came to a close and Christine went to get some food, accompanied by her best friend, Maria who was fairly average in the previous class. Not disastrously bad, but not amazing either.
113211112212111111111211111.title: More Christine.

1132111122121111111112111111.content:
Christine went to grab some food when she saw various talking animals. The other students accepted talking animals as something that was perfectly normal, except the device users who had looks of shock on their faces. Christine couldn’t help but giggle at their reactions.

“Ah, hello Christine,” a stray black cat said with a student’s posh accent.

“Hey, Mr. Tiddles,” Christine responded. This was the stray who liked wandering the school and who the students named Mr. Tiddles. How cute, I need my own talking cat, ehehe.

“This is a fine day, is it not?” he said.

“Yeah,” she responded and held back a giggle.

As she walked into the room, she saw Mark walking on all-floors wearing his frilly pink dress and diaper. He turned to the people staring at him and said, “What the hell are you looking at?” and they turned around and pretended to ignore him.

Thanks to him walking on all-fours, the surrounding people could see up his dress, the wet diaper ready to be changed in full view.

Christine had to freeze time before laughing ceaselessly at him. The other device users did the same. I wonder if I could swap his face with a pig’s face. I could name a pig ‘Ganon’ and swap their names, ehehe.

Unlike Christine who had the benefit of being Christine, Anna who had a much smaller swap was nervously walking around and trying to get used to her jiggly parts. The surrounding people misinterpreted her as a shy girl.

Christine sat down with her good friend, Maria and Anna joined her as a fellow device user from the same classes.

“Let’s go to the pet store earlier, I want my own bundle of cuteness around my home,” Christine said.

“We already have a bundle of cuteness,” Anna said to Christine which made her giggle.

“Sure, and then we could go to the mall afterwards,” Maria said.

“Yeah,” Christine said. I wonder if I should make another withdrawal from the ‘Bank of Mark’, ehehe.

Mark started eating out of his bowl (he instructed the teachers to put all his food in a doggie bowl with Mark written on it) like a dog, the horrible smell of poop spreading from his diaper and making the surrounding people back away from him, “Argh, that horrible smell”.

The other device users had a confused look on their faces when they saw students who were speaking with a strong animalistic accent (thanks to them having animal vocal cords), and then they put two and two together with the talking animals they saw earlier and ‘got it’.

Unfortunately, many of them hadn’t unlocked the body part swap yet, but other plans came to mind on how to deal with the people who used to bully them (other than making them wear dresses, screwing with their personalities, etc.), other enemies, and people who generally annoy them.
1132111122121111111112111111.title: Talking Cats and Mark's Endless Humiliation

11321111221211111111121111111.content:
Being a girl is amazing, I’ve dreamt about it for years, but I never thought it would actually happen. It’s only been a few hours, but living as ‘Anna’ is really fun, although nerve-wrecking. This body feels completely different.

Anna walked with her new friend Christine over to the swimming class, while trying to imitate her movements to move more gracefully. She stopped? Is she helping me? She’s awfully friendly to me.

"We have a lot in common, ehehe," Christine muttered too quietly for Anna to notice.

She felt the air go through the now empty void below, slightly impeded by a thin layer of fabric and her upper body jiggled as they walked to the next class. It feels so weird, not bad, but weird…

Anna nervously walked into a changing room filled with other teenage girls. She noticed one looking intently at Christine. Molly… She doesn’t have a device.

The group undressed with Anna having some slight issues with her bra, before quickly managing to figure it out. She looked down at her own body and felt slightly aroused before snapping out of it. I’ll have plenty of time for this at home.

She nervously put on a pink bikini, while Christine easily put on a black one as if she’s been doing it her entire life. She walked out with Christine and felt almost naked at how it exposed her body. She was extremely embarrassed at the gazes flying her way, little did she know that most of them were actually looking at Christine and she happened to be standing next to her.

Christine gracefully walked to the pool, Anna was a little less than graceful. They found their new teacher, he’s the one who received a device during Mark’s class. He was now tall and extremely muscular, almost like an idealised superhuman. They noticed the metal hoop around his arm. Another one.

She noticed Christine gesture to not tell him too much. He turned around and noticed the two with their devices. He briefly smiled and started the class. She doesn’t want him to know too much, what could she be thinking? Well, according to the device, she is a lot smarter than me. She must have noticed something.

She dove into the water. She felt the sensation of the wet substance over her entire body, even the parts the thin fabric normally protects. Ur, this feels weird. And tingly.

Christine gestured to her as she spaced out. Ah right, I’m supposed to be swimming. She shot off towards the other size of the giant pool, before swimming back to the other side. Not much stamina as a girl, huh. Little did she know that her stamina was far above Christine’s.

She giggled along with Christine as the cross-dressers arrived with the visible bulges in the bottom half of their bikinis. Even she didn’t go that far when she was a boy. The teacher who was now clued into this world’s true reality also chuckled at the absurdity of it all.

They shot across the pool, some almost drowning and others like professional athletes which would almost look impressive, if it wasn’t for their outfits. Christine jumped in, gracefully swam across the pool, but ran out of energy before she could go for another lap. She has less stamina than me…

“Uhh, Christine. Why don’t you improve your stamina?” Anna asked.
