“That would be too easy, I can’t improve everything or it’ll get boring, ehehe,” Christine replied.

The last one to jump into the pool was the teacher. Jumping off the lifeguard’s tower, sending a big wave in all directions. He shot forward at an ungodly speed without the slightest shred of exhaustion and managed to complete a whopping five laps without using his time stop power.

‘Show-off,’ Christine and Anna thought. Half of the class was in shock at his incredible athletic talent and he stood before them like an invincible god, “Wow, that’s incredible,” half the class said.

“Don’t worry, if you train every day, you’re bound to reach my level,” he said which made the two giggle as he stole that talent from someone else. Probably an Olympic Athlete, if they had to guess. Where he found one on such short notice is anyone’s guess.

The class came to a close with that explosive climax and he walked towards the two girls, “You also have these metal hoops. I assume you have that swapping power?”

“Yeah,” the two said.

“Heh, I thought as much, to think that I’ve been living among all these people distorted by that power and I never realised it, I’ll see you two tomorrow,” he said.

The two swapped phone numbers (not a magical kind of swap, the normal kind) and had a private conversation away from the crowds.

“Why did you want to hide stuff from him?” Anna said.

“I don’t think he would care too much for your transformation, Anna. It’s better to stick with those sympathetic to your cause, ehehe.” Christine said, not mentioning her own swap in the slightest.

“Good point,” Anna said.

“Information about the device is a strategic resource. If handled wrongly, it could be used against us,” Christine said with a serious expression.

“Right,” Anna replied.

“Enough serious stuff, ehehe. I’m going to the pet store with my friend, Maria. Want to come?” Christine asked.

“Sure,” Anna said.
11321111221211111111121111111.title: The next class

113211112212111111111211111111.content:
Chapter Note: Apparently, I got a little carried away with the previous ones and added a type of swap I really shouldn’t have (animals). Mark’s still insane though, I’m sure Christine could find a lunatic to swap him with who loves eating out of dog bowls.

Meanwhile in a high tech biology lab, a dishevelled blonde woman in her late 30s was peering through a microscope when a shining ball appeared before her, and produced a metal band on her arm, “What the hell is going on?”. She looked at the options and started cackling madly like a witch.

Her colleague, Tristan Taylor burst into the room, “What on earth is going on?”

“I have a device called a PAID which can swap people’s bodies, personalities, lives, etc.” she replied.

He stood there with a blank look on his face, she repeated the same thing but he remained in some sort of trance, “Do you know what a PAID does?”

“No? Never heard of it,” he said.

“Alright, nevermind,” she replied. I see, it’s trying to hide all knowledge of its existence. Now that I think about it, it might be better that way. Let’s try to deflect attention from the weird questions.

“How are your daughters doing?” she asked.

“Christine and Emily are doing really well, thanks,” he replied.

While that was happening, Christine and Anna met up with Maria to go to the pet store.

Christine excitedly shot back and forth between the cages like a kid in a candy store. Cute. Cute. Cute. They’re all cute. Which one should I grab? That’s a tough one, ehehe.

The other girls giggled at her over the top reaction, she eventually settled on two small Maine Coon kittens who excitedly scurried around the box and made a withdrawal from the ‘Bank of Mark’ to cover it. She also bought some food to feed them. Come, my lovely bundles of cuteness, ehehe.

To keep them happy, she bought the most expensive scratching posts, beds, etc. with the money she swiped from Mark and almost had trouble carrying it all back. The other girls were also a little excited about the little bundles of cuteness she was carrying with her.

She laid down the scratching posts, and beds in the house. She also made sure that the water bowls, food bowls and litter boxes were setup for their use and departed for the mall. Again. As the house was empty, she took the time to make a phone call informing her family about the new acquisitions. They didn’t mind and were actually excited about the new additions to their family.

After that, they departed for the mall where they saw Mark scurrying around, and it brought a grin to her face when she remembered the years of him hiding in the shadows watching her. I’m sure there are some great traits to give him in the lunatic asylum, but I fear for my safety, if I go to a horrifying place like that. I’ll pass on that, ehehe.
113211112212111111111211111111.title: Back to Christine

1132111122121111111112111111111.content:
“Uhh, Christine?” Anna said.

“Hm?” Christine replied.

“Aren’t those students from our class?” She said pointing them out.

“Ah, the cross-dressers,” Christine giggled.

“Wasn’t it a little mean to do that to them?” She asked.

“No, ehehe. They bullied the weak and powerless for years, they got what they deserved, ehehe. Of course, Mark deserved a far worse fate, ehehe,” Christine replied and then her eyes narrowed as she spotted someone in the distance, “Steve Long, he’s your bully, right? Why don’t we play with him? Ehehe”

“He mocked me for cross-dressing for years, I’ll have a lot of fun with this,” she replied pulling up her device, “What to pick…? Oh, I know, hehehe,” she picked the option to replace his male organs with female ones, however something goes wrong and he ends up entirely female.

“What happened?” She asked.

“Urm, it alters reality, so it’s as if he’s always had those. If he’s always had those, then the hormones would shape his body from the very beginning,” Christine said.

“Looks like it unlocked a Gender Swap option,” she replied.

“Nice, what else do you want to do with ‘her’?” Christine asked.

“She’s a lesbian, right?” she asked.

“Yeah, she’s still attracted to girls,” Christine replied.

“Let’s make her absolutely disgusted with female clothes and have her wear male clothes instead,” she said as she fired up her device again. The woman shrieked after seeing what she had on and ran into the closest male clothes store.

The two met up with Maria once again and headed into the nearest clothes store, Christine obviously wasn’t going to lose the chance to do so, now that she had a virtually infinite supply of money. Now that I think about it, doesn’t the device make me immortal? I could just hope from body to body when I grow old, ehehe.

Little did she know that this was the very reason why the female scientist was laughing madly when she got the device. It was like the holy grail landed in her lap, it would lead her to the pinnacle of her field of science and make her name eternal. Or so she hoped, but how could such a powerful device be comprehended by mere humans?

Christine tried on various articles of clothing. Dresses. Tops. Swimwear. Undergarments. Skirts. Bottoms. She looked good in just about anything, but her tastes were much more refined than that, she didn’t want to wear anything less than the best. She had an inexhaustible supply of money after-all, why would she wear shoddy clothes?

She also decided to get some new clothes for her newly transformed friend, Anna who was fairly used to wearing female clothing, but was still embarrassed about her new body, and the undergarment side of things. She’s so cute when she’s embarrassed, ehehe.
1132111122121111111112111111111.title: Continue

11321111221211111111121111111111.content:
I noticed that I don't give you many actual 'real' decisions, so I'll toss this here.

Do you want it to be Happy-happy Christine and Co. (lots of swap fun and stuff) or everything going wrong for them in the story?
11321111221211111111121111111111.title: Just a little fork in the road

113211112212111111111211111111111.content:
Christine headed back home after another exciting afternoon at the Mall, she happily grinned as the bundles of cuteness greeted her at the door, she picked them up and enjoyed the lustrous texture of their fur which was even softer than hers.

Her father was out for an all-nighter at the lab, but her mother and sister were present, equally ecstatic about the new additions to the household. Little did she know that even the lab wasn’t beyond the influence of the devices. It’s only natural, however as she’s never seen any device users’ asides from the ones at school.

She cuddled with her bundles of cuteness before drifting off into the land of dreams, a new day awaiting her.

Meanwhile in a high tech research lab, the blonde scientist was examining her device…

This device is incredible, when I use the body swap option between two subjects, their body structures are identical to the other prior to the swap down to the genetic level. The obvious theory is that they somehow have some mechanism for transferring minds, and then they swap the positions of the bodies to create the illusion of each transforming.

I’ll need additional data to verify this. Fortunately, I don’t have a lack of test subjects and they don’t suspect a thing thanks to the device rewriting people’s memories. I then simply have to take a sample of their DNA for a study on ‘inherited diseases’ or some other nonsensical excuse.

On the subject of the device ‘altering reality’, it likely uses the same mechanism for altering people’s personalities, traits, etc. to change their memories.

The hard part is the transformation of the clothes and generating the ‘fake’ history. Perhaps, they have some sort of computer simulation which simulates what life might be like, if those changes were in play. Unfortunately, computer science isn’t my field, and I don’t want to experiment on myself quite yet with a dangerous alien device.

I also need to confirm if I’m the only one who has it, or whether there are others out there. I wonder who made it? The government? No, the government isn’t capable of something like this. Even if they were, they wouldn’t give it out to a random person like me. Possibly, aliens? A civilisation so advanced that something like this is a piece of trash and it gives them research data on us?

The blonde scientist pondered over how the device worked, but couldn’t come up with a solid theory without more data. Little did she know that the existence of the Body Part Swap feature which she hadn’t unlocked yet wrecked one of her theories. The device more mysterious and elusive than she ever could have imagined.

Let’s go through the options again. Personality. Body. Life. Personal Info. Personal Info. Hm. I’ll need to go to a place with more test subjects, I’m severely limited with the ones we get in this lab. It looks like I’ll have to take a trip to the mall tomorrow.
113211112212111111111211111111111.title: Happy-Happy Christine and Co.

choices: The first class of the day
1132111122121111111112111111111111.content:
Christine yawned as the morning sun penetrated her room, a bundle of cuteness sleeping snuggly next to her. She turned to the bundle of cuteness and instinctively hugged it. So cute, ehehe.

The creature opened its eyes before drifting back to sleep as she rose up from her soft mattress. She yawned and started getting dressed for yet another day. She was about to dress herself when she remembered the new dress code, and so she pondered over what to wear.

She eventually settled for an exotic blue dress, tying her hair up with a blue band to go with the outfit, and descended down the stairs. She heard her sister giggling in her room as she played with one of the bundles of cuteness. Have fun, ehehe.

Her father was passed out on his bed after yet another all-nighter at the lab, so he didn’t go down for breakfast. She slowly ate her bowl of cereal, as she listened to her mother excitedly chat about how much she loved the bundles of cuteness. Just wait until they grow, ehehe.

She stepped out into the street and noticed that it wasn’t anywhere near as hot as the previous day. Luckily, it wasn’t too windy either, so there shouldn’t be too many issues with her dress, and as far as her personal safety went, the device was the ultimate weapon to use against people without one.

Little did she know that there were many many people with the devices in the world. Of course, this is only natural, why would such devices only appear within a certain area?

A black car with tinted windows sped past her and she took a glance at it before looking back. The vehicle had no signs of slowing either. The blonde haired scientist was sitting inside the vehicle and swapping the personalities of the other drivers as a kind of social experiment.

She didn’t notice Christine at all though, not yet at-least, she was too focused on the experiment, noting down the results on her computer. To prevent rivals from breaching its security, it was permanently disconnected from the internet, the data was fully encrypted with a single key press preventing others from accessing it physically and other fail-safes were present.

These weren’t measures she came up with, of course. They were ones the lab came up with to prevent corporate espionage. If any random kid could walk out with their valuable data, they would be completely screwed over.

Of course, they never thought that a life changing device which could pull the codes from someone’s mind could exist, naturally she’s the only one who knows the ones on her computer.

As she thought about the device, a couple of cars sped past Christine at a clearly illegal speed. They horned at each other, Mark’s middle finger visible in the window. Bad Mark, don’t you ever learn? Ehehe. I’ll have to punish you again, ehehe.

Christine was nearly back at school when an expensive car (one of the ones from before) stopped outside the school gates, and Mark crawled out. I have to find a more suitable car for you. Pink and girly should do, ehehe.

Mark had his backpack strapped to his back, pink and girly as he liked it. Within which was a drill for him to create a hole in the men’s changing room for him to stare at his desired lover without them suspecting a thing. In fact, he used to do the same thing to Christine when she was changing all the time.

He thought he was being stealthy, but she knew full well about what he was doing, but couldn’t do a thing thanks to his family’s influence. Everything changed with the device, of course. With it, she’s like a god compared to an insignificant insect like Mark.

Something appeared different about his appearance today however. He seemed to be wearing make-up, it didn’t even enhance his appearance, but made him look hideous like a ghost. This was the result of him annoying the scientist with his terrible driving.

He gave a gesture to the teachers. They walked towards him with a chair, lifted him onto it and carried the chair into the school. This way, he avoided the slow process of crawling entirely. Bad Mark, you’re not supposed to avoid being punished, ehehe.

A transformation swept through his body and he had a powerful sensation of seasickness as they carried the chair. One teacher was unlucky enough to have the contents of his stomach dumped all over them. Poor teacher. I’ll fix it.

Reality shifted and the one who Mark vomited on changed from the teacher to a bully who had been tormenting students for years. He was absolutely outraged, but didn’t dare to anger Mark, as he could easily destroy his social life.

Anna arrived shortly after, catching a glimpse of Mark being removed from the chair, as he was now incapable of handling the shaking of the chair and resuming his usual crawl. She quickly found her original body and switched back to Christine’s surprise.

“Don’t worry, I’m not staying like this,” he said before inverting his gender and creating a body far prettier than her previous one. The one she swapped genders with was naturally yet another known bully. Unfortunately, the bully kept her original personality and started tormenting other girls.

“Wow, it’s like you were always meant to be a girl,” Christine said.

“Of course,” Anna said before swapping the names around to get her new name Sally.
1132111122121111111112111111111111.title: The Next Day (Day 3)

11321111221211111111121111111111111.content:
Christine was changing for her gym class in the changing rooms as always when she felt a sinister gaze behind her. She quickly stopped time and found a boy using the hole which Mark left years ago to watch her change.

“What is it?” Sally asked.

“He’s peeping on us,” Christine replied and Sally was shocked, “I know exactly how to deal with him, ehehe. If he wants to watch girls change so badly, let’s make him into one”

“Great idea,” she replied and the boy’s body started transforming as the transformation started taking effect. Replacing the boy was a cute girl wearing a blouse and skirt. She also teleported into the changing room to join them in changing herself, although she kept sneaking peeks at the other girls. Still interested in girls, ehehe.

While that was happening, Mark was peeping through a hole into the men’s changing room with a huge smile on his face. Little did he know that someone was watching him from afar with binoculars. It was none other than the blonde scientist.

Mark Tullington. The idiot I ran into this morning. I give a 90% chance that someone else has changed him. Closer to 95, perhaps? I refuse to believe that he was naturally born with a womb, condemned to a life of diapers, happens to be a cross-dresser and gets seasickness whenever he doesn’t crawl naturally.

Only a complete imbecile would think that. Intriguing. Very intriguing. To think that someone could give him a womb. There must be features in the device which I don’t have access to yet. Wait, what’s this. Haha. I get it. That’s how they did it.

Time stopped across the school, Christine momentarily felt it before a swap came into effect and time returned to normal. Another swap occurred immediately afterwards to reverse the initial one.

Intriguing. Very intriguing. I unlocked a new type of swap. Appears that one of my theories were wrong, not like I expected them to explain this device to begin with. I’ve gotten a couple samples of his DNA, just in case it’s changed him on the genetic level, so that he can pass this trait onto his offspring.

I can’t stay here for too long, otherwise it might be viewed as suspicious by any possible rivals. I already know that other people have the devices from Mark’s Transformation and I don’t want to tempt fate. I’ll investigate further into this school tomorrow.

The blonde scientist walked into her car and drove off at high speed in the direction of the lab with several of Mark’s DNA samples. She was in such an urgent rush to get the samples analysed that she didn’t even do any social experiments with the surrounding drivers.

Back in the changing room, Christine walked out with her newly transformed friend, Sally. Christine quickly realised how truly horrifying this class would be, when she saw a bunch of people lifting weights to build up their upper body muscles.

The transformed teacher Sara presided over it and effortlessly picked up heavy weights as if the weight didn’t exist.

“Who are the new students?” She asked and Christine froze time to respond, “It’s Anna. Well, her name is Sally now. The other one is a boy we turned into a girl since he was peeping on us”

“Ah, I should have expected as much,” Sara replied and time returned to normal. Several people across the school noticed time stop and took the time to have their own discussions in the frozen time.
11321111221211111111121111111111111.title: The first class of the day

113211112212111111111211111111111111.content:
Being a girl is as amazing as always, but being in my own body rather than another girl feels much… better. Almost as if this body is a lot more compatible with me. If only I could get my girl self’s memories, there must be some way. No, I’m fairly sure there is a way, I just need to find it like with the other new swap options.

Sally picked up one of the weights and started lifting it. She struggled with some of the heavier ones and decided to go for the lighter ones. I could… Swap? No… Christine might be right; the power of the swaps would go to my head… Besides, she said something horrifying about it. Random swaps.

She looked over to Christine who was struggling even more than her and having to resort to lifting up even lighter weights. She’s kinda cute when I think about it. She’s a girl though… And so am I

They continued lifting weights until Christine was absolutely exhausted, Sally went to join her and the rest of the class continued. I can’t ask her about the random swaps yet… Sara doesn’t look like a bad person, but we still can’t talk about this in-front of a class.

The two giggled as they watched several of the usual men in ridiculous looking outfits like a ballerina outfit, dresses, etc. trying to lift the weights. One of the personality shifted ones started throwing a tantrum about not being able to lift the weights.

Christine’s delicate muscles slowly recovered as he laid back and drank water out of a cute bottle to replenish that lost sweating. Drops of sweat rolled down her body and she was anxious to have a shower to get the horrible sensation off her. Sally had similar thoughts.

Sara was like a cactus in a desert, the exhaustion had next to no effect on her and she kept showing off by using heavier and heavier weights. Christine rolled her eyes at this and Sally had an envious look on her face.

After the class ended, the two went to have a shower. The warm water washed away the accumulated filth and a comfortable sensation spread throughout her body. The same happened to Christine, although Sally was less familiar with her new body, so it was more of a surprise.

She dried herself off, savouring the sensations of her new body and got dressed. She was already starting to get used to wearing her undergarments, while Christine had a lifetime’s worth of experience, so it wasn’t a problem for her to begin with.

The left the changing room and met in a more private place. They even used the device to search for any people who might be nearby, but there were none.

“Can you tell me more about the random swaps?” Sally asked.

“You want to hear about the random swaps? I don’t know too much about them myself, but be careful with swapping. Very careful. I have an idea of what the purpose of it might be though,” Christine said.

“What?” Sally asked.

“To turn you into someone else and collect data,” Christine said.

“Someone else?” Sally asked.

“You don’t want to lose yourself, if you can help it, please be careful,” Christine emotionally said.

“I understand… Don’t worry…” Sally replied.

“O…Okay…” Christine said.

“Should we tell Sara about this?” Sally asked.

“No, while I doubt she would leak it, I have a feeling she’s not completely satisfied with her body,” Christine said.

“Not satisfied… You might be right…” Sally muttered.
113211112212111111111211111111111111.title: Continue

1132111122121111111112111111111111111.content:
Christine listened attentively as the physics knowledge poured into her head, while Sally was absolutely bored of her mind and tried to cram the information in regardless. She was extremely tempted to swap her physics knowledge, but didn’t want to risk a random swap swapping something random with someone else over something so petty.

While that was happening, Mark kept running laps around the field on all-fours, attracting looks of disdain from his fellow students. Some of the device holders took note of him, and sniggered. They had a good idea of what happened, how could they not? Only a fool wouldn’t be able to tell.

One of them was an athletic teenage boy who had a body approaching that of an Olympic athlete and the other was Karen who still had no clue where Alex vanished to and doesn’t really care that much anymore. Why would she when she has the ‘power of the gods’?

With the device, she gave herself the most exaggerated body imaginable, little did she know that the exaggerated proportions which were supposed to make her the most beautiful woman in the school had actually backfired by making her look somewhat inhuman.

Among the device users was the janitor who decided to leave the school, swapped lives with a multi-millionaire and was now living in a big mansion with maids tending to his every whim. Little did he know that his excessive abuse of the device would eventually lead to a ‘glitch’ giving him the personality of a little girl.

While Christine and Sally learned about vectors, the scientist was driving as quickly as she could back to the lab to get the samples analysed. One of the other drivers decided to give her the middle finger, so she decided to swap his car with the bike of a nearby cyclist.

A bike suddenly materialised in the middle of the road and he swerved to the side to avoid getting hit by a car, confused as to why he was riding a bike in the middle of the road. The former cyclist was thinking the same thing as his new car appeared on the pavement.

While that was happening, several glowing balls flew towards a big blue planet, looking for more humans to snare with their powers. They narrowly missed a collision with a weather satellite and dove down into the atmosphere where they narrowly avoided a commercial airliner.

A child on the flight screamed about seeing the shining lights, but his parents simply dismissed it as childish nonsense. Several armed men tried to hijack the plane, raising their guns at the cabin crew, but then time stopped.

The pilot ran up to them, disarmed them, and tied them up before restoring time back to normal. Cheers erupted across the plane, reality shifting so that everyone saw a scene out of an action movie of him effortlessly dancing around and disarming them all.
1132111122121111111112111111111111111.title: The other chosen ones

11321111221211111111121111111111111111.content:
The mentally drained Christine emerged from the classroom, with a Sally who was in desperate need of something fun after the long ordeal. Even the teacher was bored of that class and decided that he would swap his way out of teaching it from now on.

Even their beauty was slightly diminished as the enthusiasm slowly returned to their faces, by the time they went to get their food, they had reverted back to their usual cheerful selves.

Christine grimaced as she saw a disturbing scene at the corner of the room and readied her device against the fool who dared to ruin her lunch after the long ordeal she had to undergo in the previous class.

“Hand over your money,” a boy who was a couple of years younger than Christine demanded from a weak scrawny kid.

“O…Okay…” the scrawny kid replied as he reached for the money in his pocket, a tear in his eye which only caused more laughter to erupt from his oppressor.

“Ugh, one of these clowns disturbing my lunch,” one teenager said while smoking a pipe without anyone seeing it as vaguely abnormal. A dozen device users activated their devices at once to distort the bully into an abomination.

He ended up wearing a sleeveless purple dress showing off his long hairy legs, a tiara, a bikini under the dress, a ball gag on his mouth, a vibrator in a place best left unmentioned, and he kept checking his body for body parts he never had as he now thought that he was a woman. Christine took notes on what she could do to Mark from their antics.

The formally scrawny kid transformed into a muscular giant. The tables turned as he landed a punch on his oppressor who was now extremely timid and broke into tears. Several people looked at him in disgust and didn’t make the slightest move to go over to help him.

Christine did the unthinkable by restoring the cashier back to normal, although she wished that she could make people aware of the changes. She bought a tasty bowl of soup which she slowly consumed bit by bit, savouring the taste as it permeated her taste buds and the glorious sensation spread through her mouth.

She corrected her transformed friend on the proper mannerisms which were drilled into the depths of her psyche and happily chatted despite a dark shadow tugging at her mind. Her paranoia at work. Too many secrets. Secret after secret about this device are unveiled every day. It’s scary, but I’ll do everything I can to protect our happiness.

What other secrets could it hide. Ah. I should try it. But not here, not in-front of them, I don’t know who my enemies are. It might be possible for me to swap memories. Possibly awaken memories? Memories of ‘this’ reality would be helpful. Would I be able to watch someone’s memories like with the other aspects?

Christine pondered things with a strange yet cute expression on her face which Sally quickly picked up on, “Is something wrong?” she asked.

“N…No…” Christine replied, gesturing for them to discuss it somewhere more private, away from the prying eyes of the others. Her thoughts quickly reverted back to the usual fun and cuddly ones.

While that was happening, the scientist was getting the DNA samples analysed. Tch, it’ll take a few hours for me to get the results back. I know that it’s better than waiting a few weeks like with the older equipment, but it’s still really annoying, especially with these mysterious people running around.

The body part swap was interesting. I reckon that there are other secrets hidden within this device. Possibly a way to swap genes rather than body parts? It would really help me in unlocking the hidden secrets of the human body. While the device hides its existence, I should still be able to publish research on the human genome.
11321111221211111111121111111111111111.title: More Mysteries

113211112212111111111211111111111111111.content:
Christine dusted off her dress before rising up for the next class. Unsurprisingly, she had to go to the changing rooms once again. This time, she didn’t have anyone watching her, not through the peephole at-least. Her more feminine watchers on the other-hand had no need for peepholes.

She slowly took off her dress and related footwear, not realising that the ‘show’ was making several hearts race with excitement. Sally was pondering a certain swap, although she wondered whether she should go through with it. Her body was fully female, but her mind had certain… defects.

They both slowly fitted themselves with more appropriate outfits for dancing. The same sort of clothing as for the gym class, but a clean set. It’s only natural however. How could you possibly expect them to wear dirty clothes drenched in sweat from a gruelling exercise session?

Unlike their favourite outfits, the clothes for the gym class were extremely plain, although it didn’t fail to show off their figures. It didn’t mean that they liked them, however as they preferred their pretty dresses and skirts.

They slowly walked out of the room, Sally finally beginning to get more of a hang of the new mannerisms which Christine was helping to drill through her head. Christine grinned at her progress, her mind closer to the ideal which Sally pursued.

At first, they felt the gazes of the other students, but they gradually managed to zone it out, thinking about the more exciting things. They quickly caught sight of Sara who was still in her female teenage student form. She really seems to like that body… I hope she doesn’t get bored of it…

Christine wasn’t a complete fool, although she wilfully ignored many things. It was still impossible for her to ignore someone who she spent much of her time with. She noticed the strange gaze mixed with Sally’s expression from time to time. Ah. How cute. I wouldn’t mind it either way, but I feel closer to you like this, ehehe.

Christine began her entrancing dance, gripping the minds of the audience like an enchantress. The mesmerising jumps and movements of her cute feet. The mannerisms and twists of her upper body. The gusts of wind swaying her soft hair back and forth. Her body swayed as she finished her beautiful dance and the entire class started applauding.

She jumped to the side with a grin as she winked at Sally to get onto the stage next to dance for her. Despite what one might think, Sally was actually extremely talented at dancing, in both his body and in her original male body. This body more so, which served to deepen her muscle memory when it came to dancing.

It was likely that if she ever unlocked this body’s full memories, she would probably surpass even Christine in the field of dancing. That day might even come soon. She stepped onto the dance stage and began her beautiful dance. She expertly swayed her body around, expertly doing the moves without the slightest mistake or lack of grace.

Her legs equally beautiful under her mesmerising dance. Although she didn’t reach Christine’s level, she still got a high level of attention of the class with several people placing her higher in their hearts than before this class. Wow, she’s really good at this, ehehe.

Even Sally herself was surprised at how easy it was and how graceful her movements were. She didn’t let this surprise appear on her face or to get in the way of her dance however. She still made graceful moves which moved the hearts of the audience, her friend grinning at her moves.

She ended her dance with a spectacle and received a grand applause. She excitedly walked down the stage to her friend and got even more excited when she saw her grin.

“I loved your dancing,” Christine excitedly said.

“Thanks, yours was great too,” Sally grinned. Christine had a slightly awkward look on her face before her grin appeared once more. No seriously, your dancing’s really awesome. I cheated. Maybe? Does it count as me? Why wouldn’t it? It feels wrong having skills from two mes’, ehehe.

Christine giggled and praised Sally as a less talented student rose to the stage. He wore a splendid dress which showed off all of his curves. Or more accurately, his lack of curves and manly figure. A bulge clearly visible but not too prominent on his dress. Long socks covering half of his hairy legs which only served to highlight the other half.

W…Wait… He’s wearing that for the dance? Wasn’t he supposed to change? Did someone swap gym clothes with other clothes? Ah. Sara. Ehehe, good one.

She caught sit of Sara who was grinning as the boy’s grand performance was about to begin. Luckily for him, reality had shifted for most of the people in the room, thus he wasn’t completely humiliating himself, although it’s unknown how long this would be the case for.

Her awkwardly jumped around, not the slightest shred of grace present in his dance nor the elegance which Christine used to mesmerise the crowd. His hairy legs and dishevelled hair on his head swaying in the wind. A portion of his hairy chest was visible in the upper part of his dress, along with his hairy armpits on his sleeveless dress.

Christine’s face distorted as the urge to laugh ceaselessly rampaged through her cute body. Sally was no different, her legs trembling as the urge to laugh slowly overcame her reason before time stopped entirely and they all collapsed on the ground laughing with no end in sight.

The teacher joined them in this. They eventually regained their composure and continued watching the hilarious dance. The momentum from the swaying occasionally lifting up the lower part of the dress and showing parts best left unmentioned to the entire class.

While Christine’s laughter wasn’t as unbridled as before, she still let out a giggle as she watched him do the most humiliating dance imaginable while thinking of it as something perfectly normal, not catching onto the strange looks and giggles coming from the three girls.

This wasn’t the end of it either, as several more boys rose to the stage, although most of them didn’t wear a flamboyant dress like the first. One clumsily tripped, exposing his rear end and started throwing a tantrum like a six-year-old child. This had the consequence of producing an unusually mature child over in the junior division of the school.

Other students who clumsily tripped broke into tears and slowly walked off the stage in shame. Sara naturally took the opportunity to show off her moves, her elegant dance catching the attention of the crowd, although she shockingly wasn’t able to match up to Sally or Christine.

There weren’t any dancers more talented than them, thus she couldn’t improve herself further as device users can’t target device users without their permission. Not that she minded, as it was still extremely graceful and skilful. Far beyond that of the rest of the class.

The lesson finally came to a close, the girls enjoying every second of it, they were still excitedly chatting and giggling as they walked out of the dancing hall putting together their plans for tonight. This is going to be so much fun, ehehe.
113211112212111111111211111111111111111.title: Dancing Classes

1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.content:
The blonde scientist, Prof. Diane Willson stood over a dissected corpse with a slightly excited and annoyed expression on her face. She placed it back in the morgue and washed the filth off her hands. She could never get used to how messy dissections can be. Unlike amateurs, she wasn’t the slightest bit squeamish, but it was still messy.

She laid back in one of the comfy executive chairs which she swiped from one of her superiors with the device, and looked at the genetic analysis which had finally finished.

I didn’t expect one of my test subjects to die in a car crash, how annoying. Luckily, they signed a contract with us. It appears that the body swap gave him a completely female brain, although they behaved contrary to all of its directives.

From the IQ tests done on her prior to the accident, it appears that behaving contrary to their true nature puts a strain on the brain, thus lowering their intelligence quotient (their IQ). The same results have been seen in certain brainwashing techniques.

I’m curious as to what results may occur with the body part swaps, although fatalities are extremely inconvenient with the number of samples available to me. The results of the DNA test also came in. It appears that Mark with a womb has a genetic structure different from his original genetic structure.

The DNA is consistent across his entire body from the womb to the other parts, so there’s no sign of it being a foreign object. It’s likely that his descendants will also possess their own wombs, unless the swap is reversed.

I’m curious as to what would happen, if a male mind was to be placed in a female brain without the strange brainwashing which seems to be the case in most swaps. Unfortunately, it’s unlikely that I’ll be able to gather this data without the co-operation of other device users and it’s unlikely that they would want to be my guinea pigs.

It’s a fairly low priority piece of research, thus it’s not too particularly important. Perhaps, there’s a mechanism for removing some of the brainwashing in the device. Research in that direction might be more productive than co-operation.

As planned, I’ll go to the mall to gather more test samples, although I might have to lay low just in case any potential rivals appear. Luckily, the device takes the form of a metal band, thus I can simply cover it up to prevent them identifying me as a rival.

The scientist pondered and typed the results of the experiment into her computer. The device locked the information into the dark depths never to see the light of day again.

While that was happening, an excited Christine emerged from her dance class with various plans whirring around her head, her cute shoes bouncing off the pavement as she made her graceful steps. Sally imitated it, but couldn’t quite reach her level yet.

“Come over to my house, Sally. We’ll have lots of fun, ehehe,” Christine giggled.

“Sure,” Sally replied.

“You too, Maria,” Christine called out to her other friend.

“Sure, why not?” Maria replied. They giggled as they strolled off into the streets where Christine jumped up and down with excitement at the thought of having her friends over.

Right as they turned the corner, a slim man with a knife in hand and a suspicious moustache walked out. “Hand over all your money,” he shouted. Maria gasped in shock, Christine grimaced and Sally was slightly amused by how foolish he was.

He didn’t quite understand the strange look on Sally’s face and repeated his demand in case they didn’t quite understand the situation. “Hand over all of your money,” he said while moving the knife in a threatening manner.

An annoyed expression rose to Christine’s face as time stopped entirely. How dare you disturb my fun. Sally already knew it would happen and watched expectantly as Christine kept smacking and kicking the man over and over in various locations.

He stood perfectly still, almost like a statue until time was restored and all of the forces were applied to his body at once. His face bloody and Christine’s clothes not dirty in the slightest. Maria’s memories shifted to Christine single-handedly pulverising the enemy, “Wow, that was incredible.”

Christine shrugged and giggled as she knew that the device came up with a ridiculous scene out of an action movie rather than what actually happened. Some would even say that the man suddenly collapsing after being stared down by Christine would be even more frightening than the fake action scene the device came up with.

The trio continued their journey to Christine’s home while excitedly chatting about the defeat of the vile villain who was absolutely traumatised by the event and decided that he would never underestimate his enemies again, even if they did look like weak and vulnerable teenage girls.

Christine shrieked and jumped to the side in terror as the neighbour’s dog ran up to the gate and started barking ceaselessly. Scary…

Her terror was quickly washed away when she saw the new paw shaped mat outside her front door and she grinned. She pulled her key out of her bag, a paw shaped key chain attached to it, raised it up to the front door, turned it and the lock clicked giving her access to the interior of her home.

The bundle of cuteness excitedly jumped towards her and she caught it in her arms, almost losing her reason in-front of her guests from the incredible wave of cuteness which was washing over her.

The guests giggled at it and had similar thoughts about the bundle of cuteness. They even had thoughts of getting their own bundles of cuteness, as they didn’t want to be separated from it. How could they live without it, now that they’ve been introduced to the good life?

Christine cuddled the bundle of cuteness before landing on a comfy couch which wrapped around her beautiful body. The cuteness of the bundle of cuteness adding to her own, a scene of perfection to those around. Sally grinned as she sat down next to her, looking down at the small creature.

Even Maria could barely resist the urge to start petting it, it’s transcendent beauty ensnaring even her heart. Christine rained down endless love upon the small creature, petting it and hugging it endlessly. A sight which would send countless boys into a mad obsession and would drive others mad with envy, wishing that it could be them receiving that treatment instead.

Some boys might even be willing to sacrifice their own manhood or become cats themselves in order to receive that treatment which transcends all others. Unfortunately, they would never get this chance.

Christine almost falls into a trance as she admires the soft fur, hair which surprisingly enough surpasses even her own hair in softness. A feat nearly impossible for mere humans, but easily achieved by this bundle of cuteness.

The bundle of cuteness eventually decided to retreat for some food, Christine pouted at the loss of her furry comrade and sighed as she resumed excitedly chatting with her two friends.

“Want to stay over?” She asked.

“Sure!” The two replied and that was settled.

Christine smirked at Sally as a devious idea came to mind, she ran up, and returned with various pieces of clothing. “Try them on, ehehe,” she said. Sally sighed before grinning as she remembered that Christine had enough clothes to clothe the entire neighbourhood from her adventures at the mall.

The size was slightly off due to their different figures, but it still fit surprisingly well, exposing much of Sally innate beauty. Even Christine was impressed, although it didn’t reach her level. I can’t wait until we go to the beach, ehehe.

Sally tried on various pieces of clothing, and even Christine joined her as she admired the various pieces which she had bought on the spot in the mall without trying it on for long. She could afford to do so, however thanks to the Bank of Mark. Bikinis. Dresses. Skirts. They tried them all and a plan formed in Christine’s mind for what they would wear and do at the beach.

She excitedly giggled, the others not having the slightest suspicion as to what she was truly thinking. They merely thought that she was just enjoying their company. To some extent, she was.

The bundles of cuteness peered at them curiously, confused as to what these strange garments were, their simple minds not understanding the intricate depths of fashion and beauty. Despite that, they admired their mistress who lavished praise and attention upon them.
1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.content:
The trio entered Christine’s neatly kept room with various closets, wardrobes, a giant comfy bed which she was considering replacing with a softer one and various signs of her many hobbies. The room was extremely elegant and slightly cute, like one would expect from her.

My room looks so… Plain… I never had money before to make it look nicer, but thanks to the Bank of Mark… Ehehehehe. Should I buy it at the mall or online? Hm. Shopping with my friends sounds like more fun, ehehe.

While it looked plain and ordinary to her, Sally was looking around in wonder and excitement, as if it was a clothes shop. Her imagination was sent into overdrive when she imagined her sleeping with Christine, and she tried to shake the thoughts out of her head. Where are you, my bundles of cuteness…?

Next to her bed was a smaller bed with a paw shaped symbol on it. Christine glanced at it and said, “I got a bed for you, Sally, ehehe.”

Sally rolled her eyes and said, “The best bed should go to the host, you should sleep in it.”

“Aw, but how could I force one of my guests to sleep in my boring old bed?” Christine joked.

Christine pulled out some discs and pondered what to watch. Romance? Nah, it might unsettle Sally, I know what she’s constantly thinking of, ehehe.

“What do you want to watch, Sally?” she asked.

“How about the Invasion of the Body Snatchers?” Sally said.

“Ah, the film where they have some supernatural power which lets them steal people’s bodies. Interesting choice, ehehe,” Christine winked at Sally.

They sat down for several hours, Christine giggling at certain parts of the film due to the irony, to the dismay of Maria who didn’t understand the joke, but she brushed it aside and decided to ignore it.

“What would you do, if the body snatchers were real, Maria?” Christine asked.

“That would be really horrifying. You wouldn’t know who to trust,” Maria said and Christine sat there with a thoughtful expression as something went through her head. Her expression quickly returned to normal and she continued excitedly chatting.

Christine was in the middle of a joke when a pillow landed right in her face, she turned her head, and grinned at Sally who had already armed herself with a second pillow. How could I forget this? Ehehe. Great idea!

Christine rolled to the side, dodging the incoming pillow, quickly scrambled for one of the ones on the floor and launched it at Sally. Sally wasn’t able to dodge in time and had a piece of soft fabric hug her face.

Christine was about to follow up with another shot when one hit her from behind, Maria standing there with a grin on her face. Christine said, “Traitor…” and Maria shrugged before readying another projectile.

Christine wasn’t going to be fooled again, as she leapt onto the bed, and throwing one at point blank at Sally’s face. Sally broke her concentration when she was about to ready another with a big affectionate hug.

Christine was about to respond when Sally’s stomach rumbled, and she giggled at it. Sally was extremely embarrassed at her stomach doing such a thing, and Christine led the group down for some food.

She looked down at her meal and pondered something before elegantly eating the meat with small mouthfuls. Each movement was filled with grace and elegance. Sally tried to imitate it, but a day or two of being a girl wasn’t sufficient for her to truly imitate Christine’s lifetime of experience.

Maria ate the food slightly gracefully, but she wasn’t anywhere near Christine’s level, it was almost as if Christine was descended from a noble household. It didn’t take much food before Christine decided it was enough and retreated with her friends back to her room.

The three excitedly chatted about their day, with Sally accidentally letting some things slip which she shouldn’t have like the cross-dressers humiliating themselves at the school. Maria acted confused about it and assumed that she had missed something.

“We should go to the beach tomorrow.” Christine said and a shiver of excitement went down Sally’s back.

“Let’s do it!” Sally shouted with excitement.

“Sure, I don’t see why not,” Maria replied and Christine got even more excited. Yes! This will be so much fun, ehehe.

They watched various other movies, chatted for hours, played various games, etc. before Sally yawned from her tired she was. Christine grinned and invited them onto her bed. Despite being tired, Sally started acting extremely nervous and blushed slightly at the thought of it.

Maria on the other-hand didn’t noticed anything wrong about her behaviour and didn’t see any problem with sleeping on the bed at all. “You’re so cute, Sally,” Christine whispered into Sally’s ear and her face heated up.

The three retreated into the bed sheets and even Sally who was extremely nervous eventually sank into the world of dreams. Her dreams were filled with the excitement of being a girl, but every now and then, a dream with Christine in it appeared.

Meanwhile, the scientist, Diane was driving up to the mall and her mouth dropped in shock when she realised what was going on. There aren’t any open parking spaces? Grr… Oh. I know. She activated the device and her car was swapped with one neatly parked in a parking space. The car was now blocking the road and all of the other drivers were horning at it.

Shortly after that, a tow truck showed up to tow it away, following by Mark showing up seconds later chasing it to get his car back. Hahaha, it’s him again. How ironic.

She walked into the mall where she found loads of people shopping, eating and wandering around. She tried to do a swap, but it didn’t work for some reason. Diane tried to figure out why it wasn’t working when she was greeted by a screen saying, “Installing Updates 1/2382.”

Installing updates?! What. How could you be installing updates? Aren’t you supposed to be a ridiculously advanced godlike artefact? Oh, fine. I’ll just go to a restaurant. I hope this thing will be finished by then.
1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.title: The Sleepover!

1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.content:
A scrawny beggar in his thirties slowly woke up behind a trashcan, and was about to search it when a light descended from the sky forming a metal band on his arm. He started cackling like a mad man and stared at the sky.

The Great God of Transformations has finally answered my prayers, bestowing a divine blessing upon me. I am honoured to be chosen as his prophet. I will lead this world into a new era, an era where all the people of the world recognise the divine might of the great god.

Even with a tiny portion of his divine might, I’m capable of impossible acts like stopping time and overwriting our very ‘reality’ with a new history. This is truly the power of the gods. And I will be the Church of Transformations’ High Oracle.

While that was happening, Christine yawned as she opened her eyes, two people on either side. One of whom was leaning on half her body and completely out cold. Naturally, it was Sally who unconsciously moved around in her sleep.

Christine gently lifted her off her body and rose up from her bed. She smiled as she spotted the bundle of cuteness who was snuggled next to Sally. Finally, it’s the weekend, ehehe. Being around those device holders… What’s it called? PAID? Anyway, being near those guys was a real pain. I don’t trust them. Don’t trust them at all. Especially, since I’m Christine, everyone wants the best body.

How to deal with them, if they come after me… Dealing with normal people is easy, just stop time, but they’re immune to the time stops. Firearms, perhaps? It’s very likely that they’ll rely heavily on their devices and physical strength. I could intimidate them with a better weapon… What if they’re armed too? So complicated. I don’t suppose I could make a gender bender alliance? Ehehe.

Christine stood there pondering, when she noticed one of the people under the blankets moving. Sally gave out a yawn and looked over at her. She had a blank expression before she became extremely embarrassed about the whole situation. Maria was out cold.

Christine started undressing and wearing extremely casual clothing including jeans. Sally was embarrassed once more before joining her in changing. They picked out swimsuits for today’s adventures and Maria joined them in this a few minutes later.

They descended down the stairs, narrowly dodging a bundle of cuteness who was foolishly sleeping on one of the steps and grabbed a light breakfast before departing for the beach. As they walked out the house, the bus-stop came into view and they waited for the next one to arrive.

They waited for fifteen minutes and Sally started to get really impatient. Christine wasn’t much better. What’s taking so long… A bus suddenly appeared from around the corner and stopped to let them on. There was only five or so people other than them and the driver in the bus.

After paying for the ticket, they sat down on the closest seats and started giggling about how fun the sleepover was. The bus shot past the blonde scientist, Diane’s car which was going in the opposite direction. Diane ended up having to go home without any fruits thanks to the unexpected update and had only just woken up.

Christine had a slightly grim expression on her face as several thoughts ran through her mind. Should I tell Sally about…That? What if she doesn’t trust me for hiding it? I don’t want to think about it. That dark era. The nightmarish memories embedded in my mind from that body… I don’t want to be that. I don’t even want to think about it. I’m Christine… Right…?

Sally noticed Christine’s distraught appearance and gave her a big hug. She didn’t know what was going on, but she wanted to help her friend. Christine said, “Sorry.”

“Don’t worry about it,” Sally replied. The two hugged for several minutes before they stopped and returned to their usual happy mood. They were really looking forward to swimming around, especially Sally who was curious as to how it would feel with her new body.

As soon as the bus reached the half-way point, it stopped outside a fairly ordinary bus stop. Two people departed and a sinister looking teenager got on-board. He glanced at a scrawny kid sitting at the back and a smug expression rose to his face. Not another one of these…

He swaggered over to the back and feigned surprise as he said, “Haha. To think that I’d see you here. What a coincidence,” the scrawny kid cowered in terror. This only served to stoke the flames of his arrogance and sense of superiority.

“I’m taking a trip to the beach today. I assume you are too? Haha. How convenient. I’ll have a lot of fun with you there. We need someone to act as our slave after-all,” he said as he sat down next to him. The kid descending further into terror. I can’t let him do this. What to do… Ah!

Christine fired up the device. Time stopped as always, but she saw something strange, “Update Complete. You now have more control over what specific swaps do.” Update Complete? They added new features? Ehehe, this should be fun.

Christine noted a little girl sitting with her mother at the front of the bus, and found the perfect thing to swap with the bully. She selected the desire to wear the girliest clothes imaginable, noticing additional options pop-up.

I could either make it so that he’s always done that. Or… I could make it so that he’s suddenly decided that he wants to do it. I’ll choose the second, it’s more exciting that way, especially with how confused he and his friends will be, ehehe.

Time returned to normal, and Sally whispered to Christine, “What did you give him?”

“You’ll see very soon, ehehe,” Christine said. The bully looked down at his outfit in disgust, unable to understand how he could have ever liked wearing such a disgusting set of clothing. He couldn’t wait for the bus to arrive at the beach, so he could buy a pink bikini and a matching dress.
1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.title: Day 4! The Bus to the Beach!

choices: Is it a bird? Is it a plane? No, it's a PAID!
1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.content:
The bus screeched to a halt outside of a bus stop with countless people wandering the streets outside. The three girls excitedly descended down the steps and they shot towards the beach while the swapped bully headed into a small clothes store with his minion trailing behind him.

The two stepped into the clothes store where he pulled the guy into the woman’s section and he had a look of despair on his face. Oh no, he’s not going to humiliate me further by making me wear a dress, is he? Just when I thought it couldn’t get any worse. Why me? How could I have such terrible luck to run into him of all people on the bus?!

He was even more shocked when the bully started trying the dresses and bikinis on himself, but he didn’t dare laugh, otherwise he’d have to say goodbye to his teeth. The bully sneered at him in disgust at how ‘terrible’ the bullied kid’s clothes were, so he left him alone expecting him to be absolutely humiliated.

After trying on dresses in several colours, he grabbed a pink bikini, tried it on and paid for it before putting it back on. A bulge visible in the lower portion and his rippling muscles visible on the upper body. What the hell is going on?! He’d never be caught dead in something like that. And he was sneering at me in disgust the whole time. That’s what I should be doing!

The shopkeeper naturally showed understanding for the boy’s unusual hobbies, she understood that there weren’t many who had the courage and confidence to embrace their inner desires like he did. Many would be too scared for strangers laughing and sneering at them, but not this boy. She was even impressed by how indifferent he was to it, as if wearing it was something that everyone did.

Of course, if it was someone like Sally who was actually into that, even in her previous inferior state, then it would be understandable, but this guy would have been appalled at the thought of doing something like that the hour before. Alas, that’s the power of the device.

He walked out into the streets, walking in an extremely masculine manner which contrasted with the pink bikini covering a tiny portion of his body. It was so eye-catching that everyone in the street turned and looked at him.

Several hushed voices commented on it, while those who blatantly mocked him earned a punch in the voice knocking out several teeth. No one dared to do so after that first example, as he began to say, “What the hell is wrong with these people? Are they blind?”

The bullied kid was naturally smart enough to stay silent, even after he voiced the question and he was slowly beginning to feel more humiliated by hanging around someone in that outfit than the fact that he was being forced to act as his slave for the day.

He marched into the beach where he saw various cute girls running around including Christine and Sally. Christine curiously looked over at him for an instant, inwardly praising herself for how the crowd was sneering at him.

Sally felt a little bad for a cross-dresser being mocked, but then she reminded herself that it’s his punishment and that he was never like that to begin with and started inwardly laughing too.

Christine grabbed some ice-cream from one of the stands, savouring the taste. The delicious taste of vanilla spreading throughout her mouth. She was still in her casual wear, as she hadn’t had a chance to change yet, especially since she wanted a front row seat to the show which would unfold.

Despite not having a device, Maria was also curious about this guy wearing a bikini clearly showing his muscular frame and bulge. He assertively walked forward as if he was the ruler of the world to a congregation of other boys who were shocked at how he was dressed.

“Did he lose a bet or something?” one muttered to the other.

“Probably,” the other muttered. They didn’t dare say it at a higher volume, as they didn’t want to rub it in and earn themselves a punch in the face each. Little did they know that he chose to wear it and was loving every second of it minus the people who he thought was mocking him for no reason.

The two boys pretended that things were perfectly normal with an awkward expression on their faces. They looked behind him and jumped on something to change the topic saying, “I see that idiot is with you. A slave, I’m guessing?”

“Yeah, I ran into him on the bus,” he said while adjusting his bikini top which was flat over his hairy chest. He continued, “Why don’t we go pick up some girls?”

The two had extremely awkward expressions on their faces, normally he would have no trouble doing so, but with an outfit like that it would be a miracle if they found one, or so they thought. They nodded regardless and went with him to a couple of 18 year olds with highly developed bodies.

He started saying his usual lines and was shocked to see when they weren’t working as well as usual. The two girls looking at him in disgust, giving him a prompt refusal and retreating from him.

He moved onto Christine’s Group as Christine was incredible in her own right, when she decided that she didn’t want to deal with him. She fired up the device, making him decide that he now likes muscular men.

He looked at Christine again and decided that she wasn’t attractive in the slightest. He was confused, as she looked incredible a few seconds ago but brushed it off and scanned around the beach for a new target.

He shot towards a bodybuilder and started making out with him. His friends were utterly horrified at this, but they still forced themselves to think that it was some sort of bet. Or was it? They were beginning to question it themselves, but they wouldn’t jump to conclusions until they investigated it back at school.

It was coincidentally the exact same school which Christine and the other two girls go to, but this was only natural as it was a fairly big school in Christine’s area.

The bodybuilder wasn’t too amused at his attire or at him assuming that he was into men and gave him a solid rejection. The bully naturally didn’t dare to tangle with a bodybuilder, so he immediately retreated right away. He was confused as to why no one found him attractive anymore. Didn’t they treat him like a god in the past? What could have happened?

It was at this moment where he heard someone shouting, “There he is!” and several police officers ran up to him accompanied to one of the people whose teeth he knocked out. They pinned him down and dragged him to the police car still wearing his pink bikini and holding a bag holding various dresses. They looked down on him in disgust and sped off towards the police station.

Christine giggled as the car took him away and she found a place to change in with the other two girls. She removed her casual wear and slipped on her bikini. The other two did the same. They threw their original clothes in the bag before heading out.

Sally felt extremely exposed in these clothes, she thought that she had gotten used to it after the swimming classes, but that was mainly because she was dealing with people who she was already familiar with for the most part. This time, she was surrounded by countless strangers. Some of whom looked at the three girls, especially Christine.

She felt the sensation of the soft sands under her feet and felt the light wind flow over her exposed areas. As she got used to it, she began to realise that she really enjoyed this and her time at the beach had only just began.
1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.title: The Beach! The Bully and his Pink Bikini!

choices: Christine follows Johnathan and his mother
1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.content:
Authors note: This is an alternate ending to the last chapter,

...................
As soon as the bus reached the half-way point, it stopped outside a fairly ordinary bus stop. Two people departed and a sinister looking teenager got on-board. He glanced at a scrawny kid sitting at the back and a smug expression rose to his face. Not another one of these…

He swaggered over to the back and feigned surprise as he said, “Haha. To think that I’d see you here. What a coincidence,” the scrawny kid cowered in terror. This only served to stoke the flames of his arrogance and sense of superiority.

“I’m taking a trip to the beach today. I assume you are too? Haha. How convenient. I’ll have a lot of fun with you there. We need someone to act as our slave after-all,” he said as he sat down next to him. The kid descending further into terror. I can’t let him do this. What to do… Ah!

Christine fired up the device. Time stopped as always, but she saw something strange, “Update Complete. You now have more control over what specific swaps do.” Update Complete? They added new features?

Christine noted a little girl of about four years old sitting with her mother at the front of the bus. She was going to swap the girls desire to wear extremely girly apparel, but looking at the girl's expression and the stern look on her mother's face, Christine decided that it wasn't the girl's idea to wear such a girly outfit. She suspected the girl would prefer to wear some leggings and a t-shirt so she could play, but her mother had commanded her to wear what she was wearing. So instead you swapped the relationship of the girl and the bully with her mother.

The mother seeing what was going on, commanded, "Johnathan Lester Wright, what are you doing?"

The bully whose name you now knew as Johnathan turned when he heard 'his mother's' command. "I'm not doing anything," he said sheepishly.

"Don't lie to me."

"I was just talking to my friend here."

"Johnathan!"

"I was just...uh uh..."

"You were trying to bully that boy!"

"Yes, Mom."

"Yes what?"

"Yes Mommy."

"Johnathan what have I told you about bullying?"

"You said it was wrong."

"I want you to apologize."

"I'm sorry."

"Not to me, to the boy."

Turning back to the boy Johnathan said in a small voice, "I'm sorry."

"For what?" the mother reminded him.

"I'm sorry for trying to bully you."

"...and"

"...and it'll never happen again."

"Good now come sit next to Mommy," Johnathan complied. Continuing, "Johnathan, this has all got to stop. It has gone on long enough, but it has to stop now."

"I promise I won't do it again," Johnathan said plaintively.

"No not just that, everything. From now on, you are going to act like a proper young lady. I am going to see to it." What Johnathan's new mother meant was that he was going to make him act like a proper four year old young lady should act.

"I'll be good, I promise. But don't do that."

"No it's too late. There are going to be a lot of changes. The first thing we will do, is to fix your hair. I'm going to take you to the stylist. They will add extensions to your hair until it grows naturally. I am also going to color it blonde and braid it into proper pig tails or something more appropriate for you."

"I don't want...." The mother's stern look quieted Johnathan.

"You will get them and you will like then too!" the mother demanded. Then a little more quieter almost to herself she said, "and look at those clothes. They are just awful. Even for a boy. But from now on you won't be wearing pants again. It's dresses for you from now on." Johnathan wanted to say something but he knew better than to interrupt his mother. "You and I are going to be spending an awful lot of time together. I have so much to teach you.....and your first lesson is how to sit. A young lady sits with her legs crossed." Johnathan crossed his legs like a boy would. "No not like that," then she instructed him how to sit like a young lady. This was very uncomfortable for Johnathan on a way that it wouldn't have been for the woman's 'real' daughter since unlike her, Johnathan had a penis and testicles between his hips. But when she put him into the proper sitting position, Johnathan didn't move no matter how much it hurt. "Better," she said.

The mother started to criticize everything Johnathan did to make him conform to what she thought a proper four year old young lady should be. Several stops later, the mother lead Johnathan off the bus, they had found the exit to her hair salon.

What happens next?
1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1132111122121111111112111111111111111111.content:
Christine wanted to find out how it all turned out so she followed Johnathan out of the bus. His mother took his hand and led him to a beauty salon. Inside the salon his mother did all the talking to the attendant.

"What I want," she said, "is for you to color his hair a very pretty shade of honey blonde and lengthen his hair down to just below his shoulders. Then braid it into pig tails and tie them off with a pink ribbon."

The attendant thought that the woman was overbearing and shouldn't treat her son like that, but the woman was the customer and so she kept silent. "I can do that," is all that the attendant said.

Johnathan tried to speak for himself, "but I don't want to have pig tails," the boy whined. This was all that was left of the bully's self-confidence when he was around his mother. His mother gave Johnathan another stern look which cowed the boy for a second. "But, but.." the boy continued when his mother looked away.

"Stop whining, or I'll give you something to whine about,' the mother told him. Johnathan was as helpless as the woman's former four year old daughter. If he kept it up, he knew that should could put him in a time out, swat his butt or even give him a full spanking right here in front of everyone. The attendant just watched the scene. It wasn't her business.

Once the boy was subdued, the mother asked, "How long will this take?"

"It will take two hours. No more than that."

"Fine, I have to pick up some things. I'll be back before then."

"OK."

Then to Johnathan, "You will be good while I'm gone if you know what is good for you."

Johnathan was then taken to a chair for the attendant to work on his hair.

After school, Christine decided to visit Mark to see how his life had changed. Christine went to his home in the 'good part of town.' There she saw his large lovely home in a gated community. It was in fact very impressive. Christine rang the door bell and soon the door was opened by one of the domestic help that keep the place running.

"Hello, I am here to see Mark," Christine said.

"Who may I say is calling?"

"I'm Christine, I am a friend from Mark's school."

Christine was led to Mark's room. Christine noticed Mark's mother sitting in the den watching some TV. When she got to Marks' room the door was closed. The 'maid' knocked on the door and then entered.

"Shameka, what is it?"

"Someone to see you sir."

"Show her in."

Christine was about to enter the room when she thought, wouldn't it be great, if Mark's name was Shemeka? By the time she had entered, that was his name. Shemeka was messaging his boyfriend. "What do you want?" Shemeka said rudely.

Christine entered Shemeka's room. She had never been here before, but she assumed it had changed a lot. The decor was a mixture of a highly girlie room with closets full of dresses and all sorts of feminine finery and a toddler's room with supplies for little babies including diapers and toddler toys. There were posters of hunky boys on the walls that were painted in bright babyish colors. But despite all this there were still elements that a teenaged boy lived here too.

"Shemeka, I was wondering how you were. I mean with being pregnant and all."

"Like you care."

"I do. I really do. I know it must be tough to carry a baby at your age."

"Oh carrying it is noting. But when the little poop machine is born that will be another thing. The servants will probably be doing most of the work." Christine realized that Mark now Shemeka had no maternal instincts at all. She didn't think that would be good for the baby, so Christine swapped all of Shemeka's mother's maternal instincts with Shemeka. Christine didn't think she had too much judging by the way that Mark turned out. But it was still better than it was. Shemeka's attitude changed immediately. He was suddenly looking forward to having his baby. Continuing he said, "I am going to start looking for the things I need. My baby will stay in here with me for at least six months. I want him close. I'm going to have to buy a crib and a playpen and all sorts of things for the baby. I am goign to have a baby shower in a few months. Can you come?"

"I don't know."

"Of it'll be great. I don't have many female friends. I want you to come." Shemeka in reality didn't have any girl friends. Being a bully who had no interest in girls sexually anymore he didn't have much use for them.

"I don't know," Christine said. She wasn't sure if she wanted to go.

"You think about it. I'll be right back." Shemeka then used the walkie talkie feature on his phone. "Mark," he said talking into the device, "I made a stinky. I need a new dypee." A minute later, Mark walked in. She followed Shemeka into the bathroom and closed the door. Before the door closed Christine saw a large changing table. It seems that although Shemeka changed his own diapers when he was in public, at home Shemeka had his servants change him. Christine saw how hard the domestic servants worked at Shemeka's house.maybe she should help them out.

What happens next?

While Elizabeth was doing his homework, Matt went to her bathroom to put on some makeup. She wasn't going to put on anything special, just some lipstick, blush and a little eye shadow. Something she had been wearing everyday for years and years. But something didn't seem right to her. Shouldn't she already be wearing her daily makeup? Elizabeth got into the back seat and Matt took her place in front of the steering wheel. While driving Matt's mind went blank as she drove on autopilot towards the train station.

It bothered her that she had been wearing Elizabeth's clothes. She didn't know how she had gotten into Elizabeth's clothes. "Wait," she thought, "she had called it Matt's clothes. But she is Matt. It is Elizabeth who is her son.... Isn't that right?"

In her head she tried to piece together what is what. She started with the basics. "My name is Matt. That is a fact. I am a 43 year old woman." She looked into the rear view mirror to see her face. She saw Matt's ten-year-old boys face looking back at her and she was satisfied that that was her. Moving on she thought, "OK that is right, I am a wife and mother. My husband is Steven." This is fine since this is who she was about to pick up. "My children are Zack, Mandy and Kate....Wait, but isn't Elizabeth my son? No Elizabeth is Angela's son along with her two daughters Alex and Karen."

With this realization the damn broke. She looked at the clothes she was wearing and she noticed that even though they fit her she wore a bra but her chest was flat. She looked at the crotch of the pants she was wearing an noticed the slight bulge of her prepubescent penis. It was small but it was there. It should be flat she is a woman. She looked at the rear view mirror again and then she noticed something wrong there too. It was clearly her face, but it wasn't the face of a grown woman. It was the face of a young boy. She looked at Elizabeth through the mirror and could clearly see him as he was. He was dressed like a little boy but he was clearly a grown woman. It dawned on her that she should look like him not like a little boy. She then pulled over the car as soon as she could. Something is very wrong and she had to get to the bottom of it.
