Note: I like doing the same scenario with slightly different people. I suppose technically I should have done them with two posts b/c if this version happened the version you ready before this didn't happen...But what can I say I'm lazy and ti won't let me add more options on the original post that this chapter should spring from.

Also, the dialogue from this new chapter isn't original although I changed it a slight amount. If you recognize it cool you can email me if you like. Consider it a parody of the dialogue.
---------------------------------------------------------
Matt and Elizabeth had gotten out of the car. Two young men in their twenties happened to be walking down the street. Matt was about to yell at Elizabeth in her distress. Then one of the two men found that he was carrying the keys to Elizabeth's car in his hand. Not knowing why he had gotten out of the car, Geoffrey realized that he and Phillip had to hurry to pick up Geoffrey's husband, Steven. Geoffrey yelled to Phillip "Get in the car, daddy's waiting for us." Phillip dutifully got into the car and they drove off.

Matt was still dressed in Elizabeth's clothes and Elizabeth was still wearing the boyish clothes of Matt. The two look at each other wondering what had happened. A moment later, they walking down the street continuing their conversation.

Matt: "She's from the Little Hills."

Elizabeth "Who?"

Matt: "The Hindi broad, Dina. I been trying to bang her for a month. She won't go out with me alone."

Elizabeth: "No."

Matt: "No what? No what? Who asked you anything? Wait to hear what I'm going to say."

Elizabeth: "Okay, what?"

Matt: "She won't go out with Chinese guys alone. She's prejudiced against Chinese. You f&&*ing believe that? In this day and age? What is this world coming to? I can't believe this. A Hindi broad, prejudiced against Chinese. She won't go out without her girlfriend. So you come along for her friend."

Elizabeth: "See? I knew it. I knew it."

Matt: "What the f%& is wrong with that?"

Elizabeth: "When is this?"

Matt: "Tomorrow night."

Elizabeth: "I'm meeting Kimmy."

Matt: "You could meet Kimmy. Come early and then go."

Elizabeth: "Why do you always do this?"

Matt: "Don't give me that stuff. What did I ask you for? A favor. I do a lot of f%^%ing favors for you. I'm trying to bang this broad. Help me out. I don't understand you. She's beautiful! Her family lives in the Little Hills. These Hindis got money. Maybe the family owns the whole block. You may wind up with a big score."

Elizabeth: "You with your f*^*ing mouth!"

What happens next?
11423221111212122222.title: A different couple

choices: She doesn't swap maturity with Kate
114232211112122.content:
Matt is there to greet you when you walk in, and when you see him, you almost laugh out loud. He is wearing one of your mom's skirts and has makeup on his face. Looking down, you see that his toenails are painted red.

"How was your date, Mandy?" he asks, in a motherly tone.

"It was great, 'Mommy!'" you say, giggling.

Matt smiles and says, "Glad to hear it."

You tell him that you're going to your room, so he starts to walk off. You think that it would be funny if your toenails were painted red (with your lowered maturity, you can't quite grasp gender boundaries). So you activate the PAID. After a few clicks and a flash, you walk up to your room giggling, staring at your red-painted toenails. You only exchanged the paint; you have no idea how to actually paint them. You figure that you can swap that later: right now, you want to call Karen.

You dial her and tell her to come up to your room, to talk about the PAID. She obliges, and is up in your room in two minutes. You are sitting cross-legged on your bed, proudly displaying your painted toenails. When Karen sees you, she smiles.

"I noticed that you swapped my brother with your mom, and I can see that you gave yourself a pedicure as well. Did you swap anything else?" she says, sitting across from you on your bed.

"I also swapped relationships with Stephanie," you say, smiling.

"That would explain why she kissed me on the cheek earlier," says Karen. "Do you want to swap back? I'm not very comfortable dating my sister."

You could understand that, so you swap back. When Karen asks if you swapped anything else, you can't remember swapping maturity and names with Amanda. You know that you swapped something, but you don't know what. Just then, the PAID starts flashing. When you activate it, it begins to give you and Karen a tutorial on the "Swap History" feature. Basically, it keeps a record of all the swaps a person has performed. When you see that you swapped names and maturity with Amanda, you giggle and say, "Oh, right."

Karen, however, was concerned. "Alex, why did you swap maturity?"

"I wanted to play with the PAID a little bit," you said, "and it turned out to be really fun! I become happy more easily, and I don't really wanna swap back. You should try it, Karen. Swap maturity with Kate. Even if you don't like it, you could swap back."

Karen doesn't know if swapping maturity is a good idea, but she could swap back. What does she do?
114232211112122.title: You finally get to tell Karen about your date a...

choices: Kate gets the PAID away from Mandy
Kate convinces Mandy to do a swap
1142322111121221.content:
Kate saw Karen enter Mandy's room. Being the little sister she propped herself outside Mandy's door and listened in to what they were saying. She could hear everything from her vantage point and understood what they were talking about. She hadn't recognized any changes around the house. Matt had always been her and Mandy's mother. Mandy had always painted his nails. Her brother's name had always been Mandy, but since she was so young she didn't have any problem believing that such a thing as the PAID existed even without proof.

When she heard that Karen was going to swap maturity with her she thought great. Kate didn't understand exactly what maturity was, she thought it meant smartness. It did mean smartness but it meant a whole lot more too which she didn't realize. Kate thought it would be fun to be as smart as an adult. To Kate, anyone who was old enough to babysit for her was an adult. She saw Karen agree and head towards to door to presumably swap 'Maturity' with her. She scampered to her room.

When Kate got into her room, she hid in the corner so that Karen would have to enter the room to do the swap. Karen thought the swap would be fun and she could just swap back if there was a problem. But that was the mature Karen's thoughts. After the swap, Karen was no longer mature, Kate was the mature one and worse yet, Kate knew what had happened because she had heard Karen and Mandy talking. With Kate's new found maturity, she could manipulate Karen. Kate convinced Karen that it was her bed time and that she could 'play' in the morning. Karen tried to protest, but without the maturity of a teen, she was no match for Kate. Soon Karen was brushing her teeth and getting ready for bed.

Kate then slipped away to talk to Mandy. "I didn't just swap maturity with Kate, I also swapped bodies too." Kate told him. She made up a story that it would be more fun to act immature if she also looked immature. Mandy who had the maturity of a child bought it. Then Kate also convinced Mandy it was time for bed. Soon Karen and Mandy were fast asleep like 'little kids.'

Kate used this time to find Alex and tell her what had been done to them. Alex who had the maturity of a teen but the body of a little girl realized that Kate was right. They soon made plans to manipulate, Karen and Mandy into doing what they (Alex and Kate) wanted. But what would that be?
1142322111121221.title: She swap maturity with Kate

choices: You write a letter to Santa
1142322112.content:
You enter Amanda's room.

"Alex," you say, "want to play with my bear and some of your stuffed animals?"

"Yeah, that's would be great," she says excitedly.

She picks out another stuffed toy and you have a pretend tea-party with Amanda, your beloved bear and another bear she owns. She is having a lot of fun and you are playing along.

"First, everyone has to get a cup," she says and she gives everyone a pretend cup. "OK"

"Next everyone needs a plate."

"For what?" you ask.

"For the cake that goes with the tea," she replies as if its the most natural thing in the world. But you think she is probably right.

"Don't you eat biscuits with tea?"

"Biscuits?" she says increduously thinking of biscuits not as cookies but as small dinner rolls. "You don't have biscuits with tea, you have it with cake or cookies."

"OK," you say again.

She hands out the pretend plates.

"Now some napkins for the crumbs." This is a pretty elaborate tea-party you think. "Now the tea." and she starts pouring from an invisible teapot.

You pick up your imaginary tea cup ready to drink. "NO, STOP!!!" she shouts.

"What???" you say surprised.

"You can't drink your tea until everyone is served, that is proper manners....And I haven't served the cake yet."

You decide not to do anything until you are told. There seems to be a lot of rules to an imaginary tea party.

Finally, everything is set out. When you are sure its OK, you pick up your teacup.

"HMMM, this is great tea you say."

"Yes I only buy the best and you should taste the cake it is 'to die for'....I asked Santa for a real tea set. I know I'll get it for Christmas. I have been real good."

"Yes I know Santa put you on his 'nice' list?"

"I am sure he did." While she is talking, you realize that she still believes in Santa. You think it would be great to be able to believe in Santa like that. At least for a little while. You take out your PAID and look through the options, there wasn't one specifically for believes in Santa. But there was an option for beliefs and you choose it. When time returns to normal, you believe everything a seven-year-old does. You believe in Santa, the Easter Bunny, the Toothfairy, monsters, the Boggyman, that babies come from the stork, that mommy can make everything better and other beliefs. You know that some of your beliefs aren't right, but you don't know which ones are true and which ones are childish beliefs. They all seem equally true to you.

Amanda knows that her mom gets the toys for her, not Santa but she still expects to get a tea set for Christmas. You hope that Santa will get you the new XBox One.
1142322112.title: Play with your teddybear with Amanda

choices: Alex and Amanda drive to the market
11423221122.content:
"The tea is very good and the cake is delicious," you tell Amanda.

"Yes it is. Do you know who makes the best cookies and cakes?"

"Who?"

"Mommy, she makes the best."

"Maybe we should go ask her if she'll make some for us?" Then you lead Amanda out of her room to the den where Amanda's mom is watching TV.

"Mrs.Jones," you begin.

"Yes, Amanda."

"Are you in the mood to make us some cookies?"

"Yes, mom make us some," Amanda jumped in.

"I don't know I'm pretty tired, maybe later."

Secretly to Amanda you say, "You know I make a very good cookie. I can make it for us."

"Really, that'll be great."

You point the PAID at Mrs. Jones. You look through the options and under skills you find 'Cooking'. When time resumes, you know everything Mrs. Jones knew about cooking, but you also knew that you were missing some ingredients. You point the PAID at her again and you transferred all of her driving knowledge to yourself. You couldn't drive alone with your learners permit.

"Alex we have to go to the store to get somethings to make cookies. We need flour, vanilla and some chocolate chips." All the other ingredients you knew were already in the house.

"Mrs. Jones we are going to the market to pick up a few things, do you need anything?" you informed her.

"No, hunny, just be careful."

"We will." You take the car keys were they were stored and headed out the door. On the way you look at your wallet to look at your license. Your learners permit was gone and replaced with a real driver's license. It contained your picture and an authorization seal. The name on the license was 'Amanda Williams' and it had all the rest of your personal information including your date of birth which hadn't changed.
11423221122.title: Continue playing tea party

114232211221.content:
You carefully put your bear in Mrs. Jones' car and buckled him up in Matt's car seat. Before you swapped beliefs with Amanda, you thought that the bear was just an inanimate object. But now, you thought-no, you knew- that he had feelings, and he'd get really hurt if he wasn't buckled in and you got into an accident. Meanwhile, Amanda got into her own car seat, and said, "Can you help me buckle up, Mandy?" she asked. "Sure," you replied. You got her buckled up, and said "Keep an eye on my bear, okay?" She giggled and said, "Okay." Amanda thought it was cute that you still believed in a lot of kid stuff. She had stopped believing when she was five, but she liked humoring you. It was kind of like a game, like she was trying to keep a secret from you.

You started driving to the market, which was about two minutes away. On the way over, Amanda asked, "So, Mandy, when was the last time the tooth fairy visited you?" "Oh, not for a while. Probably when I was ten or eleven." Amanda grinned and said, "Well, she's going to visit me soon! I've got a tooth that's really wiggly." She put a finger on one of her front teeth and wiggled it back and forth rapidly. You smiled and thought, 'Man, I wish I had a loose tooth. I could really use some extra cash...' As you pulled up to a red light, you had an idea. You activated the PAID and looked for anything tooth related. Under "Body," you found "Teeth." 'I only want the wiggly one, but I guess this will work,' you think. You selected it, and then selected Amanda. Time resumed, and you smiled into your mirror. Your teeth were obviously baby teeth, but they had changed size to fit in your mouth properly. They looked blocky, and your lower incisors were all crooked from where one of Amanda's adult teeth had already come in. You wiggled your right front tooth. This would take some getting used to, but you'd start getting money from the tooth fairy again, which was totally worth it.

"So you've got a wiggly tooth, Mandy?" Amanda asked. You chuckled at how the PAID had changed your conversation, and said, "Yes. The tooth fairy's going to visit me soon." Amanda smiled, showing off your bracer-straightened teeth, and said, "Great!" The light turned green, and you continued to drive, pushing on your tooth with your tongue.

You both arrive at the store and walk in, bringing your bear with you.
114232211221.title: Alex and Amanda drive to the market

choices: Mom waits with you for the school bus
11423222.content:
You wondered what it would be like to be a little girl. So you set the PAID to switch 'LIFE' with Amanda. Suddenly time starts and you are standing where Amanda is. Your clothes haven't changed, just your position. You go down stairs and then into the kitchen. Amanda's mom is there. You look at her. "Hunnybunch sit down and have your breakfast." You sit down and a bowl of sugary cereal is placed before you. Amanda's mom then pours milk onto the cereal.

"Eat up Alex." she says. You realized you made a mistake, you swapped Amanda's 'LIFE', but not her name. You quickly get up and tell Amanda's mom, "I forgot something upstairs." She tries to grab you saying "Eat up first." But you are too fast and scooted away.

You quickly find Amanda and zap her again. When you came down, you had not only Amanda's life but her name too which seems more fitting. You could have swapped clothing too, but for some reason you couldn't bring yourself to wear the little girl's outfit especially the panties.

"Mandy did you get what you were looking for?" You smile at being called the correct name.

"Yes.....Mom...my." You decided you should get into character.. You are going to have to concentrate. You have Amanda's life, but you don't want people to think something is wrong with her. You dig into your cereal. It actually tastes good, you realize you are never too old to eat Fruity Pebbles cereal. You think maybe when you return to normal you would get your mom to get you some. It says its part of a nutritious breakfast and it is tasty. Can't go wrong when your breakfast is 30% sugar (or is it 90% sugar who knows).

You finish breakfast now what?
11423222.title: Life with Amanda

114232221.content:
After finishing your breakfast which includes cereal and juice. You hop out of your seat and head for the door. You know where the elementary school is and plan to walk there. Your mom who was impressed that you finished the entire bowl says "Where are you going, Mandy?"

"I'm going to school."

"You are not going to walk alone, young lady." You forgot to stay in character for a second. Little girls don't go anywhere alone. You think to yourself you had better get used to being watched by an adult at all time. "Also, aren't you forgetting something?"

"I I I don't think so."

"Where is your bookbag and what about your lunchbox?"

"Ummm," looking around "I don't see them."

Amanda's mom expect seven-year-olds to be forgetful so it is no big deal for her. Although she was concerned about Amanda trying to leave the house without her. Amanda's mom fetched her things. Amanda's school bag was actually a Dora knapsack. It seems all seven-year-olds have Dora the Explorer knapsacks you think. Amanda's mom helps you put on your knapsack. She then gives you a Carebear's lunchbox. You want to know what is inside, but you decide to wait to open it later.

Amanda's mom then takes your hand and leads you out the door. She walks you all the way to the school never letting go of your hand. During the trip she reminds you that you have to wait for mommy. She tries to do it in a way that is both urgent for a young girl but not so much so that it'll scare her. Amanda's mom doesn't want her daughter to think the world is a scary place.

Finally, you arrive at the school grounds and Amanda's mom makes sure an adult takes charge of you before leaving herself. You are then escorted inside the school with the other students in your class. You wait for everyone to sit down and try to figure out which is your seat. You use your skills as an adult to figure it out somehow. There is only one desk that is big enough for a person of your size. You assume the PAID changed reality to make it possible for you to be in this class. That must be your seat.

Looking around, you see you are in the first grade. You have no idea what they teach children that young. You don't even know if you are supposed to know your ABCs. You sit there quietly and look at what the other kids are doing. The kids who are not playing around take out a notebook and you look in your bag and do the same.

The teacher, you don't know what her name is, gets the class quieted down. Today's lesson is on odds and evens. The teacher holds up a picture with a group of things, balls, snakes, teddy bears, whatever and the students have to decide if its odd or even. You are much more concerned with what is the teacher's name than to worry about the lesson. The teacher notices your attention is elsewhere.

"Amanda...Amanda...Amanda." the teacher says. She then moves towards you. What do you do?
114232221.title: Mom walks you to school

choices: You swap something else with one of the kids
1142322211.content:
Snapping out of it, you quickly answer the obvious question. You see six birds so the answer is even. But this is much to easy for you. It's no fun being a first grader if you know all the answers. So you take the PAID out and point it at the nearest student. Your plan is to swap back when the school day is done. You look through the features and exchange intellect with her.

Now you only know what a seven year old knows. Since the lesson is not so easy anymore, the lesson now seems very interesting and you are proud of yourself when you get the correct answer.

What happens next
1142322211.title: Answer the math problem

11423222112.content:
For the next two and a half hours or so, the teacher kept teaching about odds and evens. Every twenty minutes, the lesson structure would change, but the topic was always on odds and evens. The teacher drew on the board, various shapes and you have to count them and tell if they were odds or evens. This lesson didn't only teach the math but also reinforced shapes to the students.

One of the students call the teacher Miss Konner. You finally kn.w your teacher's name. You smiled to yourself.

Then there were manipulatives where the students were put into groups of two or three to work together. Later there was a work sheet. The class moved from lesson to lesson quickly to keep the kids engaged. You didn't notice, it was all fun to you, not work. There was even a break in the middle for milk and cookies. Miss Konner was a very good teacher and you liked her.

Finally it was time for lunch and recess. Miss Konner took the class to the lunch room to eat. Everyone was reminded to take their lunchbox with them. Miss Konner then left the whole class with the lunchroom attendants. You guessed this was so she could eat her own lunch in peace. You were proud of yourself for figuring it out. You guessed that none of the other kids would have reasoned it out.

You sat down with some girls. You only knew a few of their names from class, but this seemed to be the group of kids that Kate played with. You finally got to see what was in your lunchbox. It was a tuna sandwich on white with the crusts cut off. There was a grape drink box an orange and some M&Ms. You started with the M&Ms first.

You listened to the conversations of the girls and tried to jump in where you could. Once you got the hang of it, you started to have fun. After your group was finished all they were going to eat, tThey decided to play a clapping game. So you paired up with one of the girls and sat across from her indian style. The other girls didn't understand why you didn't know the rhyme. It went:
"Miss Mary Mack
Miss Mary Mack, Mack, Mack
All dressed in black, black, black "

You seemed to remember hearing it before, but you couldn't remember how it went. Finally one of the girls did the whole thing for you, and you sort of mouthed the words until you got it. The clapping pattern was pretty simple. You clap twice and then clap your right hand with your partner's left, clap twice again and then your left hand with your partner's right. It seems you have to do it as fast as you can. So you missed the other girls hand quite frequently. But all in all, it was a lot of fun.

You learned the rhyme, eventually. Well you couldn't really remember the order, but the other girl did and you could catch on a split second later.

Your partner singing, "With silver buttons, buttons, buttons " and you singing "... silver buttons, buttons, buttons," Missing the first word. But remembering the next line "All down her back, back, back" Then you forgot the next line so the other girl singing "She asked her mother, mother, mother " and you singing "uh uhed her mother, mother, mother...." Even if you didn't know the words, you had a lot of fun anyway.

The boys were outside in the fenced off school yard running around. You preferred to be sitting and playing the clapping game instead.
11423222112.title: Time for recess

choices: Return home stuck with first grade knowledge
Use the PAID to swap randomly hoping something will work
114232221122.content:
After recess, Miss Konner started some spelling lessons. Once again, the lessons were quick and changed format rapidly. You know most of the words, but not all of them. You raised your hand frequently when you knew or thought you knew the answer. You weren't always right.

Then something occurred to you. You could only spell at a first grade level. You could also only read at a first grade level. You then took the PAID out and pointed it at a student. Except for the word "BODY" and that you weren't 100% sure of, you couldn't read any of the instructions. How could you swap back your intelligence if you can't read the instructions?

You could swap things randomly but you could end up in a worse situation than you are now. What do you do?
114232221122.title: Back to lessons

choices: You remember and talk to Karen
1142322211221.content:
You decide that keeping your lowered intelligence would be a better idea than swapping randomly, glad that your knew IQ was high enough to keep you from doing something THAT stupid. Still, however, you would need to speak with Karen to figure what to do.

The next lesson is adding and subtracting. Apparently, the girl you swapped with wasn't very good at math, because you are having a very difficult time. There were fifteen problems on the sheet, and Miss Konner said you only got two of them right. Or was that three? You couldn't count very well either. You glance over at the girl you swapped with. She had completed every problem in record time, and Miss Konner was congratulating her because they were all correct.

You mutter, "Smarty pants." Miss Konner hears you, and says, "Amanda! Apologize to Jenny right now!"

Apologize? That word sounded familiar, but you have no idea what it means. You scratch your head and say, "What apologize mean?"

Miss Konner smiles at you and says, "Say that you're sorry." You do so and Jenny accepts your apology. Miss Konner nod and goes back to the white board.

You decide not to get your life back until you've swapped IQs; otherwise you'd be seen as a dumb 16 year old, and you definitely didn't want that. A little while later, at about two o'clock (or later; you couldn't tell time), Amanda's mom comes to pick you up. With your lowered IQ, you forget that she isn't your real mother.

"Hi mommy," you say with a glum look on your face.

"Hi sweety!" she says in a cheerful tone. When she saw you frowning, she looked concerned. "How did school go?"

"Okay," you say. You were really bummed about having the knowledge of a seventh grade girl. Suddenly, an idea hits you. If you pretend to be sick, you and Karen can figure out how to get your IQ back.

You immediately cough and say, "I don't feel good," not noticing your grammatical error. Amanda's mom asks if you are getting sick, and you say that you think so. She decides to let you stay home.

On the way home, you were very excited. Despite your lowered intelligence, you were pretty smart! You remembered the girl you swapped with AND figured out a plan to get your IQ back! You get so excited, you almost forget about talking to Karen.

Do you remember later?
1142322211221.title: Return home stuck with first grade knowledge

choices: Turn off PAID and talk to Karen
Do the best you can with the PAID
11423222112211.content:
You arrive home and go to 'your' room. Inside you find all 'your' toys, games and stuffed animals. They look like so much fun to play with. But there isn't any time for that, you have to talk to Karen first about how to get your intelligence back (although you are not intelligent to know what the word 'intelligence' means, you think of it as 'smartness' instead.) You enter Karen's room. But Karen isn't there. You don't know that Karen is spending extra time at the high school using her PAID on some of the students during the extra-curricular activities, such as Rebecca and her boyfriend John.

You return to 'your' room and find some toys and start playing. You discover the simple joy of a girl playing with a toy and have a lot of fun. You are so caught up in your fun that you hadn't heard the knock at the door. A moment later, Mrs. Jones ushers Christy Baker to your room. You are happy to greet one of your friends. Now that you have a friend to play with you suggest the clapping game that you had just learned at school. You have a great time playing the clapping game, it was even more fun when it didn't work out than getting it right all the time. Christy knew several other rhymes that you didn't know.

During your play with Christy, Karen arrived home. She noticed you playing with Christy and so she didn't disturb you. You played with Christy until she had to leave for dinner. By that time, you had decided to keep Amanda's life. It was just so much fun. There was only one person who knew that you shouldn't have Amanda's life and that was Karen, you had to fix that. So after Christy left you sneaked up behind Karen and zapped her with your PAID. You want her to allow you to stay as Amanda. It was at this point you realized that you still didn't know how to use the PAID right.

What do you do?
11423222112211.title: You remember and talk to Karen

114232221122111.content:
You turn off the PAID and walk over to Karen. She smiles when she sees you, and asks if you had fun with Christy.

"Yeah!" you reply. "We played a fun clapping game that I learned at school, and she taught me a few that I didn't know." Karen had assumed that you swapped lives with someone, and you confirmed her suspicions. However, after hearing the way you spoke, she began to suspect that you had swapped more than just lives with Amanda. She decided to ask you, saying,

"Alex, did you swap more than just lives with Amanda? You seem a little... different." She also took note of the eagerness you showed when playing with Christy.

"Oh yeah," you say, "I swapped our names before I went to school. When I got there, it was boring, so I made it less boring by switching smartness with a girl named Jenny. It was really fun, but Jenny wasn't good at math or reading, so those were kind of hard. But I still had a lot of fun!" You stood there, smiling and rocking on your heels, unaware that anything was wrong.

Karen was shocked, to say the least. She decided to confirm what you were saying, asking, "Alex, what's 2+2?"

You scrunch up your faces, thinking very hard. This was one of the problems on the sheet... "Six!" you say, confident that your answer was correct.

That was all Karen needed. Being as smart as she was, she assumed that you didn't switch back because you couldn't read very well. She was determined to turn you back to normal.

"Alex, I'm going to fix this," she said, sounding very firm. "This girl, Jenny, is probably in your grade now due to her high intelligence. I'm going to find her, encourage her to come to the house, and switch you back. Understand?"

Although you only understood half of what she said, you had a basic idea of what she was planning.

Do you let her do it?
114232221122111.title: Turn off PAID and talk to Karen

1142322211221111.content: Do you really let her do it?
1142322211221111.title: You let her

choices: Karen leaves and you have no problem with her
1142322211221112.content:
You decide that you want to stay this way. It is so much fun having Amanda's life. You really can't remember what your old life was like you think it can't be this much fun. You have to think of something to stay this way.

Karen finds out who this Jenny girl is and invites her to your home. When she arrives you take out your PAID before Karen has a chance to and point it at Karen and then at Jenny so you have both of their statistics on the screen. You still can't read most of the instructions but you can read some of the easy (three and four letter) words. The first thing you swap between Jenny and Karen is AGE. But this won't prevent her from 'fixing' you. The next thing you swap is LIFE. Now Karen has Jenny's life and Jenny is your older sister (and friend).

When time resumes, you tell your sister Jenny that Karen has been mean to you and you have the teenaged Jenny make the seven-year-old Karen leave.
1142322211221112.title: You try to stop her

choices: In the morning, you go to school
11423222112211121.content:
After Karen left, you stood in the living room with a wide smile on your face. You had gotten rid of Karen and gotten a new playmate! You felt very proud of yourself. Since you had the day off you would have plenty of time to get to know your older sister.

Despite having the interests of a sixteen year old girl, Jenny seemed to like playing with you. A little while into your play session, she asked if you wanted to paint your fingernails. You thought it was a great idea, but it didn't appeal to you. You decided to swap your interest in nail-painting with Amanda, who was walking by. You activate the PAID, and are faced with the same problem that you had yesterday.

You angrily shout, "I wish I could just tell this thing what I wanted!" Suddenly, you hear the PAID say, "Voice command now activated." "Yay!" you shout, glad that you could use the PAID again. "I want to like painting my nails," you told the PAID. "Interest in Fingernail and Toenail Painting Transferred." Now the idea of painting your fingernails sounded wonderful! However, you didn't know how, so told the PAID that you wanted to know how to paint your nails. After the PAID performed the swap, you decided that your favorite color, green, wouldn't look pretty on your nails, so you switch favorite colors with Amanda. Now your favorite color was pink, although you kind of liked red. You think of what else to swap, and you see your hairy arms and legs. You didn't like that. "I don't want my arms and legs to be hairy," you tell the PAID. "Body Hair Transferred." You feel the hair on your arms, legs, face, and chest get sucked back in. Conversely, Amanda now had hair covering most of her body, and had a small mustache on her upper lip. You smile and say, "All done!" as you close the PAID.

When Jenny asks if you want to paint your nails. You excitedly agree, and decide on a hot neon pink color. After you and Jenny finish your fingernails, you decide to paint your toenails as well. When your (Amanda's) mom comes home, she compliments your nails. You thank her, and sit down to dinner. After dinner, you go to your (Amanda's) room, enter your (Amanda's) bed, and go to sleep.

We (Amanda and I and our friends) were walking down the hall when we encountered a six foot tall boy named Duncan. I had seen him around the school and I knew he was about seventeen years old. Duncan made the mistake of bumping into Amanda. He should have seen where he was going, even if Amanda did not.

"Well aren't you going to apologize," demanded Amanda.

"No it was your fault. You should apologize to me."

"Listen, you had better apologize or you won't like what'll happen." Amanda said.

I'll have to give Duncan credit, I hear he has the dick of a six-year-old. But he wouldn't back down. "It was your fault, you should have been paying attention. You bumped into me."

"Look, it was your fault, just apologize and we can just forget this whole thing happened."

Duncan must have been feeling over confident. He towered over Amanda, it wasn't just his height, but he always sported a permed updo you usually find on women in their forties or older which made him look even taller than he was. "I will not, I'm not afraid of you."

"You're not afraid of me? You should be." Amanda said with the confidence of her position.

Duncan, took his thumb out of his mouth long enough to say. "You may think you own the school, but you don't."

"Look, I'll tell you what, you turn your butt around and leave and I'll forget your rudeness."

Duncan didn't turn his butt around. It was a huge bubble butt that you usually see on plus sized black women. He just stared into Amanda's eyes.

Amanda wouldn't look away. Finally Duncan had had enough. He finally turned away and skipped down the hall like a grade school girl. Amanda continued on her way as if nothing had happened. It's so great to be with Amanda she doesn't take s&*t from anyone.

You got angry at the boy for pulling your hair. You pull out your PAID and point it at the boy and said, "Let him know what it's like." You didn't care what the PAID would do to him, you just wanted revenge. "Task completed," the PAID replied.

What the PAID actually did was two things. It swapped around yours and the boys memories so that both of you remember you pulling his hair instead of vice versa. The PAID also swapped your maturity level so that you were capable of doing such a thing. You now have the maturity of a first grader to go with your intellect. The boy was now more mature. Since you had Amanda's life (the life of a first grader) no one noticed any difference although you were acting a bit more boyish.

You would do things just because they were funny. This also included what you did with the PAID. Since Karen was no longer your sister there wasn't any moderating influence on you.

An idea had occurred to you. It was a silly idea and you didn't know if it would work but you didn't care. You took of your PAID and said, "Everyone in my class swaps bodies with their mother....except me." This time it took the PAID several seconds to respond, it usually responded instantaneously but it finally said, "Task completed." The bodies of the students whether they be boys or girls were swapped with their moms. The students didn't notice any changes. Their mother's did find things a bit more difficult since their height and strength left them with their bodies. The moms had to start standing on chairs or using step ladders to get things off the shelf or to do their usual housework.

Making dinner was much more of a chore. For example Christy's mom had to use her step ladder to get the dishes down from the high shelves. She also had to stand on the step ladder just to stir the sauce she was preparing on the stove top. Setting the table took several trips. By the end of the day she was exhausted. Her husband was feeling frisky when Christy's mom (in Christy's seven year old body) got into bed, but no matter what he tried to do (kissing her neck, rubbing her back, cupping her backside), he couldn't entice her into love making. You wake up early in the morning without having to be woken up by 'your' mom. You really want to get to school to see what had happened. You had called Kristie before going to bed last night and you could hear an older woman's voice on the line. You knew it was Kristie by what you talked about. You were sure that 'it' had worked and now you wanted to see for yourself.

You tried to rush your mom along, but she was on her own schedule. You gobbled down your breakfast and had to wait. Your mom asked you what was the hurry. You couldn't tell her so you made something up. She didn't believe you, you weren't bright or mature enough to come up with a believable story. But your mom saw no harm in getting you to school early so she relented eventually.

When arrived, only one student from your class was there. You didn't know which student it was, but it was obviously a girl from the cute yellow and gold jumper and dark mary janes that she was wearing. But that was the only thing girlish about the student. The student was a woman in her early thirties. She was about five foot five tall and weighed close to 160 pounds. Her hair was tied back with a ribbon with a bow but she didn't wear any makeup at all. There were other students in the school courtyard but they were children who weren't in your class and they looked quite normal.

The 'adult' woman greeted you. She knew who you were, but you didn't know who she was. You played along as if you knew her by simply avoiding the use of a name. She talked about this and that but you weren't paying attention. You were waiting for more of your classmates to arrive.

One by one they did, The only way to tell which was by seeing who brought them. When the student was brought by his/her dad that didn't work though. Pretty soon all of your classmates had shown up. All of them had the bodies of their moms. You could usually tell the boys from the girls by the clothes they were wearing. None of the women wore any makeup. Few wore jewelry except for the occasional cutsy earring or some sort of charm necklace. All of your classmates are now women mostly in their late twenties or early thirties. Some were a bit older and there was one 'boy' who was actually a woman of forty-four. None of the women wore bras of any sort and thus many of them dependent on their age or breast size had very saggy breasts particularly while they were running around playing games.

The only exception was Richard and Toby. They had their mom's bodies now, but because of the previous use of the PAID they were properly dressed in their mom's clothes (except Toby who still wore a diaper.) You find all these women playing like little kids completely hilarious and you start to laugh although no one knew what you were laughing about.

11423222112211121112121121.content:
In class Timmy raised his hand. Miss Konner acknowledged him.

"Miss Konner I have to go to the bathroom," Timmy said.

"Can you wait until the normal bathroom time." (Before lunch and another time in the day, the entire class is led to the bathroom. This was the only times the students could go to the bathroom. The first graders are not allowed to roam the halls alone.)

"No, it can't wait. I really need to go now." Miss Konner knew it was an emergency, Timmy was seven and a half months pregnant and because the baby was pushing on his bladder he had to go a lot. Timmy was dressed in the typical outfit of a seven-year-old boy except that it was sized for an adult woman and it had a paunch in the front to accommodate his pregnant belly. Miss Konner worried that Timmy would be in her class when he went into labor, but she was hoping for the best. "I really need to go now," Timmy whined.

Miss Konner called the school nurse to come up to the room and take Timmy to the bathroom. The nurse obviously knew of the boy's condition and would come right up.

No sooner had these words been spoken as your legs spread apart and your shirt and pants adjusted to your now growing baby bump. Timmy's tummy on the other hand deflated. When time resumed you hear, "Granted." You looked down at yourself to see your now very pregnant stomach, but before you could do or say anything you felt a bigger need. You had to go to the bathroom very very badly. You felt a great pressure inside of you and you had to go. If you didn't go immediately you were sure you was going to piss your pants.

Your entire balance is through off by your state and you have to use your hand to support your back as you walk towards the door. Walk isn't the proper word for how you are moving, what you are doing is waddling not walking.

Eventually, you get to the door and the nurse escorts you to the bathrooms. You go into the girls room and the nurse accompanies you. You choose the closest stall, relieved that you didn't pee yourself. The urge to pee had come upon you so suddenly and was so strong, it was really close as to whether you would make it to the stall. The nurse allows you to close the door for privacy but she still waits inside the girls room for you. You quickly pull up your pink tunic and pull down your leggings your pants and pull down your underwear, you are still wearing men's underwear, it is one of the few things you are wearing that isn't pink. Despite being pregnant you still have your own male penis. You point it between your legs and you let the pee flow as you sigh in relief. As it turns out only a few squirts trickle out. For a moment you wonder how come you needed to go that badly but only pee so little. Then you remember, you are going to have a baby.

You say out loud, "Why did I get her butt?" The PAID answered you, saying, "Buttocks required to enable unique walking style." You do not understand why this is required, but you were walking faster, so you didn't really mind. Besides, having a woman's butt sounded hilarious to you.

Upon returning to the classroom, Miss Konner asked you how your bathroom session went. You told her that everything went okay, and you walked over to your seat. You sat in your seat and resumed the lesson, planning your next lesson.

When you got to the lunch room you discovered that not only you were hungry you are hungry for several specific things.

You find in your lunch bag all you crave. Inside you find pickles, potato chips and hot red peppers. You took all these out and eat them one by one. You felt like you wanted them all. But today it was a very even match since regardless of the student being a boy or a girl they were all physically adult women. You were excused because of your delicate condition.

You had begun to tire of being pregnant. It was no fun and it hurt. It was hard to walk around. You couldn't see your feet which were swollen. Your back hurt and you had to pee all the time. You wanted to join the fun on the gym floor. You could use your PAID to return the pregnancy to the boy who was pregnant before, but you didn't want to deprive the boy of his fun. Since the winning team got cookies, you wanted to make sure that your team won. The first thing you did was give all of the girls on your team their original bodies. They now ran much faster than the boys, giving you a great advantage. However, the boys were still managing to hit a few of the girls, so you gave the boys the energy of their mothers, making them much more sluggish. Your team was obviously winning by now, but you wanted to make sure. Activating the PAID, you say,

"I want the girls on my team to be as fast as the kindergartners." "Stamina Transferred," said the PAID.

You could now see that the girls on your team were running much faster, and some of them were jumping up and down. After playing for a while, you realized that you were the worst player on your team, because of both your large butt and your lack of energy. After realizing this, you activate the PAID and say,

"I want to be as fast as a kindergartner." "Stamina Transferred," said the PAID.

The change was immediate: you felt like you could run a mile, and started jumping around yourself. Increasing your stamina had an adverse effect, however: it made you more energetic, and when combined with your lower maturity it caused you to make quick decisions without thinking them through. You did not know this, however. At the moment, you were playing a fun game of dodge ball with your friends. You were certainly going to win at this point, but the boys were still landing a few hits. You thought of how you could stop them, when an idea came to you. Because of your low IQ, you believed that someone was either "brainy" (smart) or "tough" (good at sports). Without thinking of the possible repercussions, you activated the PAID.

"I want the boys to be as smart as 10th graders (10th because you could only easily count to ten)." "Intelligence Transferred," said the PAID.

"Good. Now I want everyone on my team to be as smart as a kindergartner!" "Intelligence Transferred," said the PAID.

Was your IQ also swapped?

Miss Konner notices you turning around and listening to her. This annoys her and she said in a voice louder than before, "MIND YOUR OWN BUSINESS." Everyone in the class heard her including Sunita.

Sunita said, "Rosaline...ROSALINE," and then in a still louder voice, "ROSALINE ANN KONNER."

114232221122221.content:
Near the end of the school day, Amanda's mom picks you up at school. It's only a couple blocks walk from the school to her house, but she brought her car with her today. She opens the back door for you and you enter the car. You then strap yourself in the child safety seat in the back. When Amanda's mom thinks you are securely settled, she starts the car and drives off. She doesn't go to her home but to a hospital.

In the hospital you see your mom talking to a doctor. Amanda is lying on a hospital bed. Amanda's mom goes to your mom and they have have a conference with the doctor.

What you don't know is that even though Amanda now has your life she couldn't impersonate a teen boy like you could impersonate a little girl. There was a big problem and in the end Amanda was taken to the hospital for observation..

You want to get back to your life as soon as possible so you are glad to see Amanda. You use your PAID to swap you life back with Amanda. You find yourself sitting on the bed that Amanda was formerly in. You think everything is back to normal. But you only switched lives with Amanda, all other trait swaps haven't changed. You are still dressed like a seven year old girl and that is perfectly OK with you. You think your intelligence is normal (even though you don't know what the word intelligence means) but you have the intellect of a smart seven year old. You also have a seven year olds attention span and temporment.

After talking with the doctor, your mother approaches you. "Hunny," how would you like to go to a new school that is made for people like you?" she says with a smile on her face trying not to scare you.

"A school for people like me?" You don't realize the ramifications of what she is saying with your seven-year-olds' mind.

"Yes, you said you want to be a princess, this school can help you."

"They will teach me how to be a princess???" you say with a broad grin.

"Yes, its for special people like you. You will make lots of new friends and they have special teachers to help you." The decision had already been made, but your mother wants you to think it is your choice.

"I'll learn to be a princess?" you ask.

"Yes, you can be anyone you want to be."

"OK, if I can be a princess then I'll go." Then you think again, "But what if I want to be a nurse or a ballerina?"

"You can be anything you want to be, Hunny"

"Yes, let's go."

While you were talking with your mother, Karen arrived at the hospital. She sees you. She is the only one who knows something is wrong. She sees the way you are dressed and the way people are treating you. She knows the new reality of your circumstance but doesn't know what you did to change reality. The most obvious thing she sees is that you are dressed like a young girl, but so is Amanda so she doesn't know who you swapped with. She doesn't know that you had attended Amanda's school today nor any of the other swaps.

To everyone else, this is perfectly normal. They all think that the school district had tried to mainstream you and it didn't work. Now you were going to be sent to an intensive school for 'special' students.

The PAID had changed reality so no one in the class even knew that girl was in the class in the first place.

Karen was old enough to walk to school. Even though she attended first grade she was still a teenager.

When Karen got to the class and looked around, everything seemed perfectly normal. There wasn't any super smart kid. There wasn't a girl dressed in teen men's clothing. Even the last girl that Alex had swapped with didn't seem any different. How was Karen supposed to know that that girl was the smartest girl in the class and now she was just an average kid.

Karen knew it couldn't have been with the teacher. The teacher couldn't have given him the mind of a first grader. Karen was totally frustrated.
114232221122221111.title: Amanda attends first grade

choices: Alex goes to gym at the special school
1142322211222211112.content:
Elizabeth, Alex's mother drove Alex to the school for special people. They arrives a little late since Elizabeth had to make sure Kate got on the bus to her own school. They went into the office and Elizabeth filled out the paperwork. Alex was now an official student in the school.

Alex was taken to the appropriate class. There were only six other students in Alex's new class. They arranged in age from sixteen to thirty four, but they all were at the same 'grade' level (about third grade). They worked at a very slow pace. There was a teacher and an aide to help her. Alex was introduced to the class and was asked he he would like to tell about himself.

Alex was dressed in a cute pink tunic with a butterfly on it and a matching skirt. In the report that accompanied Alex it said that these clothes made him feel comfortable and shouldn't be questioned so none of the teachers did. Plus the students were warned about it and they didn't say anything either.

"HI, my name is Alex and I am very smart and so I was sent to this special school. I want to be a princess or a nurse or a ballerina and that is why I am here."

The teacher, Mrs. Brown said, "Well Alex we are sure glad you are here. I am sure you will have lots of fun learning new things." Then she escorted him to his seat.

The work was slow but still challenging for Alex's first grade mentality. He wasn't the smartest kid anymore. He quickly got jealous of another boy who was in his late twenties who seemed to the the smartest. He was actually of a much lower intelligence than Alex, he had just been at the school for almost two decades so he knew more. But with only a first grade intelligence he couldn't tell.

Alex took out his PAID and when the screen came up, he said "I want to be as smart as him." When the PAID had finished, Alex was now as smart as the other kid. But now instead of having the intelligence of an above average first grader he was now truly autistic. He was certainly smarter, but his thinking had slowed to a crawl and he developed a bunch of other mental and social problems that comes with autism.
1142322211222211112.title: Alex attends the special school

After swapping intelligence with the autistic kid Alex truly belonged at this school. He fit right in now and was the 'smartest' kid in his new class, this made Alex feel very comfortable.

After a while, it was time to go to gym. Alex changed into his gym clothes which were a unisex t-shirt and shorts. While at the gym he met another kid. This kid was putting in a great deal off effort and you could see it on his face. When he was done somehow Alex and this kid struck up a conversation. This wasn't as easy as it seemed since Alex had some new social problems which made his a bit anti-social But the kid noticed that Alex was watching him so he came over.

Alex discovered that this kid was going to be in the Special Olympics. Alex with his diminished brain didn't know exactly what the Special Olympics were, but he knew somehow that the Olympics were for people who were good at sports. Alex got jealous again and took out his PAID. "I wanna be in the Olympics" he said as he pointed the PAID at the boy. Alex now had a whole host of physical problems to go along with his mental problems, but he was going to be in the Special Olympics this year. He knew his mom had signed him up and he even remembered being in the Special Olympics last year too.

114232221122221111211.content:
Changing back into his tunic and skirt was much harder now. Once he swapped with that boy he now has a limp and his body doesn't work right anymore. He actually needed help now to get dressed. He also wore a diaper because it was much easier to deal with. He had to pee a little bit all the time and it was better to wear a diaper than to go through all the trouble of getting undressed to pee every half hour or so.

Once back in class the lessons continued. The teachers encouraged the students to work in groups in the afternoon, but Alex was a bit antisocial so he wasn't totally comfortable with it. The girl he was paired with didn't have this problem. She had a host of other problems but she was very chatty and outgoing. That is why she was paired with Alex to bring him out. Alex wished he could be like that.

He pulled out his PAID and said "I wanna be like her." The PAID knew what he meant and gave him all of the girls social graces. Alex was now a very lively and chatty person. The problem was that it had given him all of her social attributes which meant that he now liked boys.

The rest of the day passed easily. He was now no longer shy around people and he was the smartest kid in his class and so when his mom picked him up and asked about his day. He said "I really like it here." which was true. His mom was happy that they had found the perfect place for her son who has many mental and physical problems.
114232221122221111211.title: Alex goes back to class

1142322211222211112112.content:
Karen got back long before Alex did. She swapped her school back with Amanda's classmate and had returned to normal. She was at a quandry as to what to do. She couldn't find what she needed to switch Alex back and she considered herself a failure for not knowing what to do. She waited for Alex to return home and went to his house when he got there.

When she saw him, she knew right away that things had gotten worse. She could see in his face that he was now mentally challenged. Before he wasn't too smart but he didn't look retarded, but now that was different. She could also see the physical changes. They were very extensive and that didn't include that he was wearing a diaper (which she couldn't tell until he took off his skirt.) Her face dropped. She also didn't love him like a boyfriend anymore. She knew she should like him like that, she remembered loving him, but the PAID had changed that when it swapped his social life.

When Alex saw Karen though his face lit up. He was happy to see her. He now felt that she was his best friend but he had no interest in her socially. "Oh school was so much fun," he gushed. "We learned so many things and the people there were really nice. They are going to teach me to be a princess" He went on to tell about his day, about the students and teachers at the school. That he is the smartest kid at the school and that he is training for the Special Olympics. He also talked about this boy there that he liked and Karen got the impression about his new changed feelings.

Karen knew that he had gone way too far and that she couldn't fix him. There was just too much, he would never be the same and the more things continued, it probably would get worse. He wasn't retarded when he left for the school. (She knew that retarded wasn't the right word, but she wasn't in the mood to be politically correct. At least not in her own mind.) He wasn't deformed. He wasn't gay. Now look at him.

But she loved him so much and she needed to help him. So she took one last drastic step. She had noticed this feature a while back, but now was the time to use it she thought.

Karen pointed the PAID at Alex and she was going to swap 'LIVES' with him and use the 'TOTAL' and 'PERMANENT' option. This would mean, both lives would be totally switched in every way. He would be Karen and she would be what Alex had become in every way. That was the 'TOTAL' part. The 'PERMANENT' part meant that after the exchange the PAID for both of them would be permanently inactive. They couldn't use them again, and no one who had one could use them on them either. It was a permanent change never to be undone. Karen would remember what happened since she uwas the only using the device but Alex would not remember. This was an act of true love. She would give up everything to save him. She couldn't bare to see him like this.

She thought about what he had become, he was now a retarded, homosexual transvestite, with many physical problems and mental problems. She didn't know about the emotional and other problems he had acquired. This would be her life from now on.

She couldn't see him like that, she would give him her life. She had a bright future, even if it wouldn't be with Alex. She clicked the appropriate options. The PAID flashed an 'Are you sure?' message. She clicked that too. The last thing she thought as her life faded away was, 'I wonder what's its like to be a princess.'

You sat down next to her and started listing how you swapped lives and names with Amanda but you found Class too easy and boring so you swapped intelligence with a girl in your class which made it harder and more fun. however when you wanted to swap back you couldn't read a lot of the options so you swapped randomly and didn't succeed but it's okay because the voice activation allowed you to get all your intelligence back and you fixed everything once you got home. Once dinner was ready Karen noticed that nobody saw anything wrong, Amanda now with Alex's body and life was wearing the Denim skirt and tank top she had been wearing a few hours ago and Kate was acting like nothing had happened to her best friend complaining about how hard calculus was. The next morning Alex woke up to 'his' mother calling his name "Alex wake up for breakfast and bring Karen with you". Once you were finished and put your plate in the kitchen you went back to Amanda's room to get changed for school, you changed into a pink dress with a flower on the front that stopped just below your knees, some grey leggings, white socks, sneakers and a hairband to top it off because you could pretend it was a tiara. 114232221122222112.content:
Karen tried to walk over to Jason (the boy in the dress and diapers) but he ran away. Then she noticed that he wasn't running away from her, he was playing tag with other boys. Karen ascertained that there were four boys playing in the game although, Jason was the only one playing in a dress. She could see that despite wearing a dress and a diaper he was still acting like a boy. He wore the sneakers and socks of a boy. He also had a boyish haircut and didn't care about exposing his diapers.

If she was going to 'fix' the boy then she would have to get him to stay in one place so she could swap him back. She would have to find a baby who should be in diapers but wasn't. And a girl who was wearing boyish clothes.. The latter part wasn't going to happen, as the girl Karen was looking for didn't swap her wardrobe just her love of dresses. She was wearing pants and a t-shirt. Jason's drawers were still filled mostly with his boyish stuff, he just preferred to wear dresses instead.

Karen called out to Jason, "Nice dress!"

Jason didn't take it as a compliment. He was teased for wearing dresses, but was tough enough to end the teasing. In Jason's mind there were many times that he ripped or ruined a pretty dress because he got into a fight with another student. Jason wasn't going to give up dresses he loved them, but that didn't mean he would let anyone bully him. "What's it to ya," he shouted back. Then he approached Karen ready to defend his right to wear a dress. It was pretty comical since not only was he wearing a dress, but the dress he did wear was juvenile for even a second grader. It was a dress usually worn by a much younger girl. A dress that even four year olds might have outgrown, but certainly something that a girl entering school should have long since abandoned.

Karen was taken aback. She expected him to act like a girl and accept the compliment then say something akin to "Thank you." She didn't expect hostility.

As Jason approached he said menacingly, "What did you said about my dress?"

"It's just that I like it."

"Don't think that even though you are bigger than me and a girl, I won't beat you up."

"I didn't mean it like that. I mean I think the dress is pretty."

"I know what you mean. And you had better stop making fun of me!"

Karen tried to defuse the situation. She could take care of the little boy quite easily if she wanted to. She was still a teen even though she was in the boys' grade now.. To get rid of the kid she apologized. All she did was want to do something nice for the boy. To get him back to normal and all she got was hostility. She didn't even say anything mean to the boy. Karen decided that Alex was right, this boy was mean and deserved what happened to him. She then took out her PAID and made additional changes. She made sure that the dress wearing boy in a diaper would be the youngest, smallest student in his grade.

Karen never did find out who Alex had swapped the boy originally with. It was hard to tell. It was hard to tell if any of the girls were purposefully wearing boys clothes. She also didn't know which babies were wearing boys briefs when they should be wearing diapers. Karen realized that swapping Alex back to normal was going to be harder than she thought.

"Amanda...Amanda..." the teacher says. You don't respond so she approaches you. "Amanda," she says again but this time she is right in front of you.

"Yes, Miss..." you trail off because you don't know the teachers name.

You look around hoping for a clue but you can't find any. You debate between saying "I don't know" and "What is the question?" You decide that "I don't know" is the better choice.

"OK"

"Seven is odds," you say. It was easy as long as you knew the question.

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, seven is odds." you say confidently.

"OK, that is right, but you have to pay attention, hunny"

"I will," you say, even though the lesson is the last thing on your mind.

The teacher moves on with the lesson. You think to yourself, everyone thinks I'm a first grader. Everyone thinks I'm a girl. You can see that is obviously not true. You are obviously too big to be a first grader. You don't even really fit into these little chairs and desks they have you sitting in. You know you look ridiculous. She is wearing girly sandal type shoes, but she isn't wearing tights, she is wearing knee high socks. That is as girly as the girls get, at least today in this class.

The underwear you was wearing did feel a little tighter than before, but it also felt like cotton and not too different than your usual briefs. You assume you look more ridiculous than you did before. But no one seemed to think anything was out of place. The girl you switched with, looked more like a boy than a girl now that she was wearing your clothes and had your hair style, but no one reacted to that either.

What do you do next?

1152321.content:
"Hey Alex, lets switch personalities." Karen suggests.

"Why?" you ask.

"I though it might be interesting for us to have eachother's personality for a bit." she says. "What do you say? Want to do it?"

You think it over a bit, then respond with a yes. She selects "Personality" on her display, and then a message asking you if you agreed came up. You hit "Accept" and then Karen and you select "Apply Changes."

Time resumes, and you both wonder whether the switch worked on not. You don't really feel any different. "So did it work?" you ask her.

"I'm not sure." she says. "I don't feel any different."

"Me neither." you tell her.

"Well that seems like a waste." she says.

"I guess so." you agree. "Now what should we do?" you ask her. It was saturday, so you didn't have any school today.

"Lets go get some breakfast." she says, and the two of you go downstairs. You pour yourself a bowl of cereal, and sit down at the table. As you eat, something catches your eye. Its one of Karen's sister Stephanie's fashion magazine's. You remember that Karen and Stephanie would often read these, though you had never cared about it before. However as you looked at the cover, you thought it seemed interesting right now and decided to give it a read. You picked it it up and flipped through the pages a bit, admiring the clothes shown in it, as well as reading the articles on stuff like make up tips. As you read through it, you randomly ask "Hey Karen, how do you think this dress would look on me?"

Karen looks over at you and the magazine. "I think you'd look good in it." she replies, not finding anything strange about the situation. Neither of you realize the change in personality since you have both switched with eachother.

"Yeah, thats what I thought." you say. "I sure wish I had clothes like this."

"Why don't you have mine?" Karen suggests. "I don't think I want them anymore. I feel weird in this nightgown of mine."

"That sounds like a great idea. You've got great clothes." You aim your PAID at her and press the button. Time stops again, and you select "Clothes" on the display. Karen selects "Accept" and you then select "Apply Changes". Everything resumes, and you see that you are both now wearing eachother's pajamas.

"Well the personality option doesn't seem to work, but the clothes option sure does." you say as you admire you look down at the nightgown you now wore.

"So now what should we do?" Karen asks. "Its saturday, and I don't feel like justing sitting around the house all day."

Inside, you see that all of your clothes have been replaced by Karen's. You look around and admire your new wardrobe, thinking about what to wear. You go into your dresser and take out a pair of panties and a bra. You put them on, not even wondering why you would need to wear a bra since you didn't have breasts. After that, you put on a a dress that you knew had been Karen's favorite, and right now you could tell it would be your new favorite.

You then decided to look in the mirror to see how you looked. You loved how the dress looked on you, and it fit you perfectly. Your attention was then drawn to your face. You felt that it didn't go with the rest of you at the moment, so you looked around your room and saw some make up supplies on your dresser. "Guess they came with the clothes. And they're just what I need right now." you say as you pick out some and apply them to the your face. Once done, you look into the mirror again. "Perfect!" you say as you smile at your reflection. Now that youwere dressed, you picked a pair of shoes with heels from your closet and put them on.

When you exit your room, you see Karen standing outside your room. She was wearing a red t-shirt and jeans. "Took you long enough." she teases.

115232111.content:
The two of you get to the mall after a ride on the city bus; a ride you would rather not repeat, you didn’t use to mind, but now (with Karen’s personality) you do. The mall you had chosen to go to is one of the most upscale ones in the city, filled with the trendiest brands and stores. Looking around you notice several large banners that make you squeal with girlish glee. Karen gives you a quizzical look, wondering if there was something wrong with you.

“Don’t you see Karen?” you ask, while pointing at the banners.

“See what Alex? Why are you squealing like a little girl?”

“The whole mall is on SALE you dummy!” you explain.

“Yeah, so what’s so special about that?”

“It’s a mall-wide sale Karen, that’s what’s special, duh,” you tell him while rolling your eyes.

“Well this is the most expensive mall in town Alex, even if it is half off we still can’t buy anything here. I just came because it beats staying home all day,” she states bluntly.

“Oh, you are such a bore sometimes!”

“I’m sorry, but that’s just how it is; I’m a realist”

“You’re a party pooper, that’s what you are. Anyways, I’m an optimist aaand I have this,” you say, pointing at the PAID.

“Oh? And what are you gonna do with that?"

“Well, isn’t it the Personal Aspect Interchanging Device?"

“Yeah, what about it?”

“Ugh, you have noo imagination! Isn’t MONEY a personal aspect?”

“I guess so,”

“Then we can interchange it,” you tell her with a grin

“THAT’S STEALING ALEX!” she scream, which gets a few people to stare at the two of you.

“Hey, I think there are still a few people in China who didn’t hear you, you should scream even louder next time. No one is going to notice anyways; not with the PAID anyways,”

Come on, we have to find someone before all the really good stuff gets sold.” You say, pulling Karen by the arm. Poor Karen wasn’t too convinced about the idea, but something told her it was useless to argue with you when you had an idea.


The two of you walk around the mall, looking for just the right person, after all you were not heartless, it’s not like you would swap with a mother and leave her poor and unable to care for her family. So many people had come to the mall to take advantage of the sale that it was a bit overwhelming. As you made your way through one of the more high-end handbag stores in the mall you overhear a young woman’s conversation on the phone.


“Ugh, can you believe it? … No! Daddy said I could only spend $50,000 this weekend … I know, right? That’s just cruel, what am I going to buy with just that? … No, daddy’s gone on one of his silly business trips … I know, the poor have it so easy, they don’t have to worry about things like we do …” Both you an Karen are amazed at how conceited, self-centered and out of touch the young woman is. She is beautiful, dressed in what must have been a couture dress, with strappy high-heels that probably cost a small fortune and everything about her screamed money, but she didn’t sound like a nice person at all.


Without further thought you figure she was the perfect candidate for a swap. You activate the PAID, scrolled through the menus and picked “monetary assets”. When the world comes back …

12.content:
You eventually come to, not knowing what happened. You then notice that several things are different. The first is that you are no longer in the living room with Alex, and are now in one of the guest rooms of Alex's house.The second thing you notice is that it is no longer night, and is now morning. The next thing you realize is that while you had been fully clothed before blacking out, you are now dressed as you normally would be when going to bed wearing your nightgown. You look around the room and see your older sister Stephanie's stuff also in the room, but she isn't present.

You then notice a metal ring around your wrist. Its mostly plain, and has a single button on it. "What is this thing?" you ask out loud. As you look at it, you wonder how it could have gotten on you. It seemed to fit tightly around wrist, and when you tried to take it off, it wouldn't budge. Not making any progress with removing it, you decide the only thing to do is press the button. As soon as you do this, a holographic image appears in front of you. Its sudden appearance cause you to jump back in surprise.

-GREETINGS REGISTERED USER KAREN JONES. YOU ARE NOW IN POSSESSION OF A PERSONAL ASPECT INTERCHANGING DEVICE, OR PAID FOR SHORT. THE PAID IS A TOOL THAT ALLOWS YOU TO EXCHANGE ASPECTS ABOUT YOURSELF WITH ANOTHER. USING THE PAID, YOU MAY . TO USE THE PAID, SIMPLY AIM THE DEVICE AT ANOTHER PERSON AND PRESS THE BUTTON. ONCE PRSSED, TIME WILL STOP FOR ALL BUT YOU AND OTHERS NEARBY WHO ARE IN POSSESSION OF A PAID AS WELL, AND A HOLOGRAPHIC DISPLAY WILL BE BROUGHT UP FOR YOUR USE. USING THE HOLOGRAPHIC DISPLAY, SELECT FROM THE MENU OF "LIFE", "CLOTHING", "PERSONALITY', AND/OR CHOICES UNDER "PERSONAL INFO" THEN SELECT "APPLY CHANGES". TIME WILL RESUME, AND THE CHANGES YOU HAVE SELECTED WILL IMMEDIATELY TAKE EFFECT. HOWEVER, PLEASE NOTE THAT PAID WILL NOT CAUSE AND PHYSICAL CHANGES TO EITHER THE USER OR THE TARGET.-
-FOR DETAILS ON EACH OPTION, CONSULT THE "USER INSTRUCTIONS(the description of this story)" IN THE MENU SREEN AT ANY TIME.-

At first, you think that it sounds rediculous. But then again, maybe you should at least try it out on someone. You then remember that Alex had been with you before you blacked out last night. You wonder whether you should test it out or go talk with Alex about what happened.
