You walked alongside your sister into the kitchen, your skirt swishing forth and back while you walked. It was a strange but yet very interesting if not comfortable experience. You couldn't deny you didn't enjoy wearing your moms soft panties, even her bra was kind of comfortable but very alien to you.

You looked over to your sister. She didn't looked any better right now than you were. There was standing a seven year old girl in khaki pants, a shirt and tie, formerly your fathers courtesy, right next to a 16 year old boy, wearing a silk blouse, black skirt and flats. It should be a very odd sight and people would break into big laughter, but due to the magical devices called PAID everyone, except those two and anyone who claims such a device his own, thinks nothing strange from this look.

"Kinda creepy...", you mumbled and your sister responded with an asking face. You just shook your head and sat down on the kitchen table. "Never-mind.". The little girl, dressed as a grown-up man, just shrugged her shoulders and sat down as well.

It didn't take long and this bizarre duo was accompanied by another duo, not stranger as the others are. In came a tall man, wearing a pink skirt with a flower motive on it, pink tights, a pink unicorn shirt and a cute, small ribbon in his hair. The view was very ridiculous and it was a wonder this man even fit into such clothes.

Right behind him was a blond woman, clad simply in a boyish bathrobe and boxers. It seemed she didn't even bother being topless.

Again you would be concerned by the clothes these people, your parents, were wearing but thanks to the PAID nearly nobody would notice anyway, so why not just take the opportunity? You couldn't deny that the two were looking rediculously funny, just as you and your sister were.

You glanced over to your sister while eating breakfast with the family and could see that she was enjoying these changes aswell. You noticed she had a very hard time not to break out in laughter as your dad, dressed as a little girl went into the kitchen, but now she was more interested in her own new clothing.

While eating with one hand her cereals, she played with her other hand with her tie and the shiny belt buckle which were now rightfully hers. You could read easily in her face that she wouldn't want to change back very soon.

This thought brought you to yourself. You weren't quite sure if you wanted to change back soon as well. You really enjoyed all the air hitting against your hairy legs and the softness of your panties. You suddenly noticed that you began rubbing over your skirt covered panties while thinking about that and you must admit: You liked the feeling.

You also thought about all the different dresses, skirts and shoes which were now rightfully yours. You surley weren't the crossdressing type and you hadn't even thought about this until now, but now that you got the opportunity...

With a slight grin after you finished breakfast, you started to making plans and thinking about what you should wear next, but suddenly remembered that you had to get to school. You were very eager in "playing dress up", but you couldn't afford missing more classes.

You looked down at your PAID. With this you could switch jobs with your mom. She was a stay-at-home mother and so you could start little play in about half an hour when everybody else was either in school or at work.

It would be interesting to wear the clearly female outfit you were wearing right now out in public aswell. Especially at school. You were very interested at how people would react to you. You were interested in how the PAID changed reality so everyone would think it was normal for you to were women's clothes.

You decided to...
1312121112.title: Breakfast

13121211121.content:
You decided you should change jobs with your mom. You were just to excited by the thought of wearing all those dresses, high-heeled boots, pumps and all the other female clothing which were hanging now in your wardeobe.

You activated your PAID, your sister noticing that gave you an "What are you up to, Alex?"-look until time suddenly stopped. Finally she vocalized her question.

"I'm going to swap jobs with mom, so I can stay at home, while she goes to school.", you explained to her while navigating through the menu.

"You're going to stay at home?", your sister repeated, "That's not fair. I want to stay at home, too.". She looked as angry as a little girl could look and you noticed that she was nearly crying.

You sighed and looked at her. "We can't both stay at home. Everyone else in here is either going to work or school. Mom is the only one of us four who can stay at home because of her job.", you explained to her. You could see she was definetely not satisfied with this answer.

You sighed again. "You could switch with dad and go to his job. Maybe you would find this more interesting than going to school.".

Kate thought about it for a short while and then nodded. "Okay.". She said with a big smile and began using her PAID on Dad while you finished the swap between you and your mom and pressed enter. Time didn't resume immedeatly because your sister was still using hers.

When she was finished time resumed and you saw how your mother stood up. "We have to hurry.", she said to your girlfriend. "If we want to drop off Kate at work and then don't be late to school, we have to go now.".

"Yes, Mrs. Williams.", Karen said and came over to you. "Have fun here at home. See you after school.", she said to you while wrapping her arms around your neck and kissing you. She then followed your mom, accompanied by Stephanie and Kate.

You smiled and winked after them. "Have fun at school, sweetheart.".

Meanwhile, your dad went to his car aswell, followed by Matt and Amanda. "We're heading to school as well. Bye, Alex.".

You were now alone. Free to do what you want and when your mom returned home you could simply switch back, so you don't have to do anything right now and can't get into trouble. After all your mom didn't do her chores afterwards.

With a happy smile you walked upstairs into your room and opened the wardrobe. You were astonished by all the clothes which were in there. Your mom really had a lot of clothes... and shoes. On the bottom of your wardrobe you could find at least a dozen of shoes.

With a grin you looked into your drawer and found all your moms... no wait, your panties and bras. You even found stockings and a garter belt.

You began undressing. You let your skirt slide down your legs and drop it down on the floor. You stepped out, kicking your flats off. Lastly, you opened your blouse and throw it onto your bed. You now stood there in your room, not wearing anything than your mothers former underwear.

You took up your garter belt and fastened it around your waist. Then you took the stockings, sat down on your bed, sitting halfway on your blouse. You slid the stockings over your hairy legs and fastened them on the garter belt.

"Sexy.", you said while rubbing over your legs. You stood up and walked over to your wardrobe. You took out a pair of black leather pumps and throw them on your bed. You then looked for a dress to wear. You were surprised you could find some slutty clothes that you have never seen your mom wearing. You shook your head. "Later.".

You then decided to wear your mothers favorite blue dress which ende just above your knee and had a split on the right side. She only wore this dress if she was going to have a "magical night" with your dad.

You looked inside the small mirror in your room. You really liked how the dress hugged your masculine form. It would look much better if you had a female body. You put on the pumps you had already thrown on your bed and stood up, standing unsteady on the heels.

You took a step and almost fell. "Damn...", you thought, "I should have switched the ability to walk in heels as well.".

Slowly you stepped over to your window and looked outside. You were very lucky, just in front of your house was a woman in a tight red dress and 2-inch heel pumps walking down the street.

You activated the PAID and switched the ability to walk in heels and time resumed. The woman suddenly fell. You could hear her cursing and wondering why she put on heels, even though she couldn't walk in them.

You smiled and took a short walk around your room, standing like an expert on the heels.

What you didn't know, the PAID glitched and did another swap with the woman. What did it swap?

While you continued to walk around in the gorgous leather pumps you were currently wearing, you heard the phone ring. You walked over to it, your heels clicking seductively on the ground.

"Hello?", you asked as you picked up the phone. "Hey, Heather, it's me.". You immediatly recognized the voice on the other end as the voice of your girlfriend Karens. You didn't find it strange she called you Heather and not Alex, because of the glitch swap the PAID made.

"Hey there.", you greeted back. "Why are you calling? You have school.".

As you wanted to start the PAID instead of the usual interface you got just a clock ticking down from 6 minutes and 26 seconds. "Strange...", you thought, "Maybe, it has a recharging time after a certain amount of swaps or something like that.".

You shrugged your shoulders and continued your journey through the supermarket, looking for the Spaghetti Bologna. You could swap the ability to cook after the time limit anyway.

You...
131212111211.title: Personal Info

1312121112111.content:
You’d looked up the recipe for Spaghetti Bolognese on your phone and felt relatively confident you could pull it off if you followed the instructions, but you were still getting the ingredients when you ran into Victoria; one of your mother’s friends. Victoria Blake was a housewife as well, like most of the wives in your neighborhood for some odd reason. The area you lived in tended to be a bit old-fashioned and apart from a couple of wives who worked from home, most of the wives there tended to be traditional homemakers. Victoria was part of “The Girls”, the group of women who were basically the de facto government of the community. They organized all the activities, parties and events there and made sure everything ran perfectly according to the community guidelines. As usual, she was dressed in an impeccable and fashionable dress, a teal number with a high neckline, a slim white belt around her waist, wide hem skirt and tasteful 2” heeled pumps.

“Oh, Heather, I haven’t seen you since your sister’s last birthday, how have you been?” she asked.

“Fine, thank you Mrs. Blake, how about yourself?”

“Please, Mrs. Blake is my mother-in-law, just call me Victoria. You’re basically part of the housewife club anyways,” she said, making you blush a bit. “Your mom and I were talking about it the other night, she mentioned that you’re often all alone during the day while everyone else is at school or work and we figured you could join the rest of The Girls.”

“That’s so very kind of you,” you replied, more than amazed by the power of the PAID to warp reality. Here you were, a 16-year-old boy, in your mother’s clothes, playing at being a housewife, speaking to your mother’s traditionalist friend who saw nothing wrong with the situation. “Well, some of us are meeting in a little bit at Trish’s house to discuss the next fundraiser and you’re welcome to come. I’m actually here to pick some ingredients for my famous Grand Marnier Soufflé, you have to try it, it’s to die for.”

That gave you an idea. You quickly activated the PAID, scrolled through the menu and swapped cooking skills. Reality started to flow again once you’d accepted the change and Victoria looked at you pleadingly. “We would be so grateful if you’d join us and bring one of your amazing dishes, you are just such an amazing cook and we’ll love to have your skill in the group. I know it’s short notice, but I’m sure you can whip something up, what do you say?” she pleads.

You feel a slight rush of confidence knowing that you’d gained Victoria’s cooking skills; which were not inconsiderable. As a point, you wanted to show off just how good a cook you were. “Sounds great Victoria, I’ll make something delicious for the girls, don’t worry, I’ll see you all in a little bit.” Victoria smiled, and left you to finish your shopping.

After grabbing more things than you’d planned when you walked into the store, you paid and headed back home to cook something before heading to meet with the The Girls.
1312121112111.title: ran into a friend of your mother (also a housew...

13121211121111.content:
After picking up some more ingredients from the store you headed home to whip something up for The Girls. It was a short walk to Trish’s house, you knocked on the door, holding out your culinary contribution to the gathering to the young 20-something brunette who opened the door. Trish Howard was, the youngest of The Girls, bubbly and perennially upbeat. “Ladies, Heather is here and she brought us something delicious!” Trish announced to the group inside. Instantly a small swarm of women rushed over to greet you and to enthuse over the delicacy you’d brought over. You reveled in the attention as they all tried your dish and you explained how you’d cooked it.

Victoria was clearly the leader of the group, but she was not quite as assertive as you remembered her being. You recognized most of the women, apart from Victoria and Trish, there were Amber, Marie, Stephanie and Cassandra. Amber was in her early 30s, with classic Irish looks, redheaded, freckled and hot tempered. Marie was a French ex-pat, in her early 40s, always dressed in the latest fashion, but she always made you feel like there was more to her below the surface. Stephanie was the definition of a trophy wife, with all the enhancements that came with the title, but her husband’s wealth had endeared her with the group. Cassandra was a in her early 50s, but could have passed for a woman 10 years younger, with dark, luxurious hair, statuesque physique and razor sharp features, with glimmering blue eye.

You all enjoy the food each one had brought and chat for a bit, but you feel out of place and out of step with the group. After a while …

"Oh? What made you realize it worked?"

"Well, I couldn't fit into my favorite jeans... and it was largely from drinking too much beer and sitting on the couch watching football games. When I swapped us back it took me a month to get the weight back off!"

"Wow... so it really does work...."

You suddenly look at your mother's clothes. They look fabulous! Better than what you were wearing, that's for sure.

"Hey, mom, mind if I switch clothes with you?"

"No, in fact, that's a good idea. I like your clothes better anyways." Mom said.

You soon inputed the desire, and before you know it, you are now winning Mom's clothes, now fitting for your male body. You see your mom checking out her new clothes, and you notice she is missing her earrings and makeup, meaning you gained them.

"It is Tuesday, right mom?"

"Sure, why to you ask?"

"Well, don't you play Tennis with Mrs. Willow, Mrs. Conway, and Mrs. Hopkins every Tuesday?"

"Yeah, actually, though I don't feel like going today anymore."

"I have a proposal. I switch with you so I have your friends, and I become the stay at home person. I'll shop and play tennis, while you go to school with my friends."

"But Alex, I was going to stay home and play Xbox!"

"Now mother" You begin, putting your hands on your hips sternly as your mom usually would, "I know you don't want to play Tennis or shop or clean this house, do you?"

"No." Your mom said, sulking. "I'll go to school for you."

"Alright, I promise you can play as much Xbox as you want when you get home." You aid as you inputed the newest needs into the PAID. You hit the button and soon it was done.

"Now, let's get going, can't be late! I also took your driving skills, since I'll be needing the car. I'll pick you up after Video Game Club."

You pick up Mom's purse on the way out, and notice that your phone is in there, now full of Mom's contacts. You smile with your now lipstick covered lips.

1313322221.content:
Smiling in satisfaction at the way the day has already started, you pull into the parking lot at the tennis court. Before you step out of the car, you take a moment to make sure your lip stick is touched up just right, and that all of your gear is in your tennis bag, then you walk out towards your waiting friends.

Mrs. Elenore Hopkins was the oldest of the group, nearly fifty years old, but still in great shape. In a lot of ways, she played older sister for the whole group of your friends, always ready with a gentle piece of advice, or a ready laugh when you were feeling down. Her husband Jack Hopkins had been your father's supervisor years back, and you'd been friends ever since you met back then.

Mrs. Diane Conway on the other hand, was a great deal closer to your mom's age, and about an even match for her in terms of athletic ability. She wasn't obsessive like Mrs. Hopkins was about staying in shape, but then, she hadn't had any kids either, and it showed in the way she effortlessly maintained her trim figure. Her long red hair had faded, and wasn't as bright as it used to be, but she wasn't the kind to fuss on dyes or fancy styles. Of them all, you could count on Diane to be ready for whatever fun anyone had in mind, and more often than not, she was the cheerleader getting your group to go on some outing or other. You always had a great time with her, but sometimes you wonder if she'd be quite as care free if she'd had a few kids of her own.

The last member of your group stuck out like a sore thumb. Miranda Willow had married your father's current boss barely six months ago, and while some people might say she loved him dearly, there was little doubt about where the marriage had come from. At twenty four years of age, she was less than half her husband's age, and it was clear that she'd married his money at least as much as she'd married the man. But then, spending a few hours with Martin Willow would tell you that while he might say he loved the younger woman, he loved her immense bust and trim figure more. Rumor had it that she'd been an exotic dancer before Martin found her, and that their courtship had only lasted a few months before they were wed. Still, once you got past how different she was from the rest of you, you couldn't help but admit that she really did play well with the group. In many ways, she'd been received as the younger step sister... and her bubbly personality made it hard to resent the blond bombshell for being what she was.

For a moment, you consider forgetting about the PAID, and just losing yourself in a good game of tennis, but the temptation to trade something with one of your best friends is to great to resist....

Who do you swap with?

13133222212211.content:
You decide that ' although Miranda's pampered life would be interesting ' you'd much rather just have her body for now. So, without much pomp and circumstance, you input the desired settings and swap bodies with the beautiful Miranda.

Unused to your new body's center of gravity, you grab on to a near-by banister to gain your footing. Diane quickly grabs you by the arm to help you out and asks, 'Are you alright sweety?'

'Yes, I am, ' you begin to reply, but are taken aback by the voice that comes from your lips. Although it doesn't have the same inflection as Miranda's, it certainly is not the voice you are used to hearing. Not wanting to draw more undue attention to yourself, you steady yourself and thank Diane for her help.

Keen to check out your new body, you excuse yourself from the group while they set aside a court for your game and head to the nearest bathroom. After quickly checking that you are alone you lock the door and begin your examination. Before anything else you confirm the groups suspicions that Miranda's (now your) boobs are the product of a breast enhancement surgery. Also, although you cannot be certain without exchanging some personal information with Miranda, you are pretty sure that the lips reflected in the mirror are filled with collagen and that your buttocks has more than just natural padding.It seemed like your new body had been under the knife more than a few times.

Figuring that your friends have waited too long already and that you'll have time for a closer examination later, you head out of the restroom.

What do you do next?

131332222122111.content:
Stepping out on the court, it was weird to hear Miranda's bubbly laugh coming from your body as she prepared to serve, but once the ball was in the air, you were all business. Sprinting quickly to return the serve you marveled at how much your newly enhanced breasts bounced, even within the sports bra you were wearing. Also distracting was the way your expanded rear end jiggled with each step. You returned the serve, barely, but Miranda used your old teenage body to full advantage, giving you a real run for your money as she powered ball after ball back at you,

The first game she won with ease, but as you played more, the body you'd gained from her felt more and more familiar. The second game you won by a hair, and the third game became an all out death match. Elenore and Diane both stopped their own match to watch you two as you lobbed every shot back at her, the pair of you seeming very evenly matched. In the end, you won, but it was very much a close thing, and could easily have gone to the other woman.

"Way to go Alex!" Diane said as she walked out to hand you a towel. "I didn't think you could move that fast, as much weight as you lug around up there!"

"Oh come on now," Elenore teased. "They can't weigh more than one ton each. Besides, if they weren't that big, he'd never distract poor Miranda over there enough to win!"

"Ha," Miranda laughed. "Soo not my type. I've only got eyes for my snookums, and you all know it."

"Uh huh," you said, not really believing it any more than the others did. "Sure you do."

"Okay Alex," Elenore said. "Your victory, your pick. Where to next, Salon or Mall?"

It’s just too expensive,” you moaned. “Oh, nonsense, what better way to celebrate your husband’s promotion than by reminding him of the gorgeous wife he has and how amazing she looks in couture,” chimed Miranda, unknowingly voicing how she usually rationalized her expensive purchases when she had the body to indulge in high fashion. “She’s right Alex, and do you think Nicolas is going to have a chance to complain about the price when he sees you in that?” added Diane, echoing how she used manipulate her former husband, albeit with a less impressive arsenal at her disposal.

"Oh, Karen," Elizabeth said as she rounded the corner. "I see that they chose you. I had really hoped that Alex or Zack would have been chosen this time, but congratulations my dear."

"Chosen? What do you mean?"

"Here, why don't you step into my room and I'll explain everything," Elizabeth said as she opened her door. Once the two ladies were safely behind closed doors she continued. "Once a generation, they choose a person to receive a device, like the one you're now wearing. I don't know why they chose me... or what their criteria are. The others who were with you at the time of the choosing won't remember the choosing, and the only people who can see the device are others who wear it. In all the years I've had mine, I've only met two other people who were had one."

"But who are the people who do the choosing?" Karen asked, examining the intricate detail work on her device.

"Who can say, but they're certainly exceptionally advanced. The device has staggering power, it can bend and change reality itself. It allows you to trade bodies, clothes, lives, personality or individual attributes of your life. Using this device, you can make your life whatever you want it to be... and greatly impact the lives of those around you."

"Wow," Karen said, stunned. "That sounds like a lot of power, and a lot of responsibility."

"Actually," Elizabeth said smiling. "It's a lot of fun. Would you like a demonstration?"

"Yeah, I would."

132112.content:
Alex's mom pressed a button on her PAID and you stared in amazement as time seemed to slow to a stop around you. The drapes stopped their gentle sway in the wind and sounds fell away until you were left in a perfectly still room. Around you, holographic menus sprung into being, one after another as Elizabeth quickly navigated the menus, making her selections. Moments later, a screen appeared directly in front of you:

"Another PAID user would like to exchange "Personal Info: Taste in Music" with you. Do you accept: Y/N"

You reached out, a mix of hesitation and excitement causing your heart to race as you tapped the Yes button. "Is it always like that?" You ask Elizabeth.

"Not always, but when two PAID users swap anything, we both have to agree. It stops people from getting into a swap back and forth sort of tug-a-war." Tapping the 'Exit' button, Alex's mom returned time to normal before looking at you with a grin. "So, who's your favorite band?"

"Same as it was before... I know Bon Jovi isn't exactly trendy at the moment, but I still have the hugest crush.... OMG! It did work! Bon Jovi... Poison... Ozzy before the drugs really destroyed him.... they're all the bands that were popular when you were my age!"

"You see how it works? Isn't it cool? But speaking of when I was younger, I have an idea. I would take it as a huge favor if you would let me set this one up, and I promise, it would only be for as long as you enjoyed it."

"Um... That's an awe full lot of preface to an idea Mrs. Williams.... Should I be scared?"

"Oh no. It's just that, I haven't had a great deal of time to spend with Alex lately. I mean, Zack is already off at college most of the time, and well, between school and his busy social life... I just don't get to hang out with him as much as I used to, I know he's still got a few years before college himself, but, I guess I'm empty nesting a bit. Anyway, I was thinking.... I'd really like to get a chance to spend some more time with him, maybe for a week or two. So, how would you feel about swapping spouses? Alex would be my boyfriend, and you would be married to Steven."

"Wow," you say, thinking of all of the things that would change in your life. "But... wouldn't people think that's weird? You'd be dating your own son..."

"Oh, I can take care of that. We'll trade a few more things... if we trade 'jobs' then you become a stay at home mom, and I become a high school student, which will probably work for the best anyway," Elizabeth answered with a smile.

"But, isn't that basically trading lives then?"

"Oh no, this way, you're still related to your family, your brothers and sisters are still your brothers and sisters... it's just that you're the one who married Steven and had Zack, Alex and Kate... while I'm the much younger sister of my own sister Carol. I just happen to still be in high school, and to have fallen for Alex. Lots of the rest of your life will still be the same. Same friends, unless you want to trade those too, same interests... just a different role and a different love interest. So, what do you think? Like I said, it'd only be for as long as you wanted it to last, I completely understand if you wanted to change back quickly. I'd like to do it for a week or two, but it's all up to you. What do you say?"

"You're right... it sounds like a lot of fun. And I could use a week or two out of school. But, after we do this, if I want to use my own PAID, can I?"

"Sure you can, just try to keep track of things so you don't get too lost. I find it handy to keep a journal, that way, if there's something you traded away, you can go track it back down. Okay, are you ready?"

"Ready Mrs Williams...."

"Oh please," she said pressing buttons. "Call me Elizabeth... after all, in just a moment, you'll be Mrs. Williams!"

You woke up with a start. He shook his head and then realized that things weren't quite right. When did you get in bed last night? And...why were you wearing a white t-shirt and boxers? You couldn't remember anything from what happened last night. Strange, because you know you didn't drink or do drugs. It wasn't like it was a fight or anything.

Then you notice a metal ring around your wrist. Its mostly plain, and has a single button on it.
"Huh? What's this?" You mutter. It fight tightly, and when you tried to take it off, it wouldn't budge. Not making any progress with removing it, you sighed and decided the only thing to do was press the button. As soon as you did this, a holographic image appears in front of you. Its sudden appearance caused you to jerk back in surprise.

-GREETINGS REGISTERED USER NATE HARVENT. YOU ARE NOW IN POSSESSION OF A PERSONAL ASPECT INTERCHANGING DEVICE, OR PAID FOR SHORT. THE PAID IS A TOOL THAT ALLOWS YOU TO EXCHANGE ASPECTS ABOUT YOURSELF WITH ANOTHER. USING THE PAID, YOU MAY . TO USE THE PAID, SIMPLY AIM THE DEVICE AT ANOTHER PERSON AND PRESS THE BUTTON. ONCE PRESSED, TIME WILL STOP FOR ALL BUT YOU AND OTHERS NEARBY WHO ARE IN POSSESSION OF A PAID AS WELL, AND A HOLOGRAPHIC DISPLAY WILL BE BROUGHT UP FOR YOUR USE. USING THE HOLOGRAPHIC DISPLAY, SELECT FROM THE MENU OF "LIFE", "CLOTHING", "PERSONALITY', AND/OR CHOICES UNDER "PERSONAL INFO" THEN SELECT "APPLY CHANGES". TIME WILL RESUME, AND THE CHANGES YOU HAVE SELECTED WILL IMMEDIATELY TAKE EFFECT. HOWEVER, PLEASE NOTE THAT PAID WILL NOT CAUSE ANY PHYSICAL CHANGES TO EITHER THE USER OR THE TARGET.-
-FOR DETAILS ON EACH OPTION, CONSULT THE "USER INSTRUCTIONS(the description of the story of this story)" IN THE MENU SCREEN AT ANY TIME.-

"What the heck?" you wondered aloud. A little confused, you stand up and then paced around the room a little. No, the device wouldn't come off. Sure, you could experiment with it, but you had to find someone first.

Wandering out of the room while scratching your head you didn't realize that your little sister Emily was there.
Thud! Slamming into each other, you have the strange feeling as you try to keep your balance that something is wrong.

Indeed, the PAID seems to have activated and Emily is suspended in fall.
"Woah!" You start, a little surprised. You wanted to reach out to stop her from falling, but now...you stop. A holographic display has come up around the PAID now as you point your hand towards your little sister, an array of options pop up.

14421.content:
You awaken with a start. You have no memory at all of what happened last night, and that strikes you as odd.

It wouldn't be weird for a normal kid your age, you suppose; given the kinds of parties that usually go down nowadays, blacking out happens rather often, you'd assume.

But YOU? No, you haven't partied once in your whole life. You haven't even touched a bottle of alcohol.

So yeah, this is weird.

You have to focus. Center yourself on what you know.

Your name is MICHAEL.

You rouse yourself after a few moments of thought and sit up. You immediately notice something on your left wrist - a strange band of a metal and work you've never seen. It looks a bit dinged-up, and has a single worn button. After staring for a second, you press it, and the band emits a crackle of static before clearing. It continues to crackle and glitch out as a message plays.

-GREETINGS -static- USER -static.- YOU ARE NOW IN POSSESSION OF A -static- INTERCHANGING DEVICE, OR PAID FOR SHORT. THE PAID IS A TOOL THAT ALLOWS YOU TO -static- ANOTHER. USING THE PAID, YOU -static.- TO USE THE PAID, SIMPLY -static- PERSON AND PRESS THE BUTTON. ONCE PRESSED, TIME WILL -static- WHO ARE IN POSSESSION OF A PAID AS WELL, AND A -static- BE BROUGHT UP FOR YOUR USE. USING THE -static,- SELECT FROM -static- THEN SELECT "APPLY CHANGES". TIME WILL -static,- THE CHANGES YOU -static- IMMEDIATELY TAKE EFFECT. HOWEVER, PLEASE NOTE THAT PAID WILL NOT -static- TO EITHER THE USER OR THE TARGET.-
-FOR DETAILS ON EACH OPTION, CONSULT THE -static- IN THE -static- AT ANY TIME.-

You're... pretty sure that wasn't what was supposed to happen. It also really hurt your ears.

So, to recap, you don't know what's going on, you appear to have lost several hours of your life, and you have a weird wristband that is disturbingly vague in detail. And... okay, wait a sec... Yep, it won't come off. Wonderful.

Something is definitely very wrong. This thing seems outright dangerous, glitched or no. There's no telling what it truly does without some test work. And if this one exists, others might as well. Ones that aren't glitched and hold even MORE power. Ones that could very well be held by people who want to exterminate everyone else that has one. And you'd be disadvantaged, because by some stroke of terrible luck, yours doesn't work right.

You're getting a really bad vibe from this. It's as if... you're... huh.

You had a strange train of thought there, but following it might give a clue of some sort.

Being a shut-in, you play a lot of games. And most of those games are retro stuff your parents had. One of your favorites had to be Knuckles Chaotix on the old, dusty SEGA.

You learned a while ago that there was a hidden character, one who had been made in the alpha stages but had been scrapped. Playing as the remains of that character was always fun to do, because of the nature of the character himself; he was a glitchy mess, left behind by the last bits of deleted code. He was once meant to be played, but now... well, he wasn't. Playing as him shouldn't be a thing you could do.

The similarities are disturbing. Your... PAID? Is that what it's called? ...It's glitchy, and you can't remember how you got it. It's like someone selected you from a list of people to get one of these, and you were never meant to be selected.

It's obvious now. A normal person to get one of these would probably know all sorts of ways they could use it, and would probably even have a few friends willing to be guinea pigs. You, though... You're a shut-in. You don't know anything about this town, and no one knows anything about YOU. Not even this PAID knew your name.

So, with all this in mind, you guess there's only one thing to do.

You're glad you played a lot of noir games, because it's time to do some sleuthing.

You give yourself the girl's energy and desire to do whatever she does, as well as a good bit of her feminity to help you play the part.

In a single rush, you feel the personality changes take place. You can already feel new energy flowing within you, and you honestly wonder how you could have ever been a shut-in to begin with.

Now to seal the deal; you need the girl's NAME. You switch it and almost immediately forget yours. What was your name again...? It started with an M, right? Or... maybe an L??

You don't spend much time deliberating, though, because it another few moments you are completely sure your name is Erica Martin.

You're 16, a casual high-schooler, and a friend to several people, notably a boy named Alex and a girl named Karen. You're also the girlfriend of Greg Parker, though for some reason that seems odd to you. You were on your way to school when something stopped you. What was it?? Oh yeah, you ran into this weird kid you've never seen before. He had a... wait a minute... what's...

You blink a few times. No, this isn't right. You're Michael, and you found a weird bracelet that switches things about people. You used it on a girl on her way to school to find out how to get there, because you want to know what the bracelet is and checking a centralized area seemed like a good idea.

You take a few breaths. That was creepy. You almost lost yourself there. You guess this is probably linked to the faulty PAID. You need to be more careful from now on.

Anyways...

You finish your changes and press the button again. Time starts back, and "Michael" suddenly stops running. "He" blinks a couple times, confused, and muses aloud. "...What am I doing out here...? I need to get back home." He shakes his head and walks back to your house.

That takes care of that, you guess. ..."He" didn't even say anything, just kind of awkwardly passed you. Wow, you guess you really don't know how to talk to girls, huh?

Alright, time to head to school. You recall that today is a bit of a free day, so your choices for finding people would be best limited to either...
1442111221.title: Use the device on this girl.

info.brief_description: You come into possession of a device that lets you switch things between people
info.description:
One day, two people discover a strage object that gives them each something called a Personal Aspect Interchanging Device, or PAID for short. These devices let them exchange certain things with other people and alters reality so that only they are aware.

Main Characters:
Alex Williams - 16 years old. Karen's best friend and boyfriend.
Karen Jones - 16 years old. Alex's best friend and girlfriend.
They've both known eachother since they were young.

Other Characters:
Elizabeth Williams - Alex's mother.
Steven Wiliams - Alex's father.
Kate Williams - 7 years old. Alex's younger sister.
Zack Williams - 20 years old. Alex's older brother. Attends the local college.

Amanda Jones - 7 yeras old. Karen's younger sister. Friends with Alex's sister
Matt Jones - 10 years old. Karen's younger brother. Doesn't get along with his sister Stephanie. Looks up to Alex and Zack.
Stephanie Jones - 18 years old, Karen's older sister. Gets along well with her sisters. A cheerleader,

Greg Parker - 16 years old. A good friend of Alex and Karen.
Erica Martin - 16 years old. A good friend of Alex and Karen, and Greg's girlfriend.
Amy Lewis - 16 years old. A friend of Alex and Karen. On the soccer team.
Mike Wilson - 17 years old. A friend of Alex and Karen.
Pete Thomas - 18 years old. Stephanie's boyfriend.
Rebecca White - 17 years old. A cheerleader, and really stuck up. Doesn't like Alex, Karen and their friends.
John Peterson - 18 years old. A member of the football team and Rebecca's boyfriend. Like his girlfriend, doesn't like Alex, Karen, and their friends.
Christy Baker - 7 years old. Friends with Kate and Amanda.
Tommy Davidson - 10 years old. Matt's best friend.
Linda Smith - A friend and co-worker of Alex's mother, Elizabeth.

You can add other characters if you want.

Types of switches:
-Body: You switch bodies with your target. People will still treat you as yourself. Clothing does not switch with the body and readjusts to fit the new body comfortably.

-Clothing: You switch the clothes you are wearing with the targets. Clothing will readjusts to fit you comfortably. You will also switch all other clothes you own with theirs. If you switch clothing with a person of the opposite gender, you will now be expected to dress like that gender by others. For example, if Karen switches clothing with Alex, people will find it wierd if Karen wears girl's clothes unless she switches clothing with another girl.

-Life: You switch lives with that person. People will now treat you as that person. The person will act as if they have always had the life of the one they now had and will act like that person. You keep keep your own body, and your first name stays the same.

-Personality: You switch personalities with that person. People will still treat you as yourself, but you will now act like that person, while still being aware that you are yourself. People will find your sudden change in personality normal.

-Personal Info: Contain partial versions of other other switches, as well as others. Single or multiple Interests, skills, hobbies, occupations, and many others.

When you do a switch, reality adjusts so that everyone but those with a PAID will think things have always been like that.
While the device is in use, time will stop except for you and others who possess the PAID that are nearby. You will not be able to move from your current location though.

If switching with another person with a PAID, both must agree to what will be switched.

Switches are only between the user and the target.
Any switches that are currently applied will be switched to the target. For example, if Alex switches lives with his mother, and then his sister, his sister will have his mother's life, Alex will have his sister's life, and their mother will still have Alex life.

While you will be aware of changes to reality, you are not completely immune to them. Some switches come with side effects.
Even though you will be completely aware that the switch happened, switches that affect you mentally such as Personality and certain Personal Info options will have full effect. You will know that you have switched, but how you now act will seem perfectly normal to you.
When using the Life and Personality options together, if you switch lives with someone, and then switch personalities with that person while still in their life, you will receive their own original personality instead of the personality of their current life.

The PAID only works on humans.

Also, the devices have a glitch that will occasionally activate and do a switch on you of its own choosing. Switches done this way don't need to be agreed upon if with another PAID user. After a switch done this way, the PAID must reboot and is unusable for 30 minutes. The more PAIDs present in one place increases the odds of this glitch occuring.

You can introduce other characters with PAIDs if you want.

No killing off characters
No ending the story after just a few short chapters

Have fun!
